name: Rita Remson
text:
If you haven’t shopped Crystal Corner you should visit soon. They have a great selection of Baby items, children’s clothing, Melissa and Doug toys,
Mud Pie and other home decor as well as ladies clothing. Great place to buy a baby gift or wedding gift. So nice that they offer free gift wrapping!  You can’t find that anywhere else!

name: Debra Slaton
text: Always love shopping here. Friendly staff and very helpful. I also enjoy the many unique gifts they have that you can’t find other places. Great selection of women’s clothing and accessories. I have a new grandchild and I love the children’s clothing and the Melissa and Doug toys. This is the largest store I know of that has collectibles.  Great store!

name: Haley Simpson
text: Great little boutique to shop for any gift for any occasion! The staff is so kind and helpful. Specifically love the variety of little boy clothes that they offer, not many boutiques carry a variety of boy clothes!

name: Kelly Adams
text:
Crystal Corner has a wide variety of unique gifts and clothing for children and Women.
One of my most Favorite Stores to shop in Boaz.
Staff is very friendly and helpful when you are looking for that something special, they also have the Best gift wrappers Ever !!
Love that it is a Locally Family Owned Business!
💜💜💜

name: Norma Parker
text: Great place to shop for gifts, home decor, even  clothes for just about the entire family. Mary Ann goes above and beyond to help! Highly recommend!

name: Regina Duvall
text: This place is a delight to the senses, very unique collectibles as well as fashionable clothes in my plus size which is hard to find.  Sweet sweet people there to help and custom wrap if needed.

name: SCH EVENTS
text: The best place for bridal, house warming, teacher and baby shower gifts! The staff is always friendly and helpful.

name: Beth Brashier
text: Great store to shop with lots of variety. Very nice/helpful  employees

name: Connie Blevins
text: Wide selection of hard to find unique gifts

name: Amelia Gillilan
text:
Unique beautiful in everyway!
Just all the store decor is a wonder to see......If you are in Boaz ....visit !
Chrystal Corner has something for everyone.....

text: Very unique items. One of the few places you can find Dept 52 Christmas Villages.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Kimyarda Jones
text: During the Christmas season on a Friday when the streets are very busy I got off of work early to get a plaque for my in-laws engraved, no one was there.  There was no sign or any indication that no one was in the building except the lights being off. The sign posted on the door and all of the internet signage says they close at 4:30 I arrived at exactly 4. When I call to ask was anyone there I was told, Sorry we had to leave early. I explained my issue with hopes of them offering me a better time to come back or a discount I was told ....again with less compassion than the first time sorry for the inconvenience. I work 9 to 5 Monday through Friday when they are open I had to make special arrangements for that time off. They clearly don't care so I went to Furlongs. They were there. The work is beautiful and was fast.   I was also treated with a discount for this company's grave inconsideration for PAYING customers Edit: I originally gave 2 stars without comment, but after being harrassed for my rating I dropped to one. As a business owner I cannot stress the importance of time management and customer service satisfaction. It is a fine line, but it must be walked.

resp.text: Kimyarda, you came after 4PM on Friday and found us closed. As we explained to you by phone and email, we had to close that day a little early due to something that came up. We were taking food to a family who’s mom had surgery. We hadn’t talked to you and we’re not expecting you or we could have made other arrangements to meet you later or another time after hours. Again we apologize for your inconvenience

name: Summer Kindle
text: Excellent quality and friendly service! Highly recommend!!

name: Theresa Hull
text: Great work and great service on short notice. I would highly recommend this company and will use them in the future!

name: Andrea Forman
text: I needed an engraved gift for boss's day and they were the only shop who was friendly and could get the job done the same day! Great quality and fast,  friendly service!  Highly recommended.

name: A W Brakeley
text: USAF Active Duty.  I needed a Dress Shirt nametag ASAP, after losing it on the way to Maxwell AFB.  I gave this store a call, and within 45 minutes he had a brand new one made up for me, with plenty of time for me to get back to base and attend my fiancee's graduation, looking sharp.  I could not have been luckier to find this place, and the other work inside looked impressively professional.  Thank you for your speed and skill, and if/when I come back through Montgomery, I will definitely be doing business here again.

name: David McCaughtry
text: After a last minute order was dropped in my lap 1st Place Trophy really saved my bacon! Kudos to a top notch business. I will definitely patron them again!

name: Ryan R
text: Excellent service! Quick and friendly couple. Was strapped for time and they were able to meet the short deadline.

name: Mark Williams
text: I picked up some awards and the engraving really popped. I will be back here again. Great service!!

name: Courtney Jones
text:
My kids and I stumbled into this store today on a quest to find secondhand furniture for my son’s bedroom.  When I opened the door and saw all of the gorgeous, high quality decor and gifts I immediately looked at my kids and said, “DON’T TOUCH ANYTHING!” The owner, Lulu, immediately welcomed us like family and took my three boys on a journey through her store. She and my oldest became fast friends as they bonded over all the crystals, gemstones, and fossils.
This store is such a unique place full of gorgeously, curated pieces at every price point. We will be going back ASAP because I’m kicking myself for not buying a piece of wall decor that I want and also because we want to hang out with Lulu again!

resp.text: Omg .. you and your family are amazing warm   hearted people ♥.  I enjoy hanging out.  You all are welcome anytime 😊.  Looking forward to seeing you guys soon.  God bless 🙏

name: opal armistead
text: Amazing inventory! Very eclectic mix that guarantees you won't walk out of the doors empty handed. If you're looking for that one of a kind conversation piece,  this is the place to be! Definitely recommend to my friends.

name: Scot Reeves
text: This place is truly amazing. Beautiful, interesting things curated from all over the world. Definitely worth a stop. The owner is an absolute delight. One of my favorite places.

name: Mona Davidson
text: Absolutely loved this little place! The owner was wonderful as well, so friendly, knowledgeable & helpful. I am in love with the 2 rings I bought and can't wait to go back.

name: Matt Moss
text: This place has something for everyone!  The shop owner is amazing and has an eye for everything BEAUTIFUL.  You wont be disappointed.  Stop in and say hello.

text: I absolutely LOVE this store!! There is literally something for everyone. When you walk in, you feel better. It’s a truly magical place!!

text: USAF Active Duty.  I needed a Dress Shirt nametag ASAP, after losing it on the way to Maxwell AFB.  I gave this store a call, and within 45 minutes he had a brand new one made up for me, with plenty of time for me to get back to base and attend my fiancee's graduation, looking sharp.  I could not have been luckier to find this place, and the other work inside looked impressively professional.  Thank you for your speed and skill, and if/when I come back through Montgomery, I will definitely be doing business here again.

text:
My kids and I stumbled into this store today on a quest to find secondhand furniture for my son’s bedroom.  When I opened the door and saw all of the gorgeous, high quality decor and gifts I immediately looked at my kids and said, “DON’T TOUCH ANYTHING!” The owner, Lulu, immediately welcomed us like family and took my three boys on a journey through her store. She and my oldest became fast friends as they bonded over all the crystals, gemstones, and fossils.
This store is such a unique place full of gorgeously, curated pieces at every price point. We will be going back ASAP because I’m kicking myself for not buying a piece of wall decor that I want and also because we want to hang out with Lulu again!

His prices are excellent, and he was even willing to match national pricing from a big warehouse vendor for my real estate signs! name: Evita B
text:
Went in to get an outdoor retail sign. Gave my information and was told someone would come out and measure. They never did. I called about 3 weeks later and was told someone would come out that day to measure. Waited at the location all day until about 8pm. No one showed up. I've heard a similar story from another business owner about them never showing up or calling back. Decided to go with SignOps and they were very helpful, and got our sign made and up within a week of contacting them and approving the design. They handled everything and it looks perfect!

Response. "Perceived"? No one came to measure and he admitted he didn't come and measure the first time, citing the holidays. I visited the shop before the holidays and in 3 weeks time, no one measured or contacted me. After I called, he never came that day after saying he would. I was there all day, and no one measured and no one contacted me. I do not have any calls from this place and I gave my cellphone number and address. Place is like 10 to 15 minutes away. As I said, another business has had the same experience. People reading this review can decide for themselves from my "perceived" experience. Thank you and have a nice day.

resp.text: I am very sorry for your perceived experience.  One of our salesmen did go out and measure for your sign. After repeated attempts to contact you with no response on your part, we figured you decided to go another route.  If there is anything we can do for you in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Robert Petty
text: They are a detox clinic and have been helping struggling addiction problems for over 25 years. They have a wonder,helpful and polite staff to help the recovering addicts adjust to a life without substance abuse. You will need to call ahead and talk with one of the friendly staff to get the things you will need before starting the program. I wish I could provide more information in case an addict is looking for help,but I do know they are only a phone call away.

name: Sheena
text:
If you do not know anything or very little about ADDICTIONS, as well as, Recovery it is time we educate others and save more lives!! If you are an addict/alcoholic wanting help or if you know someone that needs help, reach out to the many different rehab facilities for information not only for the addict suffering but also for information for the entire family. We all have to start coming together and build one another up and help others succeed!!

Pearson Hall and The Fellowship House are two awesome programs! That is where my journey to living a clean and sober live began! I am truly grateful for their amazing staff members! Both facilities staff members are truly sincere, caring, loving, and want to help every addict/alcoholic that is ready for a new way of life!

name: Autumn Ashley Smith
text: This place was and is a great place to go for detox. The staff is very helpful and caring. The food is great, you definitely want go hungry. I had been on heroin for 5 years and with the detox meds, I didn't have one withdrawal symptom, which I thought was amazing when I found out that the majority of the meds were over the counter medication. If you want to go to a long term facility once you are released, they will set you up with one. As long as you want to get and stay clean and sober, this place is the perfect place to start. And for the negative reviews, the ONLY reason why you have posted negative stuff is because they didn't give you medications that give you a buzz. Why would you want to replace one addiction with another one. YOU have to want to get clean and sober for this to work, it's not going to if your doing it for someone else. Anyways good luck with your recovery and God bless.

name: Preston Franklin
text: Called ahead to be sure they could do custom monogram in one day  (something simple). They agreed and said that will be no problem,  just a $10 rush fee. I arrived to be told this was not true and they would not help me. This place was out of the way but had great reviews so I thought they would honor what they had said on the phone. It's too bad that they over-promised and lost my business forever.

resp.text: Sorry we could not do rush order at the moment you came in. We told you as we do all customers that we do rush orders when it is available.  1pm on Saturday afternoon is too late to get a rush monogram before close of business that day.  It was not possible to do today.  I'm sorry you feel that you were wronged.  We have very good customer service and try to go out of our way for every monogram and customer.  You left in such a hurry,  you didn't give us a chance to even try to help you.

name: Mikayla Perkins
text:
DO NOT TAKE YOUR RING TO GET RESIZED HERE.
I took my ring to be resized on July 24th and I was told that it would be ready by August 4rd. All I brought in was a simple wedding band. It is now August 17th and every time we call and ask about it they give us a date that they guarantee it will be done and then it isn’t. My wedding is this Saturday August 21st and if I would have known this was going to be this big of an issue I would have taken it to a local jeweler. I’ve had much more detailed rings done in 3 days and they have taken almost a month to complete this ring. They did not tell me when I took it in that they ship it somewhere else to get resized other wise I wouldn’t of let them because it is my grandmothers wedding band and I don’t trust it being shipped because things can happen. I am furious. DO NOT SHOP HERE!

I wasn't happy but now have my ring back so be prepared for it to take longer than they say

name: Grace Lane
text:
DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THEM. They do not care about their customers and obviously don't care about their ratings. My husband bought me a ring that needed sized. Was told i would have it back in 2 wks. It turned into 4wks. I got the ring back, my brand new ring, scratched up and the engravings were so messed up you couldn't read it. I was NOT happy. Know what they said? We will send it out again to get fixed, it'll take 4wks. I know it'll turn into 6wks if not longer, if they don't lose my ring or mess it up once again. No compensation on my end for their screw up either.
Think that's all they did? Nope. Paid a large payment down. It wasn't showing on the account that it was paid at all...even though they took the money from my account. Over a week later and everyone at the store is rude. Anyone in the phone is rude. Well, can you give us your card number? Well, you have that already because you took the money from my account. What's your banks number? Are you kidding me? Been on the phone 5 times and at the store 3 times...still isn't fixed. They are trying to pocket $500 without letting it reflect on my account and that will not happen with me.

Trust me...do not ever even walk into this place

The lady on the phone was extremely helpful in helping me order them. I suggest to order on the phone or in person. Highly recommended.

name: Horace & Erica Nix
text: I ordered a casket spray. It was beautiful and fresh. Very professional!!!

name: Nancy Linebaugh
text:
Such nice people to talk to! I was ordering roses from out of state and Jan was extremely helpful and very kind!! Gave her all the info she needed, since my daughter and husband were picking them up on Friday, June 28th. They called to remind me and they called my husband (since he was in Alabama) to remind him as well that the roses were ready! They were for his Mom's funeral.
Well, since it was pouring rain on Friday June 28th, in Alabama,  they did not have the service.
Reminded my husband to water the roses! Finally, on Tuesday 7/2/19, they had the service and the roses were still fresh and beautiful!! It would not have been the same without the beautiful red and white roses!
Thank you everyone at Leroy's Florist for being so kind and making 2 beautiful rose bouquets that lasted 4 days and still looked vibrant and fresh!
Sincerely greatful,
Nancy T. Linebaugh

name: Daniel Payton

name: Frances Dauster CPDT
text:
TERRIBLE What I asked for was a birthday bouquet, no vase, yellow flowers, don't care what kind of flowers, for $40.00.
What I got: a small sprig of flowers, with crushed lilies, roses with dings, the wrapping tissue wasn't even completely put together (had unraveled by the time I got in the car), loose ribbon. and they charged me $44.00.  I asked for a $40.00 item. $40.00 was my budget, not 44.
I was a Winn Dixie around the corner just minutes before and saw flowers there for under $15.00 with better quality but they didn't have something what I wanted, so I went with this florist (I'd been there before with a friend, so I felt I would get something nice).
I never gave this sorry excuse for a $40.00 bouquet to the birthday recipient, I was ashamed to! Normally florists put their stickers on bouquets etc. - there was no such on this thing, and no wonder - I'd be ashamed to pass these out to the public, too! I kept it to show my referring friend this disaster. I took pictures when I got home. My friend was shocked, and she won't be coming back, either.
Why did I pay and walk out of there with this travesty? I have no idea. I was so stunned I was speechless and then went through the paces.

text: Ordered and arrangement for same day delivery. Never delivered. Called and was told they cancelled order. Why wouldn't you bother calling? Said they sent an email. NEVER AGAIN

name: Jason Shepard
text: Awesome staff and wonderful flower arrangements.

name: Haley Gossett
text: I used them for my wedding. I hired them 8 months before my wedding.  We had agreed on the colors of the flowers & possible substitutions the week prior to go with the theme of our wedding. When it came wedding day, our delivery was made three hours too late, the colors didn’t coordinated with what we discussed, arrangements weren’t made as discussed even with pictures that were emailed to them of what I wanted. We were missing boutonnières & my bridal arrangement ended up only being 2 flowers bigger than the bridesmaids ($120 difference ) The excuse was “it’s not our fault you got married on this weekend” word for word in a text I received from them. Very poor customer service & they will not take responsibility for their slip up.

name: Stacey Williams
text: I’m sad that I can’t post pictures of what I ordered and what I received. I was super disappointed.

name: Phillip
text: Ordered flowers to be delivered to the funeral home on a Friday. The arrangement never made it. Then I received a notification hours after the funeral on Saturday stating that the flowers had been delivered. I attempted to contact the florist by phone but could never get through.

name: Rickesha Banks
text: This company has lost all values, morals and respect for its customers. I ordered a fruit basket that looked amazing,had a variety of fruits and well priced. Upon delivery I quickly realized I had been given the incorrect fruit basket.I quickly called House of Flowers to inform them of the mishap which was quickly retired to a text message to what I assumed would be to rectify my problem .I then again explained my concerns; which then an employee of this company informed me for better lack of words the photos are misleading,and basically depends on what's in stock when orders are being crafted .You will get what's given.I am very sorry I had to experience this type of customer service during the pandemic. This matter has not been resolved and I have been trying to upload our text conversations but unavailable.

resp.text: Our website states that we are allowed to make substitutions depending on availability of product as does all other websites.  The basket online was more expensive than what you ordered therefore yes there will be a difference in what you saw versus what was received.

name: Dianne
text: The arrangement of roses with the cupcake candles were gorgeous! My mother loved them! Thank you so much!! You really did an excellent job!

resp.text: Thank you so much.  It was our pleasure.

name: Tina Anderson
text: Great people to make arrangements with. I recommend them to anyone!

name: Stephanie Smith
text: I am so very disappointed in my experience with Valentine's Day flowers from here. Ordered a small bouquet to be delivered to my daughter at her work. Well it cost me $60.00. At 3:00 on Valentine's Day, she had still not gotten her flowers. I kept calling to check but phone was off the hook. I then left my job to go check on the order. When I got there they were very rude about the fact that I was there looking for the arrangement,  which was by the way on the floor at the front door with some of the flowers broken from being walked past, I assume as much. The lady did say they were trying to deliver as fast as possible, but you DONT deliver broken flowers. I took them with me and gave them to my daughter. Needless to say that will be the last time I use this florist.

resp.text: On any major holiday a specific time of delivery cannot be guaranteed.  orders are filled according to the order they are received.

name: Tina Riddlesprigger
text: I placed an online order for sympathy flowers. The flowers were never delivered. Four days after placing the order, and still no flowers, I had to send an email to have my money refunded. Very Bad Business

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  All orders placed on line are sent through FlowerShop network and all refunds they have to handle as well.

text: I always receive a warm welcome from the Jared team members. My jewelry consultant Jessica is always engaging, thoughtful and ensures that I have a positive experience.

name: Willie Rhodes
text: From the bottom of my ❤️ I want to give a HUGE!!!! Thumbs up and Hugs to Thomas Blais and the entire staff at Jared’s. When I tell you Thomas Blais had my wife smiling through her mask 😷 I was sold. Now I truly understand why he went to Jared. Thanks 🙏 again for all your help.

name: Robin Michelle Young
text: I just have to say what an amazing experience.  Thank you so much Trixie and Genevieve for taking time and paying attention to the little things.  I was a bit upset to find that the original ring I had ordered for my husband was not in stock in his size, resizing was not an option due to it being an online purchase.  These amazing ladies calmed me right down and showed me some gorgeous rings, turned a stressful situation into a very happy one.  Little did I know that I would fall in love with the rings that Genevieve showed me.  She has an artists eye for detail.  I described my husband and myself to her and she worked Magix by creating the perfect combination of rings for us.  I couldn't be happier and they are so much more beautiful than my original choices.  Trixie, your customer service was impeccable.  I can't thank you enough.  The two of you created an amazing dynamic that made sorting out an issue into a wonderful memory.  Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!

name: Patty Robertson
text: Overall, my husband and I have had a pleasant experience with the staff at Jareds. They have beautiful jewelry. The ladies that work in sales are very pleasant, nice, and helpful. They always are very friendly toward us and really pay attention to what we are looking for when making important purchases. We have always had a great experience when purchasing jewelry from Jareds.

name: Lisa Miller
text: Robin and Kayla were so nice and helpful . They are both true Assets to Jared's

name: Kendell Lewis
text: Thank you to Trixie for making my current wedding ring what I envisioned. She helped me locate two bands that would serve as a guard to my engagement ring that was purchased several years ago. She found exactly what I wanted within my budget and arranged for them to be made into the ring as one piece. The whole process was super easy and the finish product is completely amazing.

name: Tim Richardson
text: Fixed my wife's watch and cleaned her jewelry while we waited.  Also made 2 other purchases while we were there.  Very helpful and friendly.

name: Tyler Thomas
text: The staff here are amazing

name: Erica Hughes
text: I just received my ring from the third time it has had to be repaired (each time was due to an error on their side) and the wedding band is not straight and both rings were not sized correctly. I haven’t had the opportunity to wear my ring since March due to covid and not having a repair tech and then being super backed up... and I understand all of that.. I’m patient. But what I can’t understand is how they can drop the ball so much on something that means so much to me. Would not recommend.

text: Liz is the best. She went above and beyond.  Ask for her.

name: Erika
text: Been waiting for months to do this review. Back in July or August I walked into Jared with my old wedding ring guard from my first marriage with hopes of designing something special for my daughter. Henry Darnell was wonderful in helping me design the best look with the diamonds I had in the ring. Today I was able to finally give the gift to my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loved it!!! Thank you Henry and all who helped at Jared for such a wonderful experience.

text: We really enjoy coming inand purchasing jewelry here. It is always a top notch service. Prompt, friendly, and courteous. We rely on the knowledge of our sales people and we enjoy working with each and everyone in our selection of our favorite pieces. Thanks Jared!

text: They are EXTREMELY pushy about getting their warranty plans, to the point that the salesman lied to me about what was covered (I had to look it up on Jared's website to find out), and that they added the warranty to our purchase without telling me (after we declined it) so I had to go back and get a refund.

text: My now fiancé worked with Elizabeth to get my ring ordered (vera wang wedding set in size 7) and he also bought his wedding band that they altered to fit him (size 15) with no issues. All the ladies were amazing and nice for us. Would most definitely use them again!

name: Amazing Renee
text: I have shopped for all my Jewelery needs and wants for over 20 years at Jared’s. I have always gotten the 5 star treatment whether it was a huge purchase or a simple repair. Yes, SHE takes him to Jared!!!!!!!!!!!!♥️♥️♥️♥️

name: J Wells
text: Very helpful staff! Jessica Langley was my associate and she went above and beyond to meet my expectations!

name: Olive Dykes
text: It sus so grate

name: Samantha Ferguson
text: My boyfriend and I had a fantastic experience at the Jared Mobile location. Henry greeted us right at the door, worked with our budget, and created the most beautiful ring for us. Customer service was amazing. I’d recommend this location and the associate Henry Darnell to anyone. Can’t say enough how truly great the experience was :).

name: Renee Broomfield
text: I drove from Mississippi to purchase a item that was being held for me, but the sales people were not able to find it. Very disappointed. Complete waste of time and gas. The sale person seemed unconcerned and uncaring. I did telephone the manager but have yet to receive any feedback.

name: Allyson
text: Horrible experience! My brother ordered a custom wedding band and they sent the wrong one! He asked about ordering a new one and was told it wouldn’t be here until October (wedding is in September). When a refund was requested, they were extremely rude and unprofessional

name: Amanda Wiley
text: I am fairly new to the Jared family! My now husband bought my engagement ring from Jared and we just couldn't help falling in love with the wonderful staff! Thank you again Trixie and Robin we will always be grateful for the long hours you have given us to ensure that we were truly happy with every piece we receive.

name: katherine bagley
text: Did a wonderful job set the my 5 ct aquamarine into a ring. And when I took it in to get it cleaned they noticed it was loose and tightened it up.  The staff is friendly and very helpful

name: Carol Hunt
text: I purchased a ring, Pandora bracelet and charms and couldn't have been happier with the quality of the jewelry or with the staff. Jessica and Elizabeth were helpful, professional and even though I wasn't planning on purchasing at the time they found things I couldn't resist. They took time to actually talk to me to see what I might like. In the day and age of little to no customer service it was a pleasure to go to a store that is focused on it. I will definitely return to this Jared's for all my jewelry needs.

name: Joy Salas
text: The mobile store has amazing people who are very attentive to their customers. My husband and I have been using Jared’s for our main jewelers for years. The general manager here as well as all of the consultants know their customers by name and are always pleasant. Looking for beautiful and affordable jewelry that you know is real this is the place to go!

name: Pamela Biggs
text: I love this store!  The people are so friendly and take time to show you items. I have made 2 purchases there so far and will be back. Definitely go there if you are looking for jewelry!

name: William Martin
text: This is the best jewelry store I have been to in my twenty years of fine jewelry shopping. I was treated as if I was shopping without a budget. There was no rushing or hurrying. They took their time to show me pieces and made sure that I was happy with my selection. I was so happy with the service I took in my wife’s ring she was left by her mom to have it repaired and resized. It was fixed and looks brand new! The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly! This is the only place I will shop for jewelry from now on!

name: Brandi Robinson
text:
My husband and I went to Jarrods’s in Mobile Thursday to buy our granddaughter a pair of earrings for her birthday. The party was on Sunday. Jessica, our sales person, said we don’t have them in this store but let me call another and see if they have them. They did!!! Great!!!! She said they will be overnighted to Mobile store . Plenty of time to get them for the birthday party. Called Friday, did not come in. That’s fine, a truck comes in Saturday and Sunday. We call Saturday. Still hasn’t come in. I call back and ask them to track them. Jessica says it’s not on ‘her’ it’s on the other store that was overnighting them. What?!? I ask her to please follow up and ca them. Ask them what’s going on, have they been sent, can they track them ...
Jessica never bothered calling back.
Poor little grand baby did not get her earrings for her birthday. Thanks a lot Jessica !!!! For not doing your job.

name: Kristin McCarron
text: The location is awesome! Customer service is the best! They were so willing to go out of the way to help me find exactly what I was looking for! I will be sure to shop here for every occasion!

name: Tyler Thomas
text: HANDS DOWN the best customer service! My husband and I went in to look for new wedding bands, and from the moment we stepped foot in the door we were greeted with warm welcomes by the staff. Trixie, Jessica, and Henry to be specific. These employees know what they are doing and know how to make a customer feel comfortable going through such a large purchase. I highly recommend this location and the above mentioned employees.

name: Bethany Heathcock
text: The employees were so nice and very willing to help. They dont discriminate either because i walk inside in very simple clothes. They are very helpful.

name: Shey Thorn
text: This was the absolute best experience in Jewlery shopping in my life. We started off coming in on Monday, when we were greeted by the whole staff and had our sale taken over by Henry. Henry was extremely kind and listened to everything we wanted, we viewed some stunning Men's rings, but decided to sleep on the purchase decision and make our minds up the next day. We came back in today, Tuesday, and we were greeted by Jessica, once again extremely kind and helpful, who helped us complete our sale. Throughout our stress free, easy process we were offered water by the GM, Trixie. She chatted with us about her amazing jewelry endeavors and made us feel right at home as we were completing our purchase. We are still in shock at the OUT OF THIS WORLD INCREDIBLE service we received. We can't wait to continue shopping with Jared, and we look forward to the amazing new selection of items coming within the next months!! Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

name: Michael Vanden Heuvel
text: I've never been to any jewelry store in my life. I wanted to propose to my girlfriend, now fiance, and I knew the ring had to be spectacular. I stopped here on a whim for the sake of comparing prices to the other stores in the area. To be frank, I never saw those other stores. After a single visit at this location I was won over by their customer service, products, and in-store repair shop. As soon as I walked in the door I was greeted by Elizabeth Herboso. She was incredibly helpful and really knew her stuff. She helped me every step of the way and made the entire process from beginning to end very smooth, easing my mind any time I became unsure. But most of all she was very friendly and genuinely enthusiastic about getting the exact right ring for me and my bride-to-be. I couldn't have asked for a better first experience and I will most definitely be returning for future purchases.

name: Joe LeNoir
text: I purchased a Tag Heuer F1 watch for my birthday present to myself. The lady who helped me with my purchase was fantastic. Her name was Elizabeth I believe. I got it home and ended up being unhappy with the watch. I googled their return policy and read one after another terrible reviews about their sales persons attitude about returns. So, naturally I expected to have a hard time. Once I got there, I spoke with Karen, the manager very briefly about my issues with the watch. She apologized several times and immediately refunded my money. The process took less than 10 minutes. All in all I was/am very very satisfied with Elizabeth/Karen/Jared! They are great and I highly recommend them. Ill definitely be back to purchase other pieces of jewelry.

name: Robert Turner
text: The protocol to getting the store is ridiculous and the lady working in the store was rude.

name: Brittany Vickers
text: Walked in wanting to upgrade my diamond in my engagement ring. Was immediately greeted and that was it. There 20 min and not helped. Walked out and will never return.

name: William Schenher
text: Kayla helped me and was awsome. She got me in and out fast. Great service. Great salesperson!

name: Sheila Haviland
text: My fiance and I met with Jessica. I told her what I was looking for and she picked out several setting for me.  Found the one I loved and we left keeping that ring in mind.  Visited 2 other jewelers only to return to Jareds. I did change my mind and decided on a cushion cut over a round diamond. She picked out  an almost flawless stone. The setting was white gold and we wanted platinum so they have to make a new setting and the gallery was to small for the stone so they will make the gallery to fit the stone. Awesone service, knowledgeable staff, friendly while being professional, treated us like family. Can't wait to see the end product , another 5-6 weeks. My fiance was pleased with the service  and their attention to details, and that says alot . I have since ordered his platinun wedding band waiting for it to arrive next week

name: WB Spencer
text: Bought my son a Tag Heuer watch for his 16th birthday.  Very helpful staff and helped me pick out the right one for our budget.  I had never shopped a "chain" jewelry store before and was pleasantly surprised.  Will definitely go back here for any future watch or jewelry purchases!

name: Derek Scarbrough
text: Without a doubt the Manager and the staff are the nicest and most helpful you can find. Have bought several items from the mobile store and will continue to do all of my jewelry shopping there.

name: JaCoiya Hall
text: The staff here is unbelievable!  They have become like family .. Everyone is very knowledgeable and sooo inviting .. I find myself in there for at least an hour after getting my jewelry cleaned just chit chatting. .You have to visit this store!!

name: Crystal Hinds
text: WARNING: DO NOT PURCHASE FROM HERE! My husband bought me a necklace we decided to return. He paid cash. The manager informed him they do not have enough of cash in the store (only $420) and they could mail us a check that would take 10 days to receive or they would call us once they have enough of cash onsite. This seems completely inconceivable and absolutely ridiculous to me that a nationwide store could legally operate like this. I’ve never in my life. And we will never, ever shop there again.

name: Christin Lisenby
text: I was shocked to find this location rated a 1 star! Thomas and his team have treated me like family since my first visit in December 2016! They have gone above and beyond and I enjoy doing business with people who put the customer first and are so professional! I rarely leave reviews, but felt the need when seeing one persons negative experience, causing so much damage to this business.... Great job guys! I'm a BIG FAN!!!  Christin

name: Hanna Love
text: The Manager Trixie has a very unpleasant attitude towards her co-worker. I seen her completely ignore a girl in a lab coat because she was doing something on the computer. I seen the girl talking to her and she didn’t even acknowledge her. How can you manage a team and treat them like that. I will not be coming back here. Sorry attitude I did not like. The girl was very kind to her. I had Henry help me with my Ever Us ring and I will recommend friends to see him. I also seen employees standing around talking loud so inapproiate.

name: Kia Sheridan
text: I had an absolutely wonderful experience! Emma the salesperson was an absolute doll!

name: The Chambers
text: Always a pleasure doing business their longtime customer

name: Cameron Blake
text: My boyfriend bought me a pair of earrings ($620)which I couldn't have at the time due to circumstances.  So a full refund sounds simple right? wrong. Upon visiting the location  throughout the day only to still be told that they (Jared) didn't have enough cash which sounds silly actually. While being within our 30 day period. This location is very bad as far as customer satisfaction. Both the Black woman and old slim Caucasian woman should seek for another occupation. I was told that night there's another Jared's in Pensacola so I asked well did you call that store to see if they had the amount of cash? basically she informed me that she doesn't have common sense. You wouldn't want to do business with someone who is incompetent would you?

name: Courtney Pemberton
text: Terrible experience. They did not deliver what they had promised, but rather a ring that had bad welds and a crooked diamond. And returning it was a nightmare, they did not refund all the money until we came back a second time. More like a galleria of incompetency.

name: John Wilson
text:
The store is very clean the people that I have dealt with inside are extremely nice and professional however their customer service department is a complete pile of crap. I have a credit card through their Genesis Bank. I was made to put a deposit down when I bought something I was also told that every time I buy something I have to put a deposit down. When I call Genesis they told me that even if I have an available credit limit they run and check your credit every time you purchase something and if they feel like not approving it for whatever reason they will not approve it even though you have available credit on your card they've already given you. I was not happy with that so I called Jared customer service and what I was basically told was we do not control the credit cards are banks policy is our bank's policy if you have a problem with it call them..
I'm 55 years old I think credit cards from different jewelry companies different clothing stores and all other places. When you give me a credit card I expected to be a credit card you don't walk into JCPenney's buy $500 worth of clothes and have to give them $60 in advance you swipe your card you sign your paper and you leave.. what Jared is doing is not giving customers credit cards there financing the jewelry like you with your car or your house but they don't tell you that upfront.. so even though the people and the three different Jared stores that I've been to have been very professional and very nice because of your business practices you guys suck. I will pay the balance off of my card cut it up and never do business with you again..

name: Kim Newman
text: My husband bought me a $2,500 cross necklace as a gift.  The chain was too short, he went back to swap it for a longer chain.  They wanted to give him a $15 credit for the chain and sell him a $150 chain. Really???  So your chains are only worth $15 and you sell them for $150?!!  Crooks! Take my advice NEVER shop at Jared!

name: Kailey Morgan
text: That's really make miracles happen here I love it

name: Jurone Daniels
text: Very friendly staff

name: Bama P
text: Horrible. Bought a ring and had to bring it in constantly for repairs. Whoever works on the jewelry must have gotten their certification from bishop state or something. Yea

name: Laporcha Richardson
text: The whole staff have very nasty attitudes, always have something to say when returning an item with receipt, will never shop here again, i would rather go to Florida.

name: Robert Chavers
text: Busy

name: Mark Brewton
text: Felt pressured by sales staff

name: Rachel Stanislas
text: Crown Trophy never disappoints. Great customer service and great products make this my go to for anything trophy related.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words.  We love our customers and do whatever we can to meet their needs.  Thank you again.

name: Michael Hitt
text: Exceptional customer service! Completed a job for me much faster than anticipated. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you.  We appreciate your review.

name: Bobby DeHaye
text: Great people to work  with! Our baseball team won the State Championships and we needed trophies for our players and coaches within a short period of time. Crown Trophy did what they promised and had our trophies completed on time! Thank you!

resp.text: It was our pleasure, and congratulations again to you and your team.

name: Melissa Walker
text: Gus and his staff go above and beyond when it comes to customer service. I wasn't sure of the exact product my government customer needed, but Gus gave me excellent guidance. And the turnaround time was amazing! I needed a major change, and it was taken care of immediately, with no additional cost. Their prices are ridiculously affordable, too. I will definitely use Crown Trophy again and recommend them to anyone needing trophies, plaques, awards, etc!

name: Crystal Alexander
text: I needed trophies on the spur of the moment..the owner graciously and very kindhearted helped me choose and engrave each trophy without any prejudice.   He simply said give me about an hour....and he was true to his words.  AWESOME COMPANY!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Terrie Littrell
text: We were in a bind and Gus came through for us. He knows his trophies and medals!  Will be using them regularly moving forward.  Very happy!

name: Ricardo Rivera
text: Very Professional, responsive and reasonably priced.  They turned around an engraving request in 10 minutes.  They have won over my loyalty.

name: Daniel Shrider
text: Staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. And the prices are very reasonable.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Doug Swafford
text: Best trophy shop around.  Period.

name: Chris Martin
text: Prices very reasonable and jobs completed in a timely manner!!!

name: Nate Wilcox
text: Always helpful and able to make deadlines.

name: Mark Hall
text: Gus helped me pick out the trophies, gave me the total and had them ready when he said he would, thats all a person can ask.

name: Louis Dixon
text: Great service. We we're in and out and got exactly what we went for

name: William Denton
text:
I hunted for diamond stud earrings for my wife for our anniversary at many stores for several weeks.. Dealt with the manager and she was most helpful. She found me the perfect pair with the 4 C's I was looking for. She was understanding of what I was looking for and very courteous.  Most of all, she was very professional and helpful with my purchase.

I will always return to Kay's for the quality service I received.

name: B Schjott
text: My daughter ordered a heart beat necklace and ring on May 3rd, as of yesterday June 26th I received the necklace but no ring. The clasp on the necklace is broken and I can’t get any one to answer the phone at the local office.

name: Rayshundra Davis
text: Great Customer Service.  Friendly staff and willing to help anyone that comes in. They take the time to get to know you and what your needs or desires are. Whenever I've encountered an issue, they took the time to try to solve the problem.  I always feel valued when I'm there.

name: Mel Mom of 5
text: Love this place! Always get a nice friendly SMILE even when I'm just looking and wishing

name: Kimberly Nelson
text: Sent wedding ring in for cleaning, check prongs in setting and replace lost side diamond.  My ring came back on time, and it was beautiful and immaculate.  Service was great and personnel very helpful.  My Father had his watch repaired here, and he received great service also.

name: Kendall Duke
text: Was in recently and bought some earrings. Hannah is who helped us and she was very nice and knowledgeable. We had a great experience.

name: Nikki Hudson
text: I have purchased jewelry and had repairs from this location. The service was excellent. I would definitely recommend this location to anyone. Never had any problems!!

name: D Johnson
text: One of the best salesman ever, he took his time with me, he showed me exactly what I wanted to see, & answered all my questions.

name: Christina Denton
text: High quality jewelry with reasonable prices.  Friendly staff. Manager extremely helpful and patient.

name: Kaitlyn Waltman
text: My engagement ring was supposed to be sent to Virginia by a week ago, in a 6 prong setting. They haven't even started on it and it's 2 weeks later. I won't see my boyfriend again till the wedding. They ordered a 5 prong setting in white gold instead of yellow gold. They promised us again it'd be here by the 9th, we contacted them again and they said the repair shop still hasn't even gotten the part or promised to ship it. We just want the ring back. We don't even want the ring fixed by them. Kay's is awful! Do not trust them!

name: Sherri Beck
text: They sales rep was absolutely remarkable they make you feel like they have known forever and work with you with a smile even if you are undecided and take awhile to make your own choices they do not rush you or make you feel as though you are taking up their time and they work with you till you find that perfect ring that says we will lol thank you Kay Airport Blvd Bell Air Mall I love my Wedding set your staff is the best oh and it doesn't matter what your budget amount is you will leave there with what you came for and in your price range and very satisfied thanks again

name: Hope Fulton
text: I got the ring and it immediately had to be sent in for three weeks to be sized. It was sent back to me with one of the stones chipped, and then a different stone fell out of it a few weeks later. I took it in to have both stones replaced. It was gone for three weeks and was sent back to me with two stones chipped. They had to damage it out and give me a new one which was sent out for three weeks to be sized. I went to pick it up on the 'promise date' and at first they told me they lost it, but then they said it hadn't even been shipped out from their store to be sized until the day after I was supposed to pick it up. Throughout all of this Debbie has been extremely rude when I go in to the store. This whole experience has been a nightmare and I will never shop with Kay again.

name: Robert Stout
text: Sami  gives first class service

name: Heather Bankester
text:
I sent my ring off to get sized. They said it would take 10 days and would be due back April 23. I called that morning and they proceed to tell me they do not get shipments on the weekends, but it should be here Monday. So I called again Monday morning and they told me the sizing company was running behind and it wouldn't be here until Wednesday!
Now, I'm due to leave out of town for 10 days and I will not have my engagement ring! I am very disappointed.

name: Lee Will
text: Kay Jewelers is the best😊👍

name: Charles Moseley
text: Great service!  People are friendly.  Ms. Peavey, thank you.

name: Edward Moseley
text: Found a citizen blue angels watch they wanted 700 for on Amazon for 386 way to high mark up on product

name: Trayce Franklin
text: The sales rep was very polite and profesional

name: San Richards

name: GROWN MAN BUSINESS

name: Annie Smith

name: sami shakir
text: Great service

name: Margie Francis
text: Excellent

name: Sherry Campbell
text: Such a cute gift shop.  I love the local pottery and local artist items.  Very unique gift shop.

name: Bart Davis
text: Fiddledee D is an awesome little gift shop located in beautiful downtown Tuscumbia, AL and all of there gifts are made locally or is crafted by local people. You really never know what will spark your eye but it's set up so awesome. The ladies that run it are very friendly and so helpful without over stepping so you can enjoy shopping or looking at all the great stuff. You should expect a couple hours because there is just so much history and need things you can't walk by without stopping. Shop Fiddledee Dee for great gift ideas and support local businesses with local products.

name: William Foster
text: Perfect downtown setting for neat gifts. Lots of local options

name: Neva Leigh
text:
A very unique gift shop.  There are so many local talented people with their handmade items and more.
Love this place!!!

name: Becky Fuller
text: A great place to shop ! Everyone so friendly and helpful. The cutes shop ever with great handmade items and paintings!

name: debbie wilschke
text: I love this little shop the staff is great too it's worth the trip from Florence !!

name: Brylee Oliver
text: Love the Store!

name: Chantale High
text: LOVELY EVERYTHING!  Hand made and Home grown awesome gifts and great atmosphere!

name: Summer Smith
text: I absolutely LOVE this store. I always leave with something. They have the best selection for nerdy people like me, Harry Potter, Game of Thrones, marvel, DC, Disney, ETC. they have a little of everything, the things I listed are just the things I’m interested in. They have way more that just that’ I go here at least once every 2 weeks to look at the new merchandise and chat with the VERY friendly staff.

name: Anna Egner
text: I love this store! They have so much awesome fandom merchandise and the employees are always so nice and helpful. I always have a great experience in this store.

name: Victoria Mystic

name: Ivy Sanderson
text: Great selection of different fandoms and service was excellent! Loved the wall of keychains!!

name: Michelle Harris
text: I will never shop at this store again.

name: Amy Carnes
text: Love this store, but it's been a year since I've been here and not much has changed.

name: Nichole Bentley
text: Really cute store. They have a little of everything. Clothes, gifts, decor, gag gifts, etc. This was my favorite store at the Warf. Some items are a little pricey but overall the prices weren't bad.

name: Adam York
text: Staff actually refused my service due to a permanent disability. I cannot wear a mask due to danger lungs and respiratory issues. Even after explaining this to them and showing them that the mandate exempts disabled persons, they still insisted that I leave their store immediately. My family all had their masks on and we were the only customers in the store. A little embarrassing and absolutely shameful. No excuse.

name: Helen Shivers
text: I love Bungalows at the Wharf, it has the greatest inventory of wonderful gifts, clothes, cards and on and on.  You could spend hours looking and shopping in this store. The sales associates are pleasant and helpful but not pushy.  Love it!!

resp.text: <3 Thank you !!

name: jeremy lamb
text: We walked in and they greeted us. Then it went downhill. A few associates were sitting in the back chatting, not acknowledging anybody else. We were looking at jewelry that had unlocked boxes. After a good 45 minutes, someone finally asked us if we needed help but seemed more concerned with making sure the jewelry boxes got locked than actually helping us. Would not recommend.

name: Donna Kelley
text: Beautiful store. You have to circle it twice to see everything.

name: Mac Temoteo
text: Love the variety of Simply Southern shirts, great place for unique gifts and upscale clothing, jewelry, and decor.  Sweetest employees!!!

name: Ann McFadden

name: DR Jeffery Lehman

resp.text: Thank you Theresa! We appreciate your patronage.

name: Mary Jane Rose
text: The owners are the sweetest! I told them the colors I was looking for and before I knew it I was wanting to buy just about the whole store!! I’m so excited for my new clothes and would recommend this store to anyone looking for clothes for a nice night out, or just a cute casual look. Definitely one of my new go-to’s!!!

name: Summer Knight
text: I add an outfit or two every season. Classic collectible pieces that’s an investment in your closet. Very good salespeople. They seem to love what they do and l love the special attention having a personal shopper helping me. Good vibes.

resp.text: Thank you, Heather! We love having wonderful customers like you, too!

name: Kelly Ratcliff
text: Great service!  You can't ask for better customer service!  The staff are ALWAYS willing to help you with whatever your needs are!

resp.text: Thank you, Kelly!

name: Josh Smitherins
text: Some employees are nice, the majority of them are snooty; like rude kind of snooty.  My fiance and I registered here for our wedding and regret doing so.  Reasons for this include the attitudes of employees and the fact that Northcutt's does not put things on sale when the manufacturer has things on sale.  There are only a few other stores in Dothan to register for china, but I encourage other people to explore those options before going to Northcutt's.

resp.text: I am sorry your experience was not positive. We value our customers and we try to provide a positive attitude. We will look into your complaint.

name: Kitty Cobb
text: I have been using this pharmacy for years. Everyone that works there is kind and professional. I love Northcutt's.

resp.text: And we love you, Kitty!

name: Kimberly Kraselsky

resp.text: It’s still such a pleasure, Kimberly!

text: Theres way alot of pretty things to choose from here.  Always great inventory. Store z always changing.
