They were very helpful and made my entire visit, from the time I walked into the store through the selection and purchase process, and right on through the moment I walked out the door!  The very best shopping experience I've had in quite some time!!!!!

name: Anwar Price
text: Jeremiah was great to work with.  He helped me tremendously. So kind and understanding when I couldn't make up my mind. I actually went back days later and bought another pair because of the great experience.  A-1

name: Braxton Johnson
text: Jeremiah is the best. Great service.  Great deals.

name: Jay Malinowski
text: Great customer service!  It's hard to find glass lens anymore.  Associate asked what i was looking for right when i walked in. Brought me to the assorments that I asked for. Made my decision and out of the store in no time with the exact pair  I was in need of.  Definitely buying from there again.

name: Lamar Jackson
text: They said hello. One of the employees decided to try sunglasses on while I was looking at the same group. In my way. Never asked to help me in any way. I pointed out a pair that I liked that was untagged. Asked for the price. She checked the price. Gave it to me. That's when they lost interest in me again. Might've made a purchase had I been provided some options

name: Mehul Jobi
text: Fantastic customer service

name: Louis Edwards
text: Beautiful collection of glasses and great Sales people.

name: Tom Solo
text: Walked in to ask about replacement lenses for a pair of Oakley's and was told I would have to order from Oakley directly. If the employees spent less time on facebook perhaps they'd look at their own store's website and see that Sunglass Hut carries replacement lenses.

name: Alabama Jenny
text: I love this shop. Super convenient in Hoover. Excellent selection of clothing all new, up-to-date fashion. Beautiful accessories /jewelry,  high end shoes, sandals and boots. I can’t go to the store and leave empty-handed. Staff and owner extremely courteous and friendly. Can’t wait to go back!

name: Erica Jackson
text: So me and my mom visited this boutique on yesterday, the products were beautiful but the customer service was horrible!! We both get our hair done at the salon few doors down , so we decided to go in and browse until our appointment time. My mom is in a wheelchair, so I opened the for us both and went in. Two young ladies who worked at the register not once acknowledged us. No hello , may we help you, not even a hand wave.. even if you thought we weren’t going to purchase anything, common curiosity should’ve kicked in!! They both set at the register and talked to each other and looked at they’re phones!! I work in a public environment also , you’re supposed to always greet your customers!!  Want be back !! Lost a customer!!!

name: Lori Sissa
text: They do not stand by their word.  I was told they would correct a mistake they made but they put me off and never did.  They volunteered to correct but then dropped the ball.   No one knows what they are doing.    Very rude and unhelpful.   Will not shop there again!

name: Veronica Burke
text: Close are super cute and recently price. Young girl working was very nice and helpful.

name: Emily Pace
text: So disappointed. The store is super cute, but the owner has awful customer service. She does not care one bit about her customers. I hate to not be able to support a small business. When I went to Instagram to let them know my concerns, instead of anyone reaching out, the Owner deleted my comment. I was beyond shocked.

name: Cheyenne Sanchez
text: Everything about this place is adorable.. the staff, clothes, decor, etc! So many options with great prices and amazing customer service!

name: Marissa Belcher
text: I am a shopaholic so when this boutique moved in right next to my work I about died! Everything in the store is absolutely stunning and I think almost all of it is for sale! They are constantly getting in new merchandise and cute unique pieces too not the same ole same ole from Soca or Fabrik! Now to mention the workers! Meaghan is absolutely amazing and funny! She is always helpful, never judges me, and never hesitated to take the time out of her busy schedule to help me pick out matching items! Katie is so sweet and kind and always makes you feel wanted in the store. She Always greets me when I walk in and is always bubbly and happy! Together these two girls make a ROCKSTAR team and I honestly believe that Market House Boutique would not be the same if they were not there. Thank you girls for making my experience there always a good one!

name: Susan Harris
text: The two female workers were very rude and unhelpful today. They sat in their computer looking at videos and talking about concerts the entire time. Poor customer service.

name: Courtney Grimes
text: For my daughters sweet 16 we spent a few days in Gulf Shores. The only thing she really wanted to make sure she got to do was go in this store. We spent maybe 2.5 hours searchig for our treasures and we just had an amazing experience.  When we walked in the store you could feel the energy. The owner was so kind. He recommended a few items to us . Selenite and black tourmaline. I really appreciated that he took his time to talk to us and educate us. I hope to visit again before the shop goes to online.

name: Kinsley Keeton
text: I went here while I was staying in the area on vacation and was looking for a tigers eye bracelet. I easily found just what I was looking for and even bought another crystal. It had almost every crystal I was interested in I will definitely be visiting again next time I'm in town!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and your support! Be sure to subscribe to our email for the new location announcement. Our last day in our current location will be Aug 29th. 🙏💜 we will also have a new online website launch in October. Thank you again and we hope you enjoy the rest of your time here in Coastal Alabama.

name: Stormy Rainbows
text: Amazing customer service- My twin two year old toddlers were acting 🤪🤪..The amazing gentlemen came over and let them pick some small black tourmaline for them to keep to help calm them! Then we had forgot our debit card and the nice woman at the desk wasn’t bothered at all in my son still acting a mess. Prices were FANTASTIC! They even have a small mining sluice. Will definitely be making this one of my go to crystal shops! Thank y’all so much for your patience and guidance.

name: Kennedy Grace
text: I loved it so much I was only in orange beach for a week and went to coastal zen 3 TIMES. I'm addicted. The staff was really friendly. and the prices are the best I've ever seen. And with them being online now too! they are the only place I'll ever get my spiritual needs.

name: Mariam Smith
text: My sister and I did a sand bucket panning, it was very amusing and we got a nice selection of rocks and shark teeth! Everything was really cute too, I ended up with some cool mushroom stickers myself ☺️

resp.text: Yeah! Thank you for the review, we appreciate you! So glad you two enjoyed the mining ⛏ have a wonderful weekend!

name: Allison Chapman
text: I will visit here every time we go to Gulf Shores or Orange beach!! I will have to shop in their online store until then! It was such a peaceful store. The owner was very courteous and helped us but he didn't hover over us like many shops will. We spent almost an hour shopping and everything was well worth its price! So glad we found this gem on our day trip I will be enjoying my goodies for a long time!

name: Shawn Mitchell
text: This was by far our favorite shop at The Wharf. We got lucky and were there when the owners were in the store. We were looking at the petrified wood and they ended up showing us so many more interesting pieces! They have this store because they love the stones and other items. Everything was reasonably priced and beautiful!

name: Sierota Beth Brackett
text: My experience at A Coastal Zen was fabulous! The owners are warm and welcoming. I felt very much at home as I browsed through their collection of healing crystals, ritual candles & incense, inspirational/motivational art, spiritual & meditation tools, and all sorts of unique trinkets and decorations. The store is filled with interesting products from across the world. There is something here for everyone! The owners even showed me a few of their prized personal possessions which were kept in the back room, making me feel like V.I.P.  The store itself was well kept...which I can only imagine to be a constant struggle considering how many shelves and items must be dusted frequently to maintain the clean environment. Everything sparkles! If you have the chance, ask the owner about the musical vibrations produced by the bronze gong hanging behind the register -- it makes beautiful sounds which fill the space entirely, engulfing it's visitors in a sense of peace and tranquility. This store is just the kind of retail attraction our community needs in this area - Definitely recommend visiting A Coastal Zen as soon as possible!!! Bring more money than you think you will need because you will be surprised how many items will strike your fancy! The owners are well educated in product knowledge and price the pieces very, very reasonably. It's a treasure trove of goodies!!!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for such a glowing review. We love our customers and so look forward to you visiting us again.

name: Ken
text: absolutely amazing the store keepers where very helpful and i got exactly what i needed 5 stares

name: Pansexual doom
text: I went to the warf on a vacation and stumbled apon this place, it is so cute and welcoming, the prices are super reasonable and the family that owns the place is so kind and helpful, if you are LGBTQ+ or wiccan/pagan/spiritual this place is a safe space and offers you things to show your pride or help your spiritual journey!!! I can't stress how much serotonin A Coastal Zen gives me!!!

resp.text: Awe… you made my night 💕🌈♥️ we appreciate the love and You!

name: Free Me
text:
My birthday just got better!

The kids and I came in for a little Crystal mining ⛏ and had a blast learning about different stones and their meanings. I definitely recommend Coastal Zen ! They have great prices and welcoming customer service 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩 don’t let no hater tell you different 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽 That’s on period 🙃

name: Antoinette Hardy
text: I bought my custom made ring from here and I'm totally happy with it. Katherine helped me and she was very patient with me, as I am a very picky. She is very knowledgeable about diamond and will find you a diamond at a reasonable price.

resp.text:
Hi Antoinette

Thank you for a review but I think you may have us mistaken with another company. We do not sell diamond rings nor do we have anyone who works for us named Katherine.

We are a rock/crystal shop
In a orange Beach ❤️

Hope you have a great Holiday Season!

name: Michelle Murr
text: If you are looking for something and you're not sure what, this is THE PLACE FOR YOU!  Went with a friend in search of specific stones and spent a ridiculous amount of time in the store.  Amazing people and amazing products.  I left with bracelets for myself and friends, rocks for same, prayer candles and a great gift for a friend who is a healer.  A beautiful blessing awaits you, don't miss a chance to check this place out!!!!!!

name: Alexandra Co
text: Love this store! Nice ambiance, great selection and the staff is always so helpful, patient and knowledgeable.

name: Melodye Harleen
text: This place is a non-negotiable part of every trip up north for my brother and I. I generally love bookstores, especially intimate and down to earth bookstores with interesting selections. Loved this place even before I knew all the history it held.

name: kxlciii
text: best crystal shop <3

name: Don Cheek
text: Glad that we took the time to visit this store. Me and the wife found stones for us both. It was mind blowing how much information Stan gave us and in the decision that we made in our purchases. Will definitely return.

name: Suerianne Davis
text: The selection and quality in this store are amazing! The personal attention and the knowledge that Stan and his staff provide makes choosing the stones and jewelry and clusters really gratifying.  Moreover, Stan was willing to work with me to sell and mail an order when I could not travel to Alabama.  I look forward to returning when traveling is safe.  Such a wonderful experience to be at A Coastal Zen!

name: Lisa Hannah
text: I love this place!! I found it 3yrs ago on our annual trip to Gulf Shores from Missouri my trip is not complete without shopping here for my yearly supplies. They are so friendly and helpful!! Also they have descriptions and uses with each stone its so amazing!! Thank You!! Will see you again in March!!

name: Peyton Cole
text: Hey I told y’all I was coming back today but I didn’t keep my word I went on home but I really appreciate all the knowledge Stan blessed me and my family with. I also appreciate the sweet deal he gave me! Hopefully me and my family luck and energy will begin to turn around and be positive

resp.text: Thank you, Peyton!  So glad you enjoyed your visit with Stan and hope you come back to see us soon!

name: Kathy Humphres
text: Awesome place with so many cool things and very reasonable prices. I love to go there the owners are so friendly and helpful I could spend hours just checking everything out. If you’re ever in the area you should check them out.

resp.text: Thank you, Kathy!  So glad you enjoyed your visit and hope you come back soon!

name: Debbie Busby
text:
Very neat little shop! Beautiful crystals, stones salt lamps. Bracelets, earrings etc...
I was able to find all of my  souvenirs to take back home with me. While I was there they have this mining  thing for children to kinda of mine for their own shells or crystals‼️ Super Cute. Great Customer Service❤️

name: Glenda Zollicoffer-Harrel
text: I had such a wonderful experience there yesterday. The owner was so nice. I bought so many pieces, but not everything I wanted, she told they had an online store for using later. gave. She also have me some useful information on traveling back this way next time. I will definitely be shopping online with her.

resp.text: Thank you, Glenda!  We so appreciate you taking the time to write us such a glowing review!  Come back soon!

name: Tina Cozart
text: Beautiful store, friendly staff and great prices! 💯🥰✨

name: Susanna Forbes
text: Coastal Zen is wonderful, the staff is always very helpful, everything is crazy affordable and they have everything you need. Stan is very helpful and really knows what he's taking about. I always spend way more than I would want to there, but it's totally worth it ❤️

resp.text: Thank you, Susanna!  We have the best customers and love that you enjoy shopping with us as much as we appreciate you!

name: Brandy McGee
text: I’m a huge crystal hound and I was so excited to find this shop on my vacation here. The girl working was super sweet and very knowledgeable. I overheard her helping some ladies to pick out stones and she really knew her stuff. I found a lot a crystals that I didn’t have in my collection. Most expensive one was $3. I love this place!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy!  We are so glad you found us and hope you make a repeat visit to our area soon!

name: PαԵԵí Aղժҽɾsօղ
text: Just from the reviews and photos of the shop I want to go visit! I'm a local and will certainly drop some dough on some crystals, tapestries, tarot?, and more😊 I CAN'T WAIT!! Thank you for opening a metaphysical shop in our area! ❤️

resp.text: Hi Patti 🙏 I finally figured out how to access these reviews and respond 😇 thank you so very much for the love and support❣️ let us know if we may assist you with any of your spiritual tool needs or if you just want a little pick me 😘 also send a text to the shop phone 251-752-3489 and let us know who you are and we will text you back a discount code to use in the shop or online 😍 Many blessings and much gratitude always 🙏💙😇 MK

name: Princess MeMe
text: We had a very welcoming experience. Staff/Owners were very friendly and helpful, not pushy, they were happy to help and answer questions. They made us feel like friends instead of customers. They had a great selection, I had a hard time choosing so I got a few items, We definitely recommend this awesome place. Thank you so much for all you've done for us. Be Blessed!

name: Denise Davies
text: Found this place during my yearly October orange beach visit with my husband. I wanted to find a real metaphysical shop, and this is a hidden little gem at the wharf. Whimsical, clean, and the staff was incredibly sweet. 10/10 will visit and give my business every time I visit.

resp.text: Hi Denise ❤️ thank you for your kind words and wonderful feedback! We truly appreciate all of our customers and we love hearing feedback! In a world full of rocks you are one of our favorite Gems 💎 😘✌️😍 many blessings to you and your loved ones always! MK

name: Sarah Wyckoff
text: This shop is wonderful, and there is nothing quite like it in our area! The selection is great, and the prices are very reasonable. The staff were so friendly and helpful. I will definitely make this a regular stop!

name: Brandy Knodel
text: My absolute favorite store ever. Love you all and thank you for walking with me down my crystal journey.

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy. We do enjoy our customers and love making their experience a fun one when they visit us. We hope you visit us often!

name: Cara Prentice
text: Loved this place! It was so nice to find a store that is so peaceful and inviting in a busy tourist area. Great selection of crystals, stones, jewlery & more. Owners are great and very knowledgeable. Make sure to ask them to show you what they know!

name: Lauralea Lasher
text: A wide variety of crystals and stones. Extremely reasonable pricing. Great selection on natural quartz crystals. As well as knowledgeable and friendly staff. I had to come back twice in a week for more!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so excited to be open and sharing our love of Crystals and things Love! We truly appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review! May you always be showered with Blessings!

name: Rachel Lavergne
text:
Absolutely love this place, I found a beautiful Mermaid light for a reasonable price and they were even nice enough to offer me a discount since I was from out of state. They have so much to offer, glad I stopped by!!!!

-Rachel

name: Lindsay Hoebing
text: What a wonderful establishment! There’s such a wide array of items available. The owner is very knowledgeable about everything in the store as well. I wish there were more stores like this!

name: patricia forrest
text: So grateful this shop is here now! Beautiful store with a great selection and incredible customer service. There's something for everyone here and the owners are extremely knowledgeable and so, so kind!! 💙🙏💚

name: dolly wallace
text: Outstanding customer service and were very knowledgeable about their inventory. Liked them so much I will buy from their online store until my next visit to Orange Beach.

name: Jeremy Thomas
text: Really cool stones, very nice!

name: Kaleigh Stovall
text: I am always met with a smile at The Paper Chase! The ladies who work there are helpful and bright and I never leave the store without finding something super cute to take home. Thanks Ashley for all you do in and for Decatur!

name: Deanne Le
text: They are so helpful here! Super friendly and professional and let’s face it in 2019 it’s hard to find professionalism. You will not be disappointed here! This place and the people turn out impeccable work!

name: kathryn roberts
text: Great place to purchase gifts for any occasion!!!

name: Harold S
text: Great friendly hometown shop in downtown beautiful Guntersville. Easy to find across from Marshall County Courthouse

name: ken bubbett
text: She does great work! And not a bad turn around time on orders.

name: Desmond Williams
text: It was awesome 👌 and I'm coming back for my Cubans ⛓.

name: Dr.Ritchelle Broadnax,DNP,CRNP
text: This is the worst jewelry store I’ve ever come across. I bought a necklace that I wanted to be shorter. It was immediately sent off to repair to be shortened for me.  I was never able to bring the necklace home. It’s been a month. Every time repair sends it back to the store it doesn’t pass the quality inspection and is sent back. I was actually in the store for one of the instances and saw for myself that the necklace was uneven and has some discoloration. However, there is obviously a lack of skill in their repair department because they can’t seem to get this simple adjustment done. So, basically I have purchased a necklace that Zales themselves have ruined and I will never bring home. I called Corporate and they NEVER answer the phone. You’ll be listening to music and fun facts about Opals for hours. I’ll be returning to the store to simply get a refund. Worst experience ever. I should have went to Jareds.

name: Malcolm Banks
text: Came to Zales today to get the Valentine's Day special and they were sold out! I was crushed! I sat and thought for a moment and I asked Gina one of the salespeople was it possible to buy one on order and she was able to make sure that I got my order and it was sent to the right place! The customer service from everyone was outstanding!

name: James Serritelli
text: Can't even answer the phone

name: Justin Golson
text: N'Gina is the best! Always gives great advice. Made all my purchases easy and stress free!!

name: Sarah
text:
Horrible. When sizing my engagement ring, they messed up the writing that was on the underside of the band, and a diamond chip was missing.

When I called, the manager refused to replace the ring. They were nasty and horrible on the phone; I’ve never gone through such a thing. They ruined my ring and refused angrily to fix it.

I had to bring my DAD down there with me in person to demand a new ring. They were intimidated into doing it.

As soon as I got my new ring, one of the 3 main diamonds fell out.

I will never go to Zale’s ever again, not even if I were on fire and they had water. What a joke. Nasty people; horrible merchandise. My diamonds probably aren’t even real.

name: Era Rivers
text: Customer Service is nonexistent

name: Arthur Moye
text: Great quality at a great price with outstanding customer service.

name: Jarrod Roseberry
text: Great!! Sales lady was great!!

name: Marcel Metoyer
text: Afraid to say..when we get our rings back will post more.

name: Kannon Ramon
text: Absolute nightmare

name: Grandmaster
text: We need better business is like this and mobile for locals and people coming to the city that need something to do and then like to get out with their children and do fun things. There's a 4-D Theater and plenty of things for the parents to do while the child can play in the enclosed ball pit ball we had a lot of fun and will definitely go back because we have an annual pass the staff is very nice and everything seems to be very clean especially the bathrooms support your local business

name: hh gaines
text: Dillon just gave me amazing customer service!! Showed me several looks. I will be back!!

name: Scott Seeley
text:
Great collection of wedding gifts and excellent sales is what brings us to this small boutique.

Located downstairs near the center of the mall, closer to Belks.

name: Michelle Steele
text: Staff is busy sitting on the front or back counters playing on their phones or talking to each other.  I don't like people to walk into my fitting room when I am trying on clothes.  Sales team was pushy to get you to buy.  Clearance was unorganized.  Stick with buying purses and shoes here.

name: Judy Myers
text: This Francesca's is located in Bridge Street.  I never go to this store, but frequent Soma next door

name: Mel Pedersen
text: Sales people attack the second you walk thru the door

name: Tabitha Berryhill
text: Great boutique and helpful staff

name: Rita Austin
text: It's ok

name: Mike Voss
text: OK deals

name: Rollie McCall
text: I've never had a bad experience while shopping at Kay's Jewelers University mall in Tuscaloosa, Alabama. Thanks to the store manager (Mrs. Sheila). She is the ultimate professional, very knowledgeable, friendly, and easy to do business with!

name: H J
text: Our experience was less than amusing. Dwayne was a delight working with us originally, although Sheila the store manager is condescending and manipulative. Will be traveling out of town for any regular maintenance or future purchases to a different Kay jewelers location, if at all.

name: Kenneth Carter
text: Mrs. Shelia takes pride in what she does. Her service and care for customers is phenomenal!

name: angela rose
text: Staff is always pleasant.

name: Chrissy Moore
text: Jamie was amazing....

name: Laticia Frost
text: I love shopping at this store. All the people that work there is amazing. Robert is a very super nice guy that will make anything possible for you. And make your visit perfect. I recommend this store to anybody...

name: Shannon Strickland
text: Great service, great quality, and really great price!

name: Mariano Rodriguez (Mariano Rodriguez)
text: I came today to look at watches and I mentioned to my friend that I was wearing a Michael Kors watch on and the sales person named Dion decides to say out loud that my watch is from Walmart and really made me feel that if I didn't buy the watch he had that I was nothing.

name: Daniel Lundy
text:
Took my wife's rings to get resized. Waited 2 months before I got them back and could not get in touch with anyone. When I got them back,
my wife still can not wear them.

name: Sheila Richard
text: Y'all go see Shelia O'Rourke! Awesome customer service!

name: Tom McDonnell
text: The Tuscaloosa Store was a great experience. My wife was treated very friendly and professionally. The Staff went out their way to be helpful.

name: Janelle Stewart
text: Long time customers and everyone always treats us great!!!

name: Nothin Fancy Home Cookin
text: The Staff here are great and made our engagement and wedding set shopping a breeze!  The only store we ever shop for jewelry in any state we live.

name: SHAWN Roy
text: You should be able to navigate the website without dealing with all of their ads and BS. Just trying to get an idea of their inventory. My idea don't bother with the store.

name: Butch Palmer
text:
Also had a terrible experience.  Not worth the price, not worth the time, and they will LIE to you to get you to buy from here.  Bought an engagement ring from here, paid half up front, said that I would pay the other half when I get back into the country (just in case she declined the proposal).  Well, when I got back and paid it off, they had already sent a mispayment to my credit history and LIED AGAIN, saying that they would erase it from there.  They put me down for a payment plan, of which I didn't want, because I WAS OUTSIDE OF THE COUNTRY.  If I pay half, and say I'm going to pay the other half in three months, that's what I'm going to do.

Any business that promotes this kind of lying deserves to shut down.

name: Jean George
text: I have brought about several things from Kays jewelry and I hope that my husband  going there for Christmas

name: Andrea Howell
text: Always enjoy shopping here.

name: Jalyn Dantzler
text: First time going in there, the place is small and cute!! Dressing rooms available! Chelsea helped me and friends with discounts. If they don’t have your size in a specific item, you always order online. From clothes to jewelry to candles, bath bombs, it’s beautiful. I tried to resist buying, but I bought five items on sale. Great Bargain. Ask for Chelsea she is so friendly.

name: Paige Ammons
text: Always love shopping here for super cute finds.

name: Annie Reiner
text: Great staff and adorable stuff for good prices!

name: alexis sewell
text: I’ve never been so disappointed in my life! I went back in summer of 2018 and the service and staff were outstanding! I went a few days ago and the service was horrible! The employees sat on stools behind the counter the whole time I was in the store and kept asking me what I wanted to buy from across the store. My experience was so horrible that I will never shop with Francesca’s ever again and I will be telling my friends not to shop here either!

name: madison hager
text: Very annoyed to have been charged for an order they did not place and have over 100 dollars out for the next 3 to 7 days. It better be three and guest services was not helpful.

name: Vanessa Brown
text: I always find something at this location. Very cute botique!

name: Billy Phillips
text: Chloe is the best employee

name: Beth Chapman
text: Great Staff!!😊

name: Edith Baker
text: Great place to shop

name: Rylan Long
text: Stopped by and got a really cute top. Staff was super nice!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming by!l and the kind words!  We hope we see you again soon!

name: Emily Sharman
text: This is THE most beautiful boutique ever! Kayla and her staff are so sweet and knowledgeable of fashion and how to style you for any event. Not only is their clothing selection gorgeous they also have the best jewelry and feature many local jewelry artists to support local businesses.

name: Anna Lee
text: Elitaire Boutique is absolutely the best shopping experience in Huntsville. Kayla, the owner, and her sweet team are so amazing at helping you find what you need. Their selection is AMAZING, they are always rotating in new clothing and accessories, and it’s the perfect place to shop for gifts as well. They make you feel comfortable and welcome, and Kayla puts so much love into her store. I love love love this Huntsville staple so much!

resp.text: Wow Anna thank you so much for these words! We are so thankful for you!

name: Lauren Fitz-Gerald
text: This boutique is the absolute best! I have found so many of my favorite pieces here and Kayla is so good at finding great brands and styling any outfit for any occasion!

name: Chelsea Kennedy
text: I have found my new favorite shop!  Everything in the store is unique and beautiful.  Kayla is so sweet and helpful, and she has such an eye for classic style.  I would seriously wear anything in the store!  I would encourage you to make time to stop by.  Five stars all the way!

resp.text: Chelsea, it was such a pleasure meeting you!! Thank you so much for the kind words and we are here for anything you need!!

name: Emily Rogers
text: I love shopping at Elitaire. The entire team is knowledgeable and can help you find the best items or looks for your specific style or event. Affordable and high quality, you can tell that Kayla hand picks every single item with her clientele in mind. This is also a great spot for affordable and thoughful jewelry that lasts & other great gifts. Wonderful local products from makers in Huntsville. Also, great atmosphere to shop in. Not pushy or overwhelming - comfortable and open environment to have fun and dress up! Cannot recommend enough. Walkable to coffee shop, downtown restaurants and more. Support this place!

resp.text: We can not thank you enough for this amazing review, Emily! Thank you so much for all the kind words!

name: Karen Shipman
text: Elitaire is every woman's boutique!  Here you will find clothing that is classy, timeless, beautiful and one of a kind to Huntsville!!! Kayla has always had impeccable style!! She brings classic and elegant clothing that can take you from the office  right to the wonderful events around town. It is truly a blessing to see her dream finally come true. Come shop with her soon!!! You will not be disappointed!!!

name: Samantha Taylor
text: Hands down my FAVORITE place to shop for clothes in Huntsville. The owner is the sweetest and is so helpful every single time I come here. She has on numerous occasions helped me pick out some of my favorite pieces in my closet. She has the best selection of clothes and shoes--truly unlike any other boutique as far as the quality and style. LOVE this place and would highly recommend this store to everyone! :)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your amazing review, Samantha!! Your kind words have made our day!!!

name: Keeping Up with the Hogans Franthony and Harper
text:
Absolutely gorgeous boutique, effortless, welcoming customer service, very knowledgeable about the product.
Kayla was beyond sweet and professional, while also being genuine and fun!
Prices are perfect for the area's demographics and very fair.
Thank God there wasn't a blouse for $300!! ;)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!! We SO enjoyed meeting you!!

name: Anna Gaddis
text: The owner was very helpful and sweet! The shop is organized and not cluttered looking. Happy with my boots, though they were just a tad too snug. I recommend coming here!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the sweet review! We are so glad you loved our store!

name: Jessecca Miller
text: My favorite place to shop for everyday items and also when you need something extra special! I've taken my friends and family here and Kayla is always such a sweet spirit and so helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the amazing and kind review! I appreciate you so much and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Alison A
text: In my opinion, this is the best boutique in Huntsville. The clothing is very high quality, and I always have a great experience chatting with the staff and finding something I feel great in.

resp.text: Alison! We are so thankful for this amazing and generous review! It means the world to us that you not only love our products but also our staff. Providing exceptional customer service is our number one goal. Thank you again and we will see you soon!

name: Sonya Carelle
text: The owner is really nice and very professional. Great customer, great clothes and the price is not bad for a downtown boutique.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sonya! We appreciate your kind words!!

name: Leigh Hall
text: Loved it! Kayla has done a fantastic job bringing something new and desperately needed in Huntsville! A sophisticated boutique for professional and fashionable women!

name: Raine
text: I had an amazing experience with The Olive Branch! I am so used to just going on Teleflora for flower deliveries that I didn't know what to do when I needed flowers but Teleflora didn't deliver to the city that I needed. I googled and came across 3 options. One of which was permanently closed...I called The Olive Branch and was overly pleased by the excellent customer service offered by store employee Marshea and store owner, Robin. They were extremely patient with me (I am super picky) and clearly wanted to make sure that I was satisfied with the final product. If I ever need an arrangement in this  part of Alabama again, they will no doubt be the ONLY place that I call.

text: A God send. I am trying to help manage my mothers health care from out of state. Gentry pharmacy is wonderful. Personalized service is not an empty slogan at this pharmacy. Service they provide is very unusual for this day and age. Thank you for providing such a wonderful service! I am so glad we found your business. Once less obstacle to getting health care!

name: Erin Hunter

name: Tara Dixon
text:
Placed an order for anniversary and it was suppose to be delivered today April 16, 2021. When I called the store, worker said it was in transit. Arrangement never arrived.

I expect a full refund first thing in the morning. If they couldn’t provide the service why take my money and then lie like it’s in transit.

Adding insult to injury, Cory Lewis, if that’s even his name called the recipient to say that the delivery address was outside of their delivery zone. However, no one called this morning to say that was the case, and even when I called at 4:49 pm, the woman who answered did not state this, she said the delivery was in transit.

Then to put icing on the cake, Cory Lewis called me to say they tried to deliver the order but the man didn’t expect the order, there was no man at the address all day and someone was literally sitting home waiting on the order all day. Then he tried to add yet another lie to that.

Professionalism and truthfulness is not a big ask when doing business, this placed missed big. I expect a refund and a call from management.

name: Monica Bray-Grant
text: Placed an order on Wednesday for an arrangement to be delivered on Friday for my Mother In Law's birthday. Called Thursday afternoon to see about adding some additional instructions to her delivery. The rep informed me that they are not doing deliveries to Tuskegee that weekend but will deliver to that area next weekend? What kind of business are they running here? No one had even called me to let me know that it was not going to be delivered. Shabby business!

name: Beverly Butler
text: Fabulous and quick service! Order online even if you need delivery for a birthday the next day. I was able to order and have this wonderful gift delivered even though I couldn't be there to celebrate the event. I hope your experience goes as well as mine!

I honestly didn’t appreciate her whole attitude and decided not to even purchase here.

I was not sure what exactly I wanted but the representative gave me multiple options based on the information I provided of who I was sending it to. The call took less than 10 minutes to get me taken care of. I appreciated the expedient service! My mom LOVED her arrangement. The fruit was fresh and actually looked like the photo! I will be ordering again from this store!

name: Sarah Davis
text: If I could give this place less than one star I would. Courtney (the owner) is a consistent liar. He makes promise after promise when confronted and never delivers. If this place stays open for the next 6 months I will be SHOCKED with poor management like that.

name: Tamara Williams
text: Excellent customer service.  Beautiful arrangement. I will definitely order from this store again.

name: Kent Whitaker
text:
Horrible experience. My wife and I are not in Auburn so we chose this company to deliver an arrangement for Valentines Day for my mother-in-law in Opelika. We ordered a higher dollar item other than the lower priced special. Specifically for the reason of having more fruit and less chocolate as we were hoping for something a bit healthier because of health issues. They charged our credit card for the higher priced item we ordered but delivered the lower price special with added chocolate and it was a smaller item. In addition to the wrong item - they did not deliver it on Valentines Day. We called several times and they acted nice at first and promised to deliver the item the next day. Late in the day mom called and said it was never delivered. We called back and it was being delivered late in the day - a day late - and it was the wrong item, not the higher priced one we paid for.

We called again and one of the employees admitted they went to the wrong house on Valentines day so somebody got the higher priced item. My wife called again to at least get a refund for the overcharged amount or to have the right item delivered. We were promised the right item would be delivered. The next day, no delivery.

At this point, several days after Valentines Day my wife gave up so I started calling, was promised a refund or a deliver of the right item. There was no refund or proper delivery. I was then promised at least a call back from the owner, then another promise, another promised call back. I never heard back.

My mother in law never received the correct item and and we never got the refund. We finally tried to cancel payment with credit card and to get a refund but they disputed it - said that the item was delivered. Did not mention that it was the wrong item, and that it was late, missing Valentines Day. I'm sorry that they delivered the item, possibly twice, to the wrong house, and then the wrong item to the right address. That's three deliveries, three trips, three items. However, those mistakes are not our fault. All I know is that my mother in law never received what was ordered.

I would not recommend this company to another person.

I would probably have written a different review if the owner would have called me back as promised by the several employees.

name: C. K.
text: Fresh and on time delivery. Good customer service. I highly recommend this business.

name: Kate Dorsey
text: Placed an order well in advance enough to have delivered on mother in laws birthday, followed the ‘track your order’ the entire day of said scheduled delivery, and it finally changed to “arranging your order now” around lunchtime, and never changed again after that. I called several times, contacted via the live chat and email on website, had an automated reply sent with my “case number” saying I’d be contacted by the store. Never was. 3 days later on Monday I finally got someone on the phone and all she said was “yeah i don’t even what happened with that order haha. Do you want me to send it today?” (Never even got an apology or any type of discount offer or even an explanation) 4 days after her birthday? ummm yeah, no thanks. Never again. WAY too overpriced for quality of product and customer service

name: Liz Lewis
text: Very disappointed in the service that I received.

name: Angela Castle
text: I ordered a mustard color leopard print bag With my initials on the bag. I received a gray cheetah print bag. I sent an email to the company advising that I received the wrong bag in my initials were in on the bag and the owner advised that she messed up on the order. I requested that she Send a return shipping label and she advised that she would not be sending a return shipping label rather I need to pay for the shipping for the bag to go back. I already paid for the shipping for the bag to come to me and got the wrong product. Do not buy from this company, she is nothing short of a thief.

resp.text:
The order was shipped exactly as placed & invoiced (I have the documentation to prove that the order color print shipped correctly).  Request was placed for Cheetah Grey and the invoice reflected that choice and stated Cheetah Grey on sales receipt. Pictures were also sent to confirm as Leopard Mustard was never requested.  Monogram was discussed in conversation but never confirmed and was not charged for the $15 monogram fee. Customer was never asked to provide initials, thread color or font style and invoice did not include a monogram fee.

Offered to refund purchase even though it was shipped as ordered and invoiced 100%.  Had I made an error in shipping I would happily pay the return postage and re-ship item correct.  This was simply not the case as monogram was not paid for and item invoiced Cheetah Grey is exactly what was shipped and received in 3-days in perfect condition.

I have been in business over 15 years snd have NEVER been called a thief and always take the loss to make a purchase correct.  I offered to monogram at my cost and re-ship the Leopard Mustard instead if the item invoiced.  I would be taking a loss as my actually shipping is $12 USPS.  That option was not acceptable so I therefore I cannot be a thief as product ordered was received.  Furthermore I should NOT be accused of not doing what I can to please…sometimes satisfaction cannot be obtained.

I have and will always do what I can to provide the BEST quality merchandise at a FAIR price.  It’s unfortunate that I was not able to offer a solution to this situation.

text: Kay's consultants are very knowledgeable about their product and service. I could not have chosen a better jeweler to make my purchases.

name: W Barringer
text: Excellent visit!!  Store is kept clean and sanitary. The staff is top notch!!!!  Unfortunately they were unable to clean my jewelry but they had cleaner available for purchase. They helped educate me on how to clean it.  So glad I know how to properly clean my jewelry in the safety of my home! So willing to go above and beyond!!!  Will shop at Kay Jewelers in Prattville for life!!! Thanks again ladies!!!!

name: Kristy Kanagala
text: I absolutely love this location! They work hard to build a relationship with you and get to know your needs and wants. They are consistently kind and attentive.

name: andrew runge
text: Awesome customer service. My wife’s wedding band lost a diamond recently so we took it to Kay’s to get fixed. They had to mail the ring off and it was back at their store fixed in no time. I’m currently working 6 days a week so Sunday is our only day to get stuff done. We drove to Kay’s (about 45 minutes) to find out they were closed do to a busted water pipe. I sent Adrienne an email and within 30-40 minutes she was at the the store to meet me and give us the ring. Couldn’t ask for better service!

name: william norris
text: I would like to start that I have never left a review for any business I have ever used. This experience has been an exception. I ordered a wedding ring on November 11th and it was scheduled to arrive on November 22. We check in several times up through December 11th and the order had not arrived. This was fine because our wedding is not until February 6th. In mid December, the store manager, Adrienne, realized that the ring had mistakenly been shipped to Oklahoma. I understand there are a lot of shipping issues at the moment so I completely understood. On December  23rd, I called and was told by the store manager that the best direction to go would be to do a completely new order and that is would be scheduled to arrive in mid January. For a wedding on February 6th, a mid January shipment was cutting it too close for comfort considering our experience to this point. Hopefully canceling the order and getting my money back will be a better experience. Unfortunately, I could not recommend purchasing a blow pop from this store.

name: Erin Putter (Chasing Life's Adventure)
text: Refused to help. I understand that we are dealing with COVID and all but this location is keeping the doors locked and makes you wait outside until they see you. I went there with the intent to get my wedding rings sent off for sizing and soldering. Was told I needed an appointment. No one was in the store and I asked to simply give her my rings and wait for the paperwork outside. Was told no. What is so precious in a jewelry store that they have to be on a near lockdown status but I can go nearly anywhere else at this point? I wonder why they don’t just close the store for the duration so they can stop paying people to do nothing.

name: Caesar How
text: The manager is awesome and always there and her staff rocks. Her commitment to service keeps me coming back. Every business needs someone like her for sustainability and image. She is a true gem for Kay and I will continue to come back as long as she is there.

name: M W
text: Staff was rude and inconsiderate of me not having knowledge of the different cuts of diamonds. The sales representative eventually wouldn't answer any other questions and suggested I shop somewhere less expensive.. of course my budget was $15,000. Your loss Kay Jewelers.

name: Austin kane
text: Got nice jewelry and the employees treat u with kindness and respect

name: Keith Jefferson
text: Amazing staff and a great variety of jewelry

name: Lyn Adams
text: Great customer service and good selection of items.

name: Mz. T. McKitt
text: Staff & customer service was excellent!

name: SRT 392
text: Very helpful and amazing customer service

name: Kent M McDonald
text: I have visited this store four times and each visit has been a pleasure.

name: Jennie Bridges

text: They messed up my $300 watch for a battery change and wanted to call the cops when I asked for a refund.

name: Harley Russell
text: Absolutely love Katie & her mom! The sweetest family and the perfect one stop shop for all your wants. There is literally everything to choose from with varieties of all ages, especially for gift giving.

resp.text: Thank you Harley 🖤

text:
Every time i come in there’s new awesome items! They have so many different things in the store you’re sure to find whatever you need along with stuff you don’t need but fell in love with!
The two owners are absolutely amazing and so friendly along with being super helpful.
Go shop here!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! 💜

text: Love this boutique!!  Stop in..tell Katie and Chris hello!!

name: Chelsi M Lomas

name: Adam Hodel
text: This is a great little shop for anyone looking to add some character to their house or yard. I love stopping by and browsing every time I'm nearby. The owners are very kind and reasonable. I had purchased a somewhat expensive piece that I thought my wife would like, but it ended up not working out. They were very reasonable about allowing a return.  I would certainly recommend that people stop by and browse for ideas, and buy something if you find something perfect. I love their selection of stone statues (Gnomes, dragons, birds, etc)

name: Debbie Dean
text: I can't wait for a return trip to Birmingham so that I can come to Charlie thigpen's Garden Gallery again! They have the most amazing varieties of plants that I have never heard of. And inside they have the most beautiful living arrangements of these plants and the coolest things to buy. Massive wind chimes and gorgeous garden lights and everything Garden. And they are such lovely people. It is well worth the trip.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie!  We're so glad that you enjoyed your visit!

name: Alyssa Vickers
text: I enjoyed looking at the products, but felt as if I was being treated differently because I had my toddler with me . It was obvious that I was monitoring what she was doing, but one of the employees decided to tell her (me, indirectly) that what she was touching was hand carved and very expensive after watching us like a hawk in the store. I found several things that I liked, but couldn’t bring myself to support this business because of the way we were treated.

name: Hank Powers
text: A great place with an awesome staff. They were so helpful and kind. We will go back again soon.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!   We appreciate your comments!

name: Cherry Ocar
text: Everything in this place is enchanting and extraordinary. Friendly and engaging staff. It's always lovely here.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Joel Blackstock (LICSW MSW PIP)
text: Great place! They have a beautiful store and courtyard full of unique plants and container gardens.  They also have great quality gardening and wild birding supplies.

name: Dianne Mooney
text: It's the best customer service in town. And the products are so beautiful and well sourced. It's my go-to place for gifts.

resp.text: Thank you Dianne. It's always fun to work with fun people!

name: Frances S
text: Simply amazing. Wonderful customer service, beautiful products, and a superb atmosphere. I can't imagine a nicer place to spend an afternoon with a friend!

resp.text: Thank you for your review!   As a small business, our goal is offer an enjoyable experience, so we appreciate your acknowledgement!

name: Gina Huie
text: This is one of my all-time, favorite places to shop in the Birmingham area! I'm so happy to welcome White Flowers Gallery to The Grand River Outlet Shoppers! WFG moved April 24th, from Brookwood Mall..and we are so happy for her! You will find her classic, crisp white T- shirts with beautiful black and white flowers on them!..My new night-shirt has a lovely gray, ornamental cross on it! There are other pieces like sweatshirts, tank tops, vests, and more! She also has one-of-a-kind treasures to choose from in jewelry, candles, and art pieces. She has a wide selection of baby gifts and layette pieces, as well as, pieces for big brother and sister too! You simply have to see for yourself! This is Southern Hospitality at it's best! You will love it too! ❤

name: Janet Stewart
text: This is the most fascinating and enlightening store I've ever been in!  Everything is so beautiful from start to end.  One of a kind.  A little of everything.  Love it; love it; love it!!!

name: Betty Huskey

Heaven on earth

text: Was visiting my mother who lives In Montgomery and  she wanted to take me to the gift shop.  The clerk was a bad representative for a gift shop! Good products but not a good overall experience!

It's not notated anywhere on the site that you have to make reservations prior to arriving... that's something that should be disclosed to tourists...
Didn't know 'til we arrived, then started reading reviews 😐

(Translated by Google) Beautiful and quiet place, unfortunately I had no time to visit the countryside.

(Original)
Lindo e tranquilo local, infelizmente não tive tempo para visitar o interior.

name: Sara Crocker
text: This was the cutest shop! It's filled with art from local Alabama artists. Paintings, jewelry, decor, ornaments all great gift options. The owner was very sweet and personable. I'm excited to go back when I have more time to browse!

name: Tri Burban
text: Great place selling art, accessories and other items made by local artists. The owner is a beautiful soul who really cares about her craft, both as a proprietor and as one of the artists. I truly enjoyed my time in the store and wish them all success. Only reason for less than 5 stars is the lack of representation of the demographic of Montgomery. In a city that's majority African-American, I would live to see more artists of color.

name: Jeremy Lewis
text: Fun and quirky store of local arts and crafts, along busy Madison Ave commuter road, so parking on street requires care during rush hour. The paintings on the walls are by local primitives, with bright colors and two dimensions. There are examples of costume jewelry and pottery, likewise in the folk art genre. (This ain't SCAD or RISD). The treasure I found is a children's book written, drawn and produced by Tom Spencer, "Riley, Ace of Spies" with delightful illustrations by the author. In the best tradition, the text is as amusing on an adult level as for children.

name: ND Seibel
text: A great gallery/Co-op featuring a diverse range of local area artists. Affordably priced and uniquely Montgomery. Stock is always changing as these are currently producing artists.

name: Carolyn Humphries
text: Well laid out small business, reasonable prices, warm welcome by owner and clerks, no pressure to buy! Very nice visit..we will be back!!!

name: Mandy Ennis
text: Awesome store full of unique finds from local artists and makers! Perfect for finding unique gifts or art pieces for yourself.

name: Brett A. Snell
text: Friendly inviting place that (as the name implies) specializes in local products. There is something to be had for all. From trinkets to real artwork. Stop by and check it out.

name: Danny Davidson

It was a little more expensive than I'd hoped, but in the end worth it to get that professional touch. Thank you Kaleidoscope!

thank you sandy. i appreciate your business. anytime we can assist you please let us know

text: Showed the guy a picture of exactly what I wanted. Instead of telling me he didn't have enough white lilies to make it he filled in the rest with a bunch of other stuff I didn't want or ask for. He offered to take it back but that's not the point. Be honest up front instead of wasting someone's time making an arrangement they didn't ask for.

I live in Huntsville and sent an arrangement to my aunt, I accidentally gave them the wrong house number and the woman refused to give the flowers back. They went and made my aunt a new arrangement... I cannot stress how amazing that was, especially since we are quarantined!!

thank you so much   i appreciate your business.

The manager, David was very respectful to me and listen to all of my concerns and never made me feel under appreciated. I appreciate their business and customer care and will definitely continue shopping with them!

text: After the experience I had at Muscle Shoals Florist , I will be dealing with kaleidoscope from here on out . Two different Florist owners in 24 hours . The difference from one to the other was nothing but professionalism. Thank you for helping us.

text: Always looking for seasonal flower arrangements. They've got beautiful ones year around!

text: Went to  Muscle Shoals Florist after that waste of our Family’s time  I ended up here.  You Saved our day and we are so grateful.

text: Beautiful flowers! Delivered on a short turnaround. Amazing service!

text: Manager was very helpful and friendly.  Shop is very organized and had a good selection of items to purchase.

name: Matt Wilson
text:
3.) After we put in an order for an arrangement we called back to add to the order. An employee who answered the phone asks for our personal information. We gave it. However he said we were not in the system. This is what we were told after waiting on the line for 12 minutes. Can you imagine??? However they charged our ‘charge card’ the day before. Figure that one out.  About five hours they found our order - but only because we were persistent – believe me (N.Y persistent). We were told that we did not put an order in with them and that we must have called another local florist (yeah we wish that were the case).

Guy Vogel

text: So very helpful with our trip to honor our niece and  nephew.  Thank you for your help and support for them both.

name: Crystal Alexander

name: jeremy smith

name: Kim Chapman
text:
On Saturday I called and ordered a basket for a funeral that was on Sunday, I live in Michigan and this was way last minute on my part, luckily I found McBride Florist!
Donna was the sweet lady that helped me, I told her I liked the look of the grapevine baskets, she said they didn’t have any at this time and suggested a bird house with grapevines arrangement, I trusted her professional opinion and am so glad I did, it was beautiful! This was in memory of my step daughters Mammaw and she absolutely loved it and that was the best part, it also had a little red cardinal, what a nice touch! Thank you so much Donna, you made the whole process so easy!
If I ever need a florist in Decatur again this is by far my first pick!

resp.text: Thank you so much for choosing us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to doing business with you again.

name: Joshua Lawrence
text: The 4 arrangements i ordered for delivery made it on time. For what i paid was beautiful work. Fast friendly great price and wonderful staff. I order flowers a lot and they have done the best work i have found in decatur.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!

name: Heather Woodard
text: I ordered two dozen roses in a vase and McBride Florist didn’t let me down! They’re absolutely gorgeous! 5/5 on customer service and product quality.

resp.text: Thanks Heather! We appreciate you!

name: Gary K
text: Located McBride Florist close to my friend in Decatur & decided to give them a try. Friend was very happy to receive fresh flowers today. Looking forward to help out with local businesses even though I'm in California. Will continue to use McBride Florist for future purchases.

resp.text: Gary, thank you so much! We appreciate our customers!

name: Bruce Kaetz
text: Not real impressed!  The pic on the left is what I got. The pic on the right is what I ordered. What a Rip off!  I also ordered a balloon to go with the flowers. They didn’t bother to include that. When I called they said they forgot and refunded the money for the balloon.

resp.text: We appreciate your business! Thanks Kimberly!

resp.text: So happy we could help! Thanks Tasha!

name: Jason Stricklin
text:
I called to arrange a bouquet of red roses to be delivered to my wife for our anniversary today. The lady I spoke with was awesome. She was very friendly and the process went flawlessly. I ordered the roses at 8:14 AM and my wife received them around 9:30 AM. She is very happy with the arrangement. I will be using McBride Florist from now on.
Update: I used McBrides again this year to send anniversary flowers to my wife. She and I both are very pleased. I will be using them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jason !

name: Kathy Sapp
text: I have dealt with Mcbride's Florist many years, I really liked John and Louann. Anytime I need a floral arrangement, whether it be a bud vase for a dear friend or a casket spray for a funeral, all I have to do is call and tell them the flowers I want, and the arrangement always turns out beautiful,  just like I pictured! Great people and company to do business!⚘🌻🌷

resp.text: Thank you Kathy, we have always valued you as a customer and appreciate you choosing us for your floral needs !

name: Cynthia Mote
text: Beautiful plants and flowers. Reasonable prices.

resp.text: Thank you so much !!!

name: LAUREL ATKINS
text: Extremely disappointed!  Ordered. $100 bouquet to be delivered to a friend.  After the delivery and tax, I was charged $114.45 and I was fine with that. I am giving them 2 stars only because it WAS delivered timely. It was NOT a $100 bouquet, however.  There were minimal flowers . I had also asked fro bright cheerful colors Pinks, Purple, Orange, Blues etc. I wish I could upload the pic I took of it. There is 1 sunflower,  1 snapdragon, 4 red roses, a yellow lily,  a purple iris and some small filler in lavender and then green filler. I will not use this florist again.

resp.text: Laurel, we are so sorry you were disappointed with your order. If we had known the circumstances at the time we would have done whatever possible to correct it for you !

name: Cassy Littrell
text: McBride’s Florist always goes above and beyond to make their customers happy! Their flowers are so beautiful and their customer service is top notch!

resp.text: Thank you so much !!!

name: Erica Wolf
text: Thank you on your prompt delivery to my Grandma! She loves her flowers and your system made it easy to get them to her from Missouri!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing McBride's for your order Erica and we are so happy to have helped to make her day special !

name: Lynn Thomlinson
text: I contacted the florist for an arrangement for my daughter’s birthday. The arrangement was delivered as requested and completely exceeded my expectations. It is large and full and bright and beautiful!

text: After having my order cancelled by two other florist I was beside myself.  McBride came through in record time.  I order this morning and they were delivered by the afternoon.  I wouldn't hesitate to order from them again.

text: One of, if not the most, reputable florist in the city! Their employees are polite, personable, and so easy to work with. As someone born and raised in Decatur, I assure you there is no better choice if you need flowers or arrangements delivered promptly!

resp.text: Thank you so much !!!

name: Myra Phillips
text: McBride Florist has the best flowers of anyone. When my mom died there was just no comparison in their flowers and flowers from other flowers from other florists. McBride is hands down, the best.

resp.text: Thank you so much Myra. It makes us happy when our customer's are happy !

name: Jeanette Sims
text: Wonderful in your time of need. They went beyond for my mother Dorothy Rutherford funeral services. I can't say enough about how much I appreciate what they did. There are the best in Morgan county and Decatur.

resp.text: Melinda we are so happy that you are enjoying your beautiful tulips!

text: I use McBride's personally and professionally through the company that I work for. They are great! They by far exceed my expectations every time. Their work is beautiful and I always get the best compliments from people that I have sent flowers / plants too. We have used them several times for centerpieces for party's and the guest always fight over taking home an arrangement.

name: Cyndi Kelly
text: These ladies are awesome. They did a beautiful casket blanket for my dad.

resp.text: Thank you Cyndi, we are so happy we could help you honor your father with the beautiful blanket you chose for his service

name: Laura Funk
text: McBride saved the day - twice! I initially ordered online from somewhere else and was lead to believe I had been scammed so a searched for a local shop (I'm in CO) and reached out to McBrides to help with flowers for my grandparents wedding anniversary, the woman I spoke to on the phone was so pleasant and helpful and reassured me flowers would be delivered same day and they would look beautiful! I later on received a call from them stating that the online warehouse I had ordered from actually did send the order over to them of all places so my grandparents got two bouquets and they kindly refunded one of my orders and my grandparents got to keep both! Customer service is beyond top notch and if the occasion arises again I will definitely make sure to call them directly!

resp.text: That's wonderful Laura so glad you were pleased and everything worked out !

name: Tyler Power
text: I would not recommend this florist to anyone. I was looking for a nice arrangement for my girlfriend to get after a surgery. I gave them an idea of what I wanted, and the owner was not friendly or helpful at all. She would not give me any ideas of what it might look like. I went ahead and ordered only to find a week later that I spent $40 on a handful of daisies and 3-4 stems of brown and dying blue flowers.

resp.text: we are so sorry your were disappointed Tyler. If we had known at the time we would have done whatever possible to correct the situation !

name: LINDA SELF
text:
I have used this florist twice now and I am making this my main florist to use. The employee who helped me on the phone was so nice and sweet,  the arrangements ordered were beautiful. I will be using them for now on.
One Happy Customer!

resp.text: Thank you so much Linda !

name: L Maxey
text: Ordered flowers online one day before funeral service.  Received phone call from McBride Florist to advise that they didnt carry exact arrangement but offered several different options.  Was very pleased to see arrangement that was done in its place the next day at service.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much !

name: Tammy Terrell
text:
Great customer service! Was out of town and was super nice to help me!
Thanks!

name: Carrol Steakley
text:
I rarely order flowers and I am not happy with the whole teleflora website/florist experience. I feel that I should be able to pick out  a picture of the flowers and container that I would like to purchase, pay for it, and have it delivered. When I order an item, let's say a new chair,  I can see a photo of the  chair and know what I am paying for ,and when it arrives it should be the chair I ordered. I don't like paying for something that is NOT what I ordered. While I understand fresh flowers may need to be substituted the arrangement should resemble the photo. Flowers should be similar and the container should be exact.  A container should not be in a photo on the website if it is not " in stock". This is false advertising. Each individual florist probably doesn't have what is pictured on the Teleflora websites.
I called the florist and expressed my concern and followed up with an email with pictures of what I ordered and what was delivered.  I ordered a beautiful sturdy white wicker basket with flowers and what I got was a cheap multicolored Easter egg basket. They substituted the basket and after I complained they were willing to offer me a credit of $2.50. What a joke!  I will not use this florist in the future for any reason and will never use a site that is managed by Teleflora. My thoughts are that the Teleflora company has way too many florist and they do not know what each flower shop has in stock. So when you order from a site like this one, you NEVER KNOW WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO GET. BEWARE. I wish I could put a photo on this commentary. I paid $45.73 for something that was NOT what I ordered.  Here is the response from the florist:

Thank you for your recent order. We pride ourselves on delivering the best, most fresh and most similar arrangements that we can for our customers and we have been doing so for over 38 year in the Shoals area! I am very glad you were pleased with the flowers that we provided for you and your mother.

In response to your recent request for a 50% refund here is our answer:
The basket chosen was unavailable and a similar value was substitute per our substitution policy.
We were also instructed to call and leave on the front porch if no one was available. Which we did. Our standard policy is to call and if there is no response, and no one is home, we leave a message as to where the flowers are. Since we were instructed, by you, to leave them, they were; only after a phone call was made. Had you not told us to leave the arrangement, and weather was not good for our arrangement, we would have left a message detailing where the arrangement could be picked up.
Also, you did not order from a 3rd party person. You placed your order on our website, which is managed and updated by Teleflora. They are our wire service and website managing team. They have thousands of florists that they service and we all obviously have different items in stock. They do a generic picture, and when a picture is chosen we try to fill the order as best we can with the flowers we have on hand at that particular time. Flowers are very seasonal and have a high turnover because of spoilage. Next time, a  call directly to the florist could save you a substitution since you would know immediately what they had available at that time.

As far as using another florist, they would offer the same substitution policy as us, so I don't know that you would've been happier.

Since you were happy with the flowers provided in the arrangement and they were Pretty and Fresh I can NOT offer you a 1/2 refund of the product, being as though you were please with it. I will however refund you the "basket" charge since you were not pleased with the substitution chosen. I will be adding a refund of the Full container charge of $2.50 to your card. I hope this helps.
Thank you for your business.

text: I received a coupon for a free mini facial after making purchases at the L'Occitane location in Birmingham.  I scheduled an appointment for July 4 at 11:30.  When I arrived on time for my appt.  I was told by the clerk that she was the only one in the store and whoever scheduled my appointment made an error in scheduling.  She asked if I could shop for 30 mins and return at 12 p.  I was fine with that and left the store to browse for 30 minutes.  When I returned the clerk I spoke with had already taken someone to the back for service and the other clerk informed her that I was back.  They chatted for awhile, then the other clerk told me that it would be a little while and signaled with her hands (in a shooing motion) to "um, just look around for awhile". This was completely unacceptable and needless to say, I left the store without receiving the facial for the following 1) if there was an error with the schedule I should have been called and asked to reschedule instead of having me drive to the location and then be told there was an error. 2) Why was someone else being serviced at the time I was told to return.  Did that person have to wait? 3)To date no manager from the store has called to try to reschedule or return my calls.  I will not be visiting this store again!
