name: Lori Mercer
text: Sorry everyone - we can't seem to get this listing updated to show our correct address.  The phone number is correct so please give us a call.  We are physically located at 57 Virginia Dale Drive, Wetumpka, AL 36092 (however this is actually in the Town of Elmore between Millbrook and Wetumpka).  We are the closest florist to the Millbrook area.

name: Hazel K
text: I paid for next day delivery flowers to be sent to my niece on her birthday. I received a confirmation that they were delivered Late Friday afternoon. I called my niece to see if they were delivered and they were NOT. I immediately called the shop several times and left voicemails. No response - the shop was closed for the weekend. Long story short, they delivered to the wrong address, despite the correct address being on file with the purchase. It was very important for me to send flowers ON her birthday and not 4 days later. It was disappointing and a hassle to figure out what happened. There was no flower upgrade, add on, or partial refund to make up for the huge mistake on their part.

resp.text: Please give us an opportunity to research and respond properly to this situation before leaving a negative review. We value every order and do everything in our power to make sure your order is delivered correct and on time. Without know the specifics of this order I can’t help you resolve the problem. I realize it is too late for her birthday but I still need to determine what happened based on how the order was placed. Please send an email to wecare@jenilynscreations.com with your full name, phone number, the recipient, and the address given so we can address this properly.

name: tls 1024
text: The arrangement was delivered with the wrong card on it. This is not the first time I’ve had an issue with this florist. Last time they offered a partial refund to remove my bad review and I complied but this time I have to give my review. I’m not happy with the arrangement and wonder since the card was wrong if I possibly received the wrong arrangement. Even if not it’s not a very nice arrangement. I could’ve cut flowers out of my garden and stuck in a vase.

resp.text: We are sincerely sorry about the card message.  It was a mistake in our office and we take full responsibility for that.  The sender was wanting to acknowledge your family with a gift of flowers and their deepest sympathy.  Again we are very sorry for your disappointment.

name: Jobelle Collie
text: My son sent me flowers for Mother’s Day last week from Jenilyn’s and my daughter sent flowers from another florist.  They were supposed to look similar, based on online pictures.  I had to lie to my son because he wanted a photo of me with the flowers.  Yikes! If flowers are dead the Monday after Mother’s Day, that’s sad.  The flowers my daughter sent (from another florist) look as good a week later as they did the day they arrived.  Since my children live out of State, they rely on online photos to decide what to send. Please don’t ruin any more holidays please.

resp.text: Please give us an opportunity to make it right before leaving a negative review. I assure you we didn’t send out flowers that were less than optimal but we will gladly replace them if contacted directly within a reasonable time. All you have to do is call us at 334-567-3325.

name: KatMaster
text: We used her when my husband unexpectedly passed away.  She handled me in my grief so consolingly and even met the odd requests of my children for flowers in the arrangement.  The green plants we wanted she was patient enough to help me locate as I knew nothing of their name and could only describe them generically.... patience at its greatest!  We had out of town family and friends place orders through her as well, and there were no complaints on any arrangement.  Definitely my go-to florist for the area for any floral needs!

name: Cynthia Wood
text:
Very disappointed in the flowers this florist did for a funeral last week.  I called to let them know I was unhappy and the lady said she would let Jenilyn know but she never returned the call.  I feel that what I ordered and paid for was not what was delivered.

Update: I received a call from one of the owners who apologized and offered me a refund which I declined. He said during the holidays they had a lot of extra help and the message was not relayed to owner/management. I am changing my rating from 1 to 3 stars. I appreciate the call back, apology and his offer to refund my money.

name: Ann Sheppard
text: They were very nice.

name: ihatenubs
text: I'll keep the 5 stars rolling. Very happy with everything. Thank you so much.

name: Art Faulkner
text: As usual Jenilyn’s has done a wonderful job again. Not only were the flowers beautiful but I know how hard Jenilyn and the other designers work to make each persons arrangement special.

name: Brenda Brown
text: Great customer service and beautiful arrangements!

name: TRUMP 2020
text: The most flowers for your buck.

name: Thomas Owens
text:
A friend's brother passed away the Friday before Mothers day, having called a few florist in Prattville A.L. (town of funeral home) I couldn't find anyone to help. The people were rude telling me it was Mothers day they were either out of flowers or to busy to fulfill the order for delivery on Monday. As I old one of the florist deaths are not planned so giving a better lead time is ridiculous..Enough of the negative..
I luckily found and called Jenilyns Creations, it was a breath of fresh air to find someone that understood and was very helpful.
Do not hesitate make your FIRST call to Jenilyn's when doing business Montgomery AL area and save yourself aggravation.
I want to thank Jenilyn's team for doing what they said!!! And the price was more than fair.. Again Great Job Jenilyn's Creations!!!!

name: Tiffany Marie
text: It's not there, wrong address, sends you to city hall in Millbrook

name: M E
text: **FANTASTIC in every way!** Beautiful work! Fabulous to work with! Highly recommend!

name: Stephanie Swink
text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

If  you want it done right always use Jenilyn's Creations!!!! I JUST WANT EVERYONE TO KNOW JUST HOW HELPFUL SHE REALLY IS, YOU WILL ABSOLITELY LOVE HER! 🍁🌾🌺🌻🕸🌸🌼🌷🌹💐🌸🌼🌷🌹🌱🌿🌻🌺🌾🍁🍂🌹🌷💐🌸🌹🌼🌸🌻🌼💐

I wish I could give Jenilyns's Creation 100 Stars! She is beyond helpful and nice. She can answer any question you have for her. With my experience, I just told her this is my friends fav color, fav flower and I don't have a lot of money to apend(everybody nowadays is on a fixed income)!  You can give her different ideas of what you want
And she will
Work her magic to give you a finished product that will blow your mind...

Jenilyn's Creation
Is the way to go when u WANT  something that will blow your mind at such a reasonable price... and if she doesn't have what you're looking for ,she will do anything to get it for you to make what you want special and just right!!!❤️❤️❤️

She can use her magic and you will get what you need that  EXCEEDS your  expectations for such a reasonable price! Not to mention she is so polite and helpful. I WILL NEVER USE ANYONE ELSE!! 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: charles aldridge
text: Great

name: Jack Schlee
text: I ordered flowers twice. Both times they were not what I ordered.

resp.text: We are so sorry you had a problem. We just tried to call you and no answer. We’ll be glad to take whatever corrective measure you would like. Please let us know.

name: Laura Norris
text: Very friendly and helpful staff, with great deals as well! Products were very high quality.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Laura!

name: Ashley Mason
text: Love these cute clothes and the customer service is outstanding! I love the personal attention! I highly recommend this precious shop!

resp.text: Thank you Ashley!!!

name: Amy Ferguson
text: Great selection and amazing staff!

name: Sandy Schreiter
text: I love shopping at Dear Prudence!  Beautiful clothes and such friendly and helpful employees.

name: Debbie Haight
text: Great stylish clothing without breaking the bank!

resp.text: Thanks Debbie!!

name: Peyton Kauffman
text: Their clothes are extremely cute!

name: MS M
text: Love Dear Prudence in Hoover!

name: Kartr Higgins
text: Very nice Cigar shop.  They are new, but have a decent selection of cigars and wines.  The cigars I purchased were properly humidified and very good.  Their store is directly across the street from Maters.

resp.text: Thank you sir

name: 100deathwish
text: It's a really cool place I recommend it it's got an awesome vibe

resp.text: Thank you

name: Second Grade LE
text: Wonderful jewelers. Very efficient in repairing a ring I purchased from Ware Jewelers several years earlier. Excellent service. Would highly recommend. My husband and I have been going to Ware’s since 1975. We now live out of state, but continue to purchase our jewelry from there.

name: Dan Cocks
text: Mine was a simple request to replace a watch battery. Because it is considered a “premium” watch, a jeweler that sells that brand tried to charge me $100 for “lifetime battery replacement”. I walked out of there and came here the next time I came back to Auburn. This was exactly as you would hope and expect of a Jewry store. They were polite, pleasant, helpful, and fair in their pricing. Why bother to write a review for a battery replacement?  Because I have come to appreciate that not all jewelers are the same.

name: Joann Hill
text:
Love Ware Jewelers! They are the best...Jo at Tigertown store is excellent and goes all out to help you find exactly what you want. She also keeps in touch after the purchase to make sure all is well!
Very pleasant experience...every time!!

name: Deirdre Gunn
text: Ware Jewelers has been my most trusted jewelers since I was in school at Auburn in 1983! If I need work done, or appraisals, I wouldn’t dream of going anywhere else. They are always courteous and kind, and very professional, and I know I can depend on their honesty as well.

name: Catherine Bower
text: My wedding and engagement ring are both from Wares. I had so much fun picking them out. Bailey is absolutely wonderful to work with!

resp.text: Thank you Catherine, we loved helping you!

name: yak bama
text: Had a ring of my husband’s grandmother and my wedding ring made into a new ring together. They did a fabulous job of helping me designing it and when it was completed it was more than I hoped for. I absolutely love it and have gotten so many compliments on it. Will you Ware Jewelers for all my jewelry needs.

name: Terri McCard
text: Fast and affordable local service!

name: Michael Watson
text: Always receive prompt, outstanding service. Lindsay and Jennifer are especially attentive to their customers.

name: cynthia williams
text: I stumbled across Ware Jewelers by accident after moving from Florida. I needed a ring sized up from size 2 to size 6. The ladies there helped me & were professional, welcomed me to area. My ring turned out nice & they cleaned it beautifully. I would definitely recommend this jewelry store. I will be returning for any Jewelry purchases & or jewelry repair.

name: Tonjia Young
text: Awesome customer service!! These ladies customer service skills are the BEST!!

name: Choices Transportation
text: Hands down one of the best.. Thanks for everything ladies..

name: Patsy White
text: Everyone meets you with a smile and Jo is always ready to help in any way!

name: Louellen Stoner
text: I needed a battery for my watch and when I took it in they were very friendly and attended to me very quickly. I left the watch with them and they called me when it was ready for pickup. When I went to pick it up, they went beyond just replacing the battery, they cleaned and polished the watch itself. I was very satisfied with all they did and would recommend them to anyone.

name: Maureen Montgomery
text: Awesome staff and easy to work with, we will be back!

name: Darby Winkler
text: I had the best experience at Ware. The staff was so welcoming and kind. We worked with Jo and she really took the time to get to know us and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy. I would recommend Ware to anyone!

name: Debora Nichols
text: The staff is always friendly, courteous and helpful. All services have been rendered professionally and items are ready by scheduled pick up date.

name: Ray Smith
text: Always a pleasure, friendly courteous service

name: TJ Fuqua
text: Always a huge help when I come in!  Very knowledgeable and accommodating.  These ladies make what can be an intimidating experience easy for you.  I highly recommend them!

name: Madelyn Candler
text: My sister and I brought in several pieces of pearl jewelry that had belonged to our mother. We wanted to repurpose the pieces into pieces that we thought would appeal to my daughters and my sister’s daughter-in-law. Emily met with us and listened to all we had to say about the styles we were looking for. Together we came up with designs that we thought each of the girls would like. When we went to pick them up, she had not made the final piece. After looking at all the others she felt that the design of the design of last piece was not comparable to the others and she feared we would not be satisfied. She had a new design drawn up for us to consider.  She was absolutely right; the original design needed the changes she made. We appreciate that she cared enough to wait on that last piece. As it turned out, that design became my favorite. Emily truly created beautiful pieces that we feel reflect the personalities of each girl.  There is no way our experience could not have been improved upon.

name: Daphne Davis
text: Took two weeks longer that promised to restring necklace.

name: Bertha Cade Clark
text: My watch needed a battery and when it was ready I received a call. Thank you Ware Jewelers.

name: John Guisinger
text: I went there to get a sterling silver chain for my Saint Christopher necklace. They ordered me a chain in the length that I wanted and when it came in they attached the medallion to it. They even polished it up to where it looked better than it ever has. All of the women that work there are very friendly and helpful. I'll definitely go back again for all of my jewelry needs. I highly recommend them!

name: Christina Mitchell
text: I walked into this store with my daughter looking for a certain item. The line is no longer carried, but I was directed to other items that were perfect for what I was looking for. I asked my daughter if that was what she wanted Santa to bring and the kind lady kept it going. When the item arrived in the store, she called and said Santa delivered an item. I was impressed she remembered after all the people she’s helped during that week. She was not available when I arrived at the store, but everyone was extremely friendly and helpful while I was in the store. I ended up buying another item while I was there and I left completely satisfied with the service I received. I would definitely recommend this store to others for the spectacular customer service.

name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. They are very much appreciated especially during this time. Please contact us if we can do anything for you.

name: April Aker
text: Ware Jewelers is quite possibly the best! Every one is friendly and helpful.  They remember their customers by name! That is important to me. This is why I shop only at Ware Jewelers!

name: Maggie Webb
text: My husband bought my rings from Ware's from Jennifer Chastain. Everyone there is amazing. We have talked to several people who have all been so helpful. One of my diamonds fell out of my band, and I was devastated. When I went in, they were very comforting and fixed it for free! I was going on a vacation the next week, and they gave me a ring to wear while I was on vacation. I will not buy jewelry from anywhere else because Ware's will take care of you.

name: Cynthia Ford
text: ALL the employees are so very nice and helpful. I bought several gifts there last week and Lindsey helped me find exactly what I wanted. Even had to make an exchange a few days later, and Lindsey didn’t seem to be bothered by it at all. I really did feel like I was the most important customer in the store.

name: Louis Clough
text: I’ve had the wonderful experience working with Ware Jewelers. Their staff is always eager to help in anyway possible. A top notch jeweler.

name: Richard Loftis
text: Very well run with great salespersons truly anxious to assist one with a smile. Wouldn’t shop anywhere else!

name: Colleen Mccann
text: Jo and all of the staff at Ware Jewelers in the Tiger Town location are so sweet! They clean my jewelry while I was there and have an amazing selection of fine jewelry and gifts.

name: Kay McClain
text: What an amazing store with amazing service. I cannot say enough about the service. They have a wonderful selection of jewelry, china, and gifts. However, if you can't locate what you need that is not very helpful. The folks that work there are so familiar with the inventory that you can just describe something and they appear with it. They remember their clients and send emails when items arrive that might be of interest. I have gotten reminders of sales and the items on sale that would interest me. They have special ordered pieces of jewelry for me to my delight. Their watch repairs service is also excellent. If I need a gift, I can find something there! It is far more than a jewelry store. I can't say enough about all the services available and the helpful staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Kay!  We really do try to go the extra mile, and it's wonderful to know how appreciated that is.

name: John Dennett
text: Outstanding service with a pleasant and professional staff!

name: Rootietoot Toot
text: They were very helpful. I had some rings resized and they did a perfect job, even cleaned and polished them!

name: Owen Smith
text: Wares Jewelry cares about their customers.  Not only are they professional, they are prompt and efficient.  Their many years of serving the Lee County area is proof of their continued commitment of satisfaction.

name: Jerry Robison
text: Quick and excellent service on my watch.  Looks like new again.  Very friendly staff.

name: David Whitten
text: It has been my experience that whatever in the line of jewelry I want or need, Ware Jewelers is the place to go.  I have lived and worked in Auburn for fifty years and one of the first people I met when moving here in 1968 was Lamar Ware.  He was a man of character who established his business to reflect his high standards.  Lamar is gone but his family maintains the high standards that he put into place years ago.  I am leaving Alabama and regret leaving behind a firm that I could always depend on.

resp.text:
David,
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated!  We are always just a phone call or email away !  Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

name: Clint Taylor
text:
My wife and I bought our wedding rings there in 1977 and have enjoyed doing business with them over the years. A wonderful hometown company.
Clint Taylor

name: Pludie Buckley
text: They are very friendly and very helpful,but I went in to have a coin engraved and they didn't engrave it. They glued an engagement on the coin. My husband was disappointed because he was afraid it would eventually come off.

resp.text:
Pludie,
Good Morning! We do not show a transaction under your name. We can engrave coins. Please call Ronnie Ware at Ware Jewelers in Auburn Alabama 334-821-7375

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring and it fell out. The list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! Also, If you get your pearls restrung there, they take them out of the store and they go to “Jo’s home, “ which is just totally unprofessional on every level.

name: Rebecca Palmer
text:
The lovely ladies at the Tiger Town location took great care of my repair job. I needed to have a ring sized correctly after a previous Jeweler had botched the job. It took me 3 months at the other place to get my ring back and it was wrong, but it only took me 3 days to get the correct size at Ware. Their Jeweler is awesome, and their staff is stellar.
UPDATE: once again the lady jeweler at Tiger Town location saves the day by sizing up my granddaughter's new ring in record fast time. Thanks Ms. Robin, it looks beautiful.

name: Cody B Van Houten
text: I have been shopping at Ware Jewelers all my life. As have my parents, and grandparents did. I trust no one else with my jewelry needs. Whether it be purchasing new pieces or servicing prior purchases, or maintaining my families jewelry. I trust no one else.

name: Ouida Webb
text:
Happiness is a gift box from Ware Jewelers!! Sometimes, the smallest boxes have the best surprises!!
Seriously, I love shopping at Wares. The stores are beautiful and so is their inventory. Customer service has always been awesome, regardless of whether I'm just browsing to ooh and ahh or shopping with a purpose! I enjoy every unique piece of jewelry I've purchased as well as items for my home. It is always easy to find a gift for someone, and my daughters get just as excited as I do when receiving a box wrapped in Ware's gift wrap!  I've shopped at Ware Jewelers for almost 40 years and look forward to 40 more!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ouida!  We love hearing about families that come to us across entire generations.  It really helps remind us of our own family ties, and how deep our roots are in the community!

name: Stephanie Randall
text: Repaired my rings so beautifully  they look brand new! Friendly staff and excellent customer service! Would recommend  to everyone!

name: Patti G. Reaves
text:
Went in the Tiger Town location to have a battery replaced in my watch. The young lady, Maddie, that helped me was very kind and courteous.
The reason for only 3 stars....it took a week for them to replace the battery.

name: Allen Lott
text:
Wife lost ear ring. Called Jo and explained situation. Birthday was in 10 days and I wanted a setting and diamond to match.
They came through and thier in house jeweler
Did a great job.

name: Sara Lee
text: Great workmanship on soldering my rings together and wonderful customer service!

name: Evelyn Mickle
text: Very helpful  staff,  good evaluation, price for repair reasonable,  quick service great work  very happy. With results

name: Tiffany Cole
text:
I had to have a set of pearls restrung for a second time.  The service was fabulous and she worked to find a way that would not cost me as much as it did the first time but will also provide greater strength in hopes of not breaking again.

The employees were friendly and professional!

name: Courtney Dios
text: Provided exceptional help with finding the perfect wedding ring and band for my husband. They were patient and willing to work with you until you found the perfect setting and diamonds. Would highly recommend their services as they were the best around Auburn hands down.

resp.text: Thank you, Courtney!  That's exactly the experience we hope people have when they come to see us, regardless of what they're looking for (but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a bit sentimental about engagement rings and wedding bands).

name: Rhonda Beadles
text: I had my watch band adjusted. Ware Jewelers is always my go to jewelry store. While I was there I found a gift for my first grandchild coming in December. They wrapped it beautifully for no extra charge. I love shopping there!!

name: JULIAN WHITTEN
text: Jennifer Chastain was most helpful and a pleasure to work with.

name: Patricia Frazier
text: The staff was friendly and very professional when I was looking for diamond earrings for my daughters birthday. She absolutely loves them and I will definitely visit this location and staff again for my jewelry needs.

name: Brooke Perkins
text: Always had great experiences working with Ware Jewelers. This is a great honorable company and has wonderful employees. Jo and Robin at the Tigertown location are the ladies I do most of me business with, but everyone there is pleasant and ready to help you with all your jewelry needs. Go see them. You will NOT be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you, Brooke!  Jo and Robin really do head up an amazing store over at Tiger Town, and it's always good to know people are having wonderful experiences working with them day in and day out!

name: Linda Jordan
text: Well pleased with the work done on my Rolex.Thank you!

name: Stephanie Wilbanks
text: This place is awesome. They were so helpful and patient with me when I changed my mind 200 times. They finally found me the perfect ring! I couldn't be happier!

name: Judy Miller
text: Robin was so helpful and offered suggestions without being pushy. She repaired my engagement ring and had it ready to pick up in one day! Thanks to her expert cleaning, my rings look new and my diamond is sparkling!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Judy!  We're very lucky to have Robin here with us, and are thrilled to hear she took such good care of you!

name: Rodney Moore
text: Overall experience was pleasant. Robin helped with a bracelet purchase and provided her usual excellent service. Those who assisted with paperwork and pickup were cheerful and a pleasure to interact with.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Rodney!  We count ourselves very lucky to have Robin with us, and we're glad to hear she and the rest of the staff take such good care of you.

name: Cheryl Stevenson
text: The Jewelers were extremely professional, helpful, and provided a quality product with which I am completely satisfied!

name: Steve Lock
text: Wares is always wonderful to work with!!  Friendly, professional staff!!  Very knowledgeable!!  Would recommend to everyone!!

name: Erik Van Slyke
text: The custom pendant made by Emily was gorgeous!  And the staff was always warm, welcoming and very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. Very much appreciated.

name: K P
text: My engagement ring is amazing! They helped my husband so much with choosing a diamond and creating my ring. The quality at Ware's is so much better than other stores and I would never trust my jewelery to anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you Katie!  We're thrilled that you love your ring so much!

name: Taylor Swann
text: Ware Jewelers has always been my family's jewelers since before I was born! I have always received the best customer service each time I shop, and always end up with such beautiful jewelry! I highly recommend Ware Jewelers!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Taylor!  It is always humbling to be reminded of how many people have been shopping with us across entire generations of their families.  Thank you for letting us be there for you!

name: Gita Smith
text:
I look for two things when I shop for jewelry, and Ware Jewelers has them both.
The first is top quality merchandise because it is important to know that craftsmanship and materials will last a lifetime.
The second is a personal relationship with the store staff. They understand my tastes and they do not try to push me towards something just for the sake of a quick sale. If I visit Ware, I might ask to see three or four pieces and buy nothing at the moment. Nevertheless, they are always gracious.
Gita Smith

resp.text: Thank you, Gita.  We strive to carry the finest brands for our customers, but I think you really hit it on the head with your assessment of the relationships we strive to build.  We believe that our job isn't done right unless you're happy; it's always about much more than just a sale.

name: Jeannie Railey
text: Jo Harper helped us threw the process of my wedding band...We liked our service so much we purchased a crystal canister for our sand ceremony and our cake plate from wares .. She went above and beyond to make sure we were happy..She was at the one Auburn offices at the time..I'd use wares again if I ever wanted to purchase jewelry..

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jeannie!  Jo has been such an amazing credit to the Ware family, we're lucky to have her and so pleased she took such good care of you!

name: J D HARRIS
text: Great service and sales. No pressure to purchase.

name: Quentin Padgett
text: Excellent service and product knowledge. Staff is always friendly. Best manager ever!

name: Richard Prather
text: Lindsey always remembers me by name and is very helpful and courteous!  Couldn't ask for better customer service which is very refreshing when it's virtually non-existent in today's retail market!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Richard!  It's always our goal to make sure that your needs are foremost in our considerations.

name: Lucas Kerby
text: Joe is extremely knowledgeable about all products Wares offers. She is an amazing representative for Wares. I will be shopping here again.

resp.text: Thank you, Lucas!  Jo really is amazing, and we're lucky to have her!

name: Susan Hughley
text: Ward's Jewelers is the best place to shop for all your wedding gifts and jewelry.  I MET JOE AT the Village Mall...and she is still the Best!!!!!.the customer service is out standing.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susan!  Jo really is great, and we're glad she's been taking such good care of you!

name: Renee Folk
text: Love this store and one of managers Jo has been the most helpful. We will continue to buy Pandora,Auburn jewelry and other great gifts Love,Love,Love❤️❤️❤️

name: Jerry Rayfield
text: Fantastic every time i have been in there. Friendly,  knowledgeable staff.  Excellent quality!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jerry!  We appreciate the vote of confidence!

name: Jeannette Calderon
text: Good service. Excellent staff.

name: Miste Vickers
text: Jo always has such a bubbly, cheerful  attitude. We have had the pleasure of shopping with her for over 10 years. She is the reason we always shop with Wares. She always goes above and beyond to fit our needs.

resp.text: Thank you Miste!  Jo's a really amazing person, and we're so glad you've made that connection with her.

name: Heather Wilson
text: Everyone was very nice and easy to work with. Jennifer did a great job helping us select the perfect rings for our wedding!

name: Jamie Bradfield
text:
Ariel spent about 30-40 minutes with me while I decided on a 25 year anniversary ring.  It was important to me and she showed the same enthusiasm in selecting the right ring to mark this significant anniversary.  The whole staff showed sincere interest in my choice.  It was reassuring to know I made the correct decision with their input.

Jamie Bradfield
LaGrange, GA

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jamie!  25 years is something to celebrate, and we're glad Ariel and the rest of our Tiger Town staff could help you bring your own plans to fruition.  Congratulations!

name: Jackie Young
text: Excellent customer service from door being opened when entered and greeted and leaving a charm for engraving on a Friday and it being ready on Monday already!!! Well done.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Jackie!  We're glad we were able to get that back to you so quickly!

name: Charles Mickle
text: Great service, quick turnaround on my watch repair

name: Tiffany Trueblood-Adkins
text: Wonderful items, professional, knowledgeable  and friendly staff. When making a jewelry purchase, this is the service you want and deserve.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Tiffany!  We'll do our best to keep living up to expectations!

name: Carla Blatt
text: Very nice and helpful employees.  Turn around is extremely quick.

name: Summer Galloway
text: The staff is always polite and friendly and they do great repair work.

name: Wally Armstrong
text: Very courteous and helpful, and outstanding service. Would highly recommend and will definitely use again.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the kind words, Wally!  We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to work with you.

name: Chad Finnegan
text: Great team, quality and follow up. Will purchase from here again.

name: Trisha Mobley
text: Great jewelry store where customer service and satisfaction is very important.

name: Maureen Heney
text:
Lindsey at Wares jewelers ag
TigerTown is a great
Salesperson .she has gotten to know what I like and suggests things to me. She is not pushy and always willing to hold something for me
For a
Couple days. I also have had repairs done there which have turned out great. Very happy with tiger town wares and especially Lindsey Turner. I wish they carried David Yurman and Lagos but I love their selection of John Hardy jewelry.
Maureen

resp.text: Thank you, Maureen!  We're so glad you've had such good experiences with Lindsey!

name: Georgia Dennett
text: Great service. I got exactly what I was looking for!

name: Lenore Bacek
text: Very professionally written appraisal.

name: Kristin Nelson
text: They are always so friendly and helpful.  Also, they have the best selections!

resp.text: Thank you, Kristin!

name: Marcia Wamble
text: More than satisfied with my recent experience of purchasing a gift item at Wares in Tiger Town.

resp.text: Thank you, Marcia!  We're always happy to help!

name: Brandon Culpepper
text: Very helpful and quick but done right and Joe is a great sales representative

resp.text: Thank you very much, Brandon!  We value the time you choose to spend with us and always want to make sure you get the most out of it.

name: Susan Boes
text: I have a good experience as Kiera is always friendly and helpful with my needs. She is patient and listens wel..

resp.text: Thank you, Susan!  We're very glad Kiera has been taking such good care of you.

name: Jeni Elliott
text: Ware's always has the best gifts, and the entire staff is always so knowledgeable, sweet, and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you, Jeni!  We're always happy to be of service.

name: Karen H
text: Robin and Jo took great care of my daughters and I. Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Karen!  It's always good to hear positive feedback about our Tiger Town team!

name: Mary Meadows
text: The manager, Jo, provided excellent service!

name: Lessie McCreless
text: The associates are very welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Lessie!  We appreciate the kind words.

name: kelly creech
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff and beautiful merchandise.

resp.text: Thank you, Kelly!

name: Jesse Creech
text: Staff was extremely friendly, patient and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you, Jesse!  That's our goal with everyone who comes through our doors.  It's good to know we hit the mark!

name: Terrell Barrington
text: Guys if you need something for that special lady in your life go see Jo and she will hook you up with a gift that keeps on giving!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Terrell!

name: martha donald
text: They done a great job

resp.text: Thank you, Martha!

name: Amy Hutto
text: Friendly and loving staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Amy!

name: Kevin Broach
text: Loved everything about it!!! Go see Jo!!

resp.text: Thank you, Kevin!

name: Marie Yelvington
text: Wonderful service!

resp.text: Thank you, Marie!

name: Joshua Jones
text: Pretty said that only 2 scrub stores in Decatur and this one opens at 10:00AM, but no one is here and it is 16 after 10. Sad. Poor business model. Doubt I’ll be back.

name: Lisa Davidson
text: Great place . Owner  is extremely  nice. Great prices to.

name: Inna Golovachko
text: What an amazing service! Stephanie was a pleasure to talk to and the shipment arrived within a couple of days. Stephanie even included some samples of the perfumes that she makes as well as body butter samples. Which I must say, smell amazing!!! Thank you for a great customer service! We will be ordering again in the near future!

name: Debbie Birt
text: I have been a customer for at least 30 yrs I started shopping when the old owner was there and enjoyed her very much she always told me that when I laughed it reminded her of her cousin and now with the new owners I’am also having a great experience she her husband and daughters are always nice and have always done a great job with the fragrances I pick and even if I need something redone they will do it for me always aiming to please

name: Sissy johnson
text: Service was great. I love this store and recommend it to friends

name: April Mason
text: I used to like going there when the old lady that owned it, worked there. But now, the new owner doesn't know how to mix the perfume up. My perfume that I bought was runny. And she has been sorta rude to me and my husband. I wish that the original owner would buy the place back.

name: Casey Hayes
text: Always so nice !!

name: David Goodwin
text: Perfume an colonge of all kinds

name: A H
text: Thank You Martha Rea’s! My mom loves the  flowers I had delivered for her birthday!!  Will definitely buy from you again!

name: Alisha Myrsa
text: Very helpful people.

name: Helena Bosch
text: I am so thrilled with the service and flowers! I ordered (online) a cake made of flowers the day before! And they were delivered as ordered and looked beautiful. Thank you so much.

name: Jude Saint
text: Timely delivery. My wife loved the roses 🌹.

name: Menita Hyde
text: I called at 4:00 in the afternoon with an urgent request for flowers to be delivered to a funeral home and the service was the next morning. The florist was so kind to work with me to get a basket out that day. She was limited in what she could offer but she took time to let me know my options and put together a lovely basket. The family was very complimentary of how beautiful the basket was. Thank you so much for going above and beyond to offer exceptional customer service.

name: Allan Dunlap
text: The go to for all your floal arrangements.

name: Lydia Nations
text: Flowers were suppose to be delivered by 12pm for my friends birthday, did not arrive till 3:40pm. I called the shop to see if the mistake was from bloomstoday.com or their shop. She said they must have missed the notice of the time. I guess the positive thing is they were honest...the flowers are pretty. :/

name: Charlotte Maise
text: Great job on the pink and white carnations delivered to my granddaughter. She loved them and said that they were the prettiest flowers she had ever seen. I was just sent a recent picture of them and they are still beautiful!

name: Erin Brager
text: I had the best experience ever. I will definitely be returning. The flowers smelled amazing and were delivered promptly. I actually wanted the flowers delivered outside of their delivery hours and the owner personally accommodated my wishes. I received Grade A customer service and I was also notified before and after she delivered them. She was a delight to do business with. I am overjoyed with my entire encounter.

name: Beth Hart
text: Martha Rea’s had been a referral for us out-of-towners so I was not worried about the quality or delivery, but both were right on target. My mother was very pleased with her birthday bouquet! Thank you.

name: varbara VLove
text: Great customer service

name: Amber Mertens
text: I use Martha Rea's often for business and always receive excellent customer service. Then, last week, I was on the recipient side of the delivery. My husband found out about Martha Rea's through an online search (not knowing that I use their services for business) and liked what he saw on their website and gave them a call. I received a beautiful arrangement in a very lovely vase at work the same day he placed the order. It was a wonderful surprise! By the way, the flowers are still beautiful a week later.

name: Shamara Ray
text: I am thrilled with the beautiful arrangement delivered to my daughter on her 25th birthday.  It could not have been more perfect.  The customer service was magnificent.  Such friendly people.

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Thank you for delivering these flowers - however, the balloon that was attached said "Happy Birthday", and I know that I ordered the "I Love You" balloon.  We are not upset, but rather, wanted to ensure you knew that attention to detail was lacking on this order.  For $73, I think that the order should at least be correct.  Thanks.

name: Marina Bowing
text: Such a nice place. Here you can find so many beautiful flowers. Each of them is decorated in a different original way. I was happy to find what I needed and bought a little more than I should, but I don't regret. They were gorgeous!

name: Anthony Raybon
text: I have purchased flowers through them numerous times now, they are always gorgeous and delivered in a timely manner.  I definitely recommend them to others!

name: Arlette Willis
text: My experience is noteworthy, the florists diligently worked to assure a timely arrival of my purchase! The floral arrangement was breathtakingly beautiful and very much appreciated. Thank you for your respectful care and attention to detail. This a florist I will call upon again!

name: Rick Hendrick
text: Thank you for going the extra mile for my delivery! You guys are the best!

name: Vicki Scott
text: This florist is so understanding and kind. She listened to my desires for my Mother's Urn and delivered the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen. She went out of her way to get the arrangement to the funeral home in Wetumpka on time and took great consideration and care to insure they would be beautiful, and they were. I wanted big and beautiful and she did more than that. You wouldn't work with a kinder person who listens and then you let her take it from there. You won't be disappointed and you won't be unhappy with wilting flowers. She a master of her craft. ~Vicki~

name: Teresa Rodden
text:
Nothing better than getting a picture and message saying how our flower arrangement put somebody else’s bouquet to shame.

Job well done!

name: Guardian Adjusters and Appraisers
text: Lovely sympathy floral basket. Thank you.

name: danielle jones
text:
Placed same day order on 8/27 for my mom's 75 birthday. The delivery man called my mom and said that he has been trying to catch up with her all day...lies! And that he could not come back to the house because it was out of his way - unprofessional behavior. My mom knew there was a delivery so she stayed home.

This morning I spoke to my mom who started that the flowers were on their way (around 9:30, 10 am) l, by 12 still no flowers...wow! I called the florist and spoke to I could care less PAM and told her to cancel my order.
Common sense would tell you to deliver flowers that you did not deliver on the previous day, butI guess they're a little slow.
Bottom line...I will never use this florist again, they've ruined my mom's special day. You disgust me...end of story!!!!

name: Uschi K
text: I highly recommend Martha Rea's Florist. This is a business that means to please and this has been the most amazing experience. When recently I had a disappointing delivery, Maria came to my house and substituted with a beautiful and healthy plant. Thank you Maria!

name: Chad White
text: These guys are fantastic.  Delivered my wife a beautiful arrangement with a little teddy bear on our anniversary very quickly.  Thanks again guys!

name: Danielle Davis
text: Terrible customer service!!!! I paid for a birthday bouquet for my mother's 50th birthday. I called to make SURE it would be delivered today. My mother was out of town of town doing mission work on her ACTUAL birthday and I am out of state and could not be there with her.  I spent all day thinking about how delighted she would be to get her surprise gift and They called me 15 minutes before they closed to tell me that they tried to take the flowers but it was too cold and they had no number for her, but they had MY number and didn't say anything until the employees were about to  walk out the door. Whoever was on the phone said they could do it TUESDAY....what in the WORLD. I am out of state and not able to be there for my mother's birthday celebration and the ONLY thing I had for her today is ruined. 1 hour before her birthday dinner she has NOTHING from me.  I am beyond upset. Thanks for ruining the birthday surprise. ....Terrible.

name: Nancy Breland
text:
I just wanted to thank your florist for the beautiful arrangement that you just made for my brother who is at Baptist South. He just got out of surgery after the flowers were delivered and was so delighted at how beautiful they were! He especially loved the lilies!
Thank you for making his sister (me) so thankful that her best wishes were sent to him,
with such beauty❣️
Sincerely,
Nancy Breland
Bainbridge, Georgia

name: Erin Dahlen
text: I have placed online orders at Martha Rea's twice now. I live in North Carolina and am having flowers delivered to my mom in a hospital in Montgomery. The flowers were delivered the same day I ordered them and were beautiful according to mom. Very pleased with the service, even for those of us out of state!

name: Kaylan Maradie
text: Spent 100 dollars, flowers looked absolutely nothing like picture. Don’t waist your money

name: Jean Fader
text: Beautiful flowers. Need to get web orders working properly.

name: Dontae Williams
text:
Placed last minute orders online. Delivered within three hours to my wife!

You guys ROCK!

Thanks for what you do.

name: Kim Lingner
text: I walked in while they were closing and they still took the time to get my order in and I greatly appreciate them in this time of need !!!!

name: Christie Tarantino
text: I ordered flowers from Martha Rea's for my sick mother and her caregiver for Valentine's day.  I received the confirmation and assumed that the order would be delivered as promised.  I found out that the delivery was not made on Friday, and thought that maybe it would be delivered on Saturday due to a backlog.  When they were not delivered on Saturday, I placed a call to the florist this morning and was told that a manager would call me back.  5 hours later, I still have not received a call.  I'm very disappointed by the lack of customer service.  At the least, I could have received some sort of notice that the flowers wouldn't not be delivered on time so that I wouldn't have the expectation that they would be.  But, to add insult to injury, they are now not addressing the problem at all.  If you want to ensure your order would be processed, I would not order from Martha Rea's.

name: Jennifer Comer
text: I was ordering from out of state and they took careful thought on my requests in the notes portion of the online ordering process.  The arrangement exceeded my expectation in quality, size, and beauty. Thank you, Martha Rea's, for your talent and consideration. I look forward to using your services in the future.

name: Clay Dudley
text: I placed an order over the phone on a Wednesday to send flowers to an office that had an employee pass away. I requested the flowers to be delivered on Thursday AM. I called the office/client and came to find out that they never received the flowers. I spoke with someone on Friday morning and they apologized for not getting them out and explained that they did not file the order, but they did charge my account. I understood that mistakes happened, but requested that the flowers be delivered promptly that morning. I found out that they were not delivered until close to 4PM that Friday... after most of the office had gone home for the weekend. Mistakes happen, but if you cannot correct them and honor your word, then you clearly do not care about your customers. Needless to say, I will not be using Martha Rea's again.

name: joan williams
text: Having been a patron while at home in Montgomery; being overseas in Doha,Qatar your online services allows me to deliver love across the oceans. Thank you MarthaRea's

name: Martha White
text: The flowers I've received from Martha Rea's have been of the highest quality.  The flowers are fresh, beautiful, and creatively arranged.

name: Simona Yelder
text: Thank you so much for all your help Ms.Maurean.I hope I'm saying  your name right. You was so helpful, I really appreciate all you did.

name: Adrian Hopkins
text:
Ordered through Teleflora same day. Arrangement was poorly put together.

Rose buds weren't matched well(some closed, some half open, some full bloom)

Leaves weren't trimmed well. Hopefully they bloom nicely

name: Brian Wren
text: HORRIBLE. Ordered 14 roses to come with spray roses and 3 balloons. What did my wife receive? 7 roses with spray roses and no balloons. Attempted to get it corrected and they were the rudest people we have ever dealt with. tried to make my wife believe i was lying about what i ordered. (i have receipts obviously) and even told my wife to be thankful she got anything on valentines day because she (the owner) had no one to give her anything for valentines day. Well if this is the way she treats customers i can only imagine how she treats people who arent supporting her business. i guess we see why she has noone. Flower situation was never corrected although she did get the balloons but not before they had my wife in tears with their rudeness.

name: Glenda Russell
text: Arrangements from Martha Rae's are ALWAYS beautiful.  If I'm sending or receiving I have never been disappointed.

name: Kathy Jackson
text: had flowers sent to my mother in montgomery and they were beautiful she loved them and the whole house was talking about these flowers for months .. great job

name: Let's talk with Jd & Me Me D
text: I've been ordering from out of state for the last 2 years and my recipient is always, always satisfied with her arrangements.. Thank youuuuuuuuuu!!!

name: Lauren Phelps
text: I order flowers from out of town and they couldn't have been more helpful!  They took the time to contact me and make the necessary arrangements for flowers going to a near by funeral home.

name: James Files
text: Thanks SO much.  Lynn loved the arrangement!

name: John Alexander
text: I've never been to the florist in person but have used them many times to send flowers to my daughter in Alabama. We have always been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Alexander we appreciate you and Mrs. Alexander tremendously!! We know how important it can be to a parent to celebrate a child's birthday and we are delighted you choose Martha Rea's for your floral needs! Thank you again and looking forward to continue the tradition!!

name: Joshua Simmons
text: Delivered on time and beautiful! My Gf absolutely adored them!

name: Daphne Johnson
text: Great customer service although I gave the wrong delivery address. Thank you very much.

name: Eric Isaacson
text: Whenever I need to impress someone I always immediately go to Jane and her talented crew. She has helped me out from dates to thank you gifts and even my moms birthday. Being an entreprenuer in the service industry I rarley run into places that meet my high standards for service, but this place met and exceeded! I highly recommend them for any of their sevices! Have used them and will continue to use them!!

name: Jenny Kim
text: It's very unkind. I will never go back.

name: Jay Villagomez
text: The corsage she did for my daughter was amazing!!! Honestly dont think i paid enough for it!!! Thank you guys so much!!

name: Josh Bryan
text: Ordered an arrangement for out of state for my mother who lives in Montgomery. The arrangement arrived as promised and was beautiful!

name: Troy Gerren
text: This is the most unprofessional florist I have ever come across. I ordered a white standing spray for a funeral. I paid  $95 for this arrangement and received 5 flowers in it. Tried to talk to the florist and they actually tried to suggest that the funeral home took the roses out that was not even advertised in the arrangement.When mentioned that the website says 100% guaranteed and was told the website does not state that. Then she had an attitude when talking to me.

resp.text:
We have gone through all of our past sales receipts for the past two weeks, and we are unable to find a receipt associated with your name. It seems that your purchase may have been done through a different service other than marthareasflorist.com.
Here at Martha Rea's we proudly support our local funeral homes and other business and we are sorry to hear that another company misinformed you about our affiliation. Best of luck getting in contact with that service to resolve this matter.

For future floral references please feel free to contact us directly, 334-262-1991 or visit our friendly website at http://www.marthareasflorist.com/ so we can handle your floral needs directly.

Best Wishes,
Martha's Rea's Floral Team

name: Robbie Amunds
text: Ordered same day delivery online at 9AM this morning. Never received it. Called the store 5 times throughout the day and left two voicemails and never got a call back. Hopefully I will get them tomorrow. Very disappointed.

name: Darius Holley
text: Always Wonderful! I will not use anyone else EVER!

name: Kim Namjoon's Sweetheart
text: Beautiful arrangements, great customer service.

name: Michael Davis
text: Awesome. Martha Rea's sure made a beautiful arrangement for my precious girlfriend. Thanks a million.

name: Trish P.
text: They were so helpful & kind. I really appreciate them!!!!

name: William Stone
text: 32 years together and the flowers made it special. great job!!!!

name: Kevin Temple
text: Very nice flowers!

name: leonard gordon
text: Great florist and outstanding service

name: Mary Lynne Wright
text: Wonderful customer service! Thanks!

name: Austin Cook
text: Terrible customer service, and a terrible attitude. I cancelled my order so I can't speak on the flowers.

name: Vermon Tate
text: Terrible customer service. Shop somewhere else.

name: jennifer wilkerson
text: Very dependable and good prices

name: Doing Whatsright
text: Horrible

name: Stacey Powell
text: Such a cute shop. They have thr cutest styles in clothes , bags and shoes.

name: Moses Billups
text: Great customer service and really nice outfits already put together

name: Celina Payne
text: So cute!! Loved going here and found the cutest onesie for my neice!

name: Kylie Jerkins
text: The customer service at Francesca's is above and beyond. After walking around all afternoon looking for a dress that was appropriate for a basic training graduation, I was so close to just giving up. I ended up at Francesca's as a last ditch effort, thinking that they didn't carry anything of that caliber, and the two store associates there threw together at least 10 different full outfits for me to try on. I ended up falling in love with one of the outfits, so they also helped me pick some accessories. They were so helpful, attentive, and caring. I'll definitely return.

name: Josie D Earnest
text: amazing selection and even better costumer service!

name: Olivia Ja
text: Create selection for teens and young adults..

name: LeeAnn Powers
text: Trisha. Trisha was FABULOUS!!! I will come back just because she was so nice and helpful! And yes, that is her job, but I've worked in retail management for a few years now and that was above and beyond! First time shopper turned lifelong shopper. That's what you look for in retail. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Krissy W.
text: Love shopping here!

name: Elnora Beck
text: Good shopping and very good customer service.

name: Grace H
text: So annoying way to talkative be warned they will talk to you while you are in the dressing room and be right there after you open the curtain, way to pushy and in your face.

name: Steve Brown
text: Was looking to trade in a old ring I had purchased from Kay to bring down the cost. Found the ring I wanted in the store and decided to think about it. After leaving checked Kay's website and found the same ring for the same cost without trading in my ring. First thing came to mind was "You Croaks". I almost gave you "CROAKS" my ring for nothing. BUYERS BEWARE THIS IS WHAT IT HAS COME TO.

name: Deanna Salazar
text: My husband wanting to surprise me for Christmas this year 2020 and doing so we went to Kay in Decatur on the 24th of December. We got there and he purchase me a beautiful ring-! The young lady Jasmine was working and was helping us to decide and making this the best experience ever-! With the holidays here Jasmine told us it would take about 2 plus weeks for it to be returned. I went into the storr tonight just to see if my ring was back and to my surprise it was-! With the holidays and everything it did take the 2 weeks-! Jasmine and the other young lady that night (Diana) was wonderful-! Jasmine tonight was wonderfule-! I recommend them to anyone-! Thanks again Jasmine

name: Sarah Blakely
text: I went to Google to get the store's number and saw the last 2 reviews and had to say something! We will be calling corporate as well! We NEVER go to the Decatur location, because of past experiences,  but recently we had a wedding to attend in town and stopped in. Jessica, the store Manager, was INCREDIBLE.  I had dreaded walking in and she immediately made us feel at home. The reason I am leaving a review is because not only was the man claiming a dispute with his credit company in there and behaving like an absolute juvenile, I fully believe the call she received from who I gathered (from eavesdropping tbh) was corporate was in regards to the man on here complaining about "an order." First of all, I am a retail manager as well. If I gave a return on a machine we sent somewhere for maintenance I would lose my job.  The man acted like a baby, and my husband was irate that a grown man should behave that way. The manager, though, was nothing less than professional,  and dealt with it better than I would have for sure! Secondly,  when I listened to her phone conversation about pendant man,  Jessica said more than once but shouldn't we do something for him, they hadn't found out if they could yet (or something like that.) All I thought that day was wow, people are so rude, and it's not even their fault. I never thought I would recommend the Decatur store, but 100% I recommend to everyone! The staff is nice, I actually trust them for once, and the manager Jessica is clearly willing to go above and beyond to try to help you even when you act like a total jerk to her. I admit even I kinda did at first, I just expected the kind of service that caused us to stop going there. Jessica if you see this, you have customers for life - The Blakely Family

name: corey house
text: Dishonest, no Integrity, and their word means nothing. Bought diamond earrings from Decatur, Al store and thought ordered custom diamond picture pendant to match earrings. After several assurances the piece could be made kay finally told me the piece couldn't be made but would not take earrings back because 30 day window passed for refund but it passed because I was waiting on pendant to be made. I did inform kay in beginning that I was getting earrings and pendant as set. They finally told me custom order was never put in is the reason for no refund which wasnt my fault. I don't work for kay and I don't know the protocol  but the store manager took my order or at least I thought and once they couldn't deliver they used a technicality to keep my money. They dont have the best merchandise anyway but make sure you cross your t's and dot your i's when dealing with them.

name: Chasity Warren
text: I had went to two different jewelers to order my daughter a class ring and no one seemed to care to help, just told to go online. I did not know her size and she was with me but no one seemed to want to help. Walked into Kay jewelers on 6th ave and it was totally different. They were super friendly and there’s was also online but she pulled it up and ordered it with me there and sized my daughter. We received it today and went in to pick up and love it and also the same friendliness. Thank you for being good at what you do!

name: Amanda Lambert
text: Me and my husband were at Kay Jewelers tonight. The gentleman that helped us was very pleasant. We had a great experience picking out my valentine’s present.

name: Paul Eichwurtzle
text: Friendly, thorough, professional service. Reasonable pricing.

name: Midnight_Rider 2020
text: Good and pretty jewelry

name: Jo Dumas
text: Bought a pocket watch for my son in law for his graduation from the police academy. Took it back there 2 times to have it engraved. They couldn't find the engraving paperwork both times. Thought since I purchased it there it wouldn't be a problem to have it engraved.Will be taking it somewhere else. Very unprofessional staff.

name: Ashlie Richie
text: I took my husbands wedding ring in to be sized and they told us to come back in two weeks to pick it up. When we got there to get his ring they couldn’t find it and asked us if we were sure it was this store that we used. Then they finally found it and the bag it was in had giant red writing on it that said “Have Not Paid”. I explained to the lady that when I bought the ring I also bought the warranty and that when they found us in the system two weeks prior that they said because I bought that we would not have to pay for it to be sized. She looked us up in the system and could not find us again. When we came in the first time they had trouble finding me in the system and the same lady took all my information and said she would update me in the computer so we would not have to go through all of that again. When I explained that, she laughed and said “Oh that was me haha I didn’t do it.” So they spend like 20 minutes just trying to find us in the computer and then acted like they didn’t want to give us our ring once they found us. We found out after we left that after all of that they did not even size it!! We definitely will NOT be coming back here.

name: Michael R
text: Gary, the manager, assured me my ring would be in the month before my wedding, and told me if he was ever out of the store his co-manager Cristy would take care of me. Nobody followed up with me regarding the ring or informed me they would not have it by the date we needed it. A week before the wedding date I called up to the store and was told Gary was out of town so I left my name and number and asked to have Cristy call me. No response. Two days later I called and again asked for Cristy by name. The girl came back to the phone and said Cristy did not call me back because Gary knew about my account, not her. She didn't take my call. We did not have a ring on the wedding date, we couldn't even talk to anybody who knew the status. I finally received the ring, well past the wedding date, about twice as long as Gary told me it would take. Gary repeatedly blamed the shop for not having or knowing about my ring. When I picked up the ring I told Gary they dropped the ball and I felt like they should adjust the price of the ring - or do something to make it right. Gary looked me in the eyes and told me "I will go to bat for you" in regards to making it right, he said he would contact me in a few days. After a month I called Gary back today to ask for his district managers number, in hopes of finally getting a resolution. Gary said to me, "I thought we were done when you picked up your ring". A far cry from going to bat for me like he said he would. I feel like Gary intentionally lied to me to get rid of me. I closed my account and wont do business with Kay or Gary or Cristy again.

name: Zach Richie
text: Not good service. Didnt believe we bought my wedding band there even though it was in the computer. Took it to get sized and it was never sized. The woman claimed we didn't have warranty on the ring and almost refused to give it to me. They finally found it in the computer and saying it wasn't purchased there and they pulled it up 2 weeks before hand. Will take my business elsewhere.

name: Captain_Redpill
text: Ever since the store changed locations and employees the only kiss that begins with this Kay's is kiss customer appreciation and service goodbye.

name: farrah derusseaux
text: Awesome, Excellent Customer Service

name: Landon Smith
text: Love the staff here! Very friendly and helpful.

name: Ashley Kirby
text: I had the worst experience ever with this store. I took my engagement ring in for its 6 month checkup and to go down a quarter of a size. They told me to come back in two weeks and it will be here. So two weeks later we go in to get it and it’s been ruined when they went to go down a half a size. Had a huge gash in it, popped out two big diamonds and a diamond on the side. We were heartbroken, they also told us that it was a discontinued ring so they couldn’t reorder another ring and to pick another ring. So I spent a couple days looking and just couldn’t find any ring that I liked. So I ended up going to the Kay’s in bridgestreet and instantly falling in love with one. Told them the situation and they were so shocked. They said they had never had a ring be sent off and be ruined at their store. They told me to tell Decatur which one I wanted and they could have it ordered. So my fiancé called Decatur asking if they could have it in my size and ordered and the girl said absolutely you can, come tomorrow and we will have it all ready for you. Well we go the next day and the girls calling all these places just to come back to me to say we can’t get your ring in a size for you so pick another ring. I was so upset. They ruined my ring, then told me the night before they could just to have me go all the way to the store to tell me no they can’t pick another one. I was so angry I ended up leaving. I later in the week went back to the bridestreet and they were so shocked with Decatur’s performance to us, they said we can absolutely get you the ring you want in the size you need and they were confused why Decatur told us we couldn’t. They told us to go into Decatur, get our ring and walk out and call customer service. So we did and the store manager himself fixed us up at bridgestreet with the ring we wanted, plus the band, the size we wanted, and ensured us it would be in two weeks in time for engagement pictures. Yesterday my ring came in, it’s absolutely perfect!! It just goes to show Decatur is very unprofessional, their workers are unskilled and the store manager not once came to handle the situation or talked to us about it even when we were two feet away from her. Decatur has forever lost my service and bridestreet will forever by my hero’s who came in and cleaned up their mess.

name: Brandi Perry
text: Sandy, the store manager, at the Decatur store, is so rude and unprefesionel. Kay lost a lot of family business because of her. She was so awful she was reported to cooperate. Sandy. Customer service is a must in retail.

name: Holly Stiles
text: Had a great experience at first but slowly the customer service dwindled. Julie was always helpful and kind. Jennifer, not so much. Our last interaction she told me that I might need to find another pharmacy to fill my DME needs, after I questioned the length of time it took to file claims with BCBS. She thought I wouldn’t be able to find a supplier who could file in a timely manner. Guess what? I found one who files in less than a week and doesn’t create a backlog of claims for me to monitor. Thanks for pushing me in that direction, Jennifer. I’ve taken over $9,000 in business elsewhere.

name: Beth Tidwell
text: Long wait times. Don't fill meds when they are called in. "Lost" meds that were called in. And they're more expensive than other pharmacies.

name: david uptain
text: I have always been treated with respect and they're always ready to help with any problems that I have  I've been using Ken Glover drugs since they first opened I am well satisfied with their business

name: Elizabeth Patton
text: Contacted this pharmacy about a breast pump provided by BCBS.  Was promised that they would deliver it a month before the due date but it never arrived.  I have called numerous times with no one picking up, been on hold over ten minutes each time, and left several messages with no return call. Awful service, awful customer service.  I was hoping to work with a local small business but this isn't how you do business.  I'll have to call St. Vincent's in Birmingham now.

name: Caren Brown
text:
I would give 0 stars if that was an option but it's not. They will not return calls. I called to order my daughter's CGM supplies, they said would ship out the next day, a week later still haven't gotten them. Left 2 messages today and no return call. This has happened in the past too. Hoping to find another supplier.
Poor customer service.

name: jill billions
text: Have gotten Durable Medical Equipment for my daughter with CP here for years. They used to be very good. I don't know what has changed but they must be very busy. No longer return phone calls, can't answer questions about bills,..have been trying to reach them over two weeks for a billing question. Needed a replacement tube for my daughter who is fed through a g-tube into her stomach and it took a month. Too bad. down hill.

name: Samantha
text: Very difficult to get in contact with. Tried for days to get a hold of someone to fill my Dexcom transmitter order with no response during their office hours, emergency line was also sent to an unanswered voicemail. I consider my CGM a lifeline for me. My blood sugars are very difficult to manage without it, and I've been "flying blind" for days now. Will be switching to a different company. Not pleased with the lack of customer service from the Ken Glover employees.

I told them, so i never really know if I’m buying used glasses because if someone bought a pair and wore them for 29 days and returned them, then they would resell them?  She said yes. So watch out because you don’t know if your buying used glasses or out the box and I’m pretty sure the tiny scratch that was on my wife’s was not from us but was already on it because we got to notice the frams were stretched

text: I love this store and the owners! The owners are so kind and very helpful! I always find something I like in this store.

name: Erin Hurlbutt
text:
Very kind people.
I purchased a very nice mug there, and they could tell me anything and everything about how to clean it and where I can use it etc.
After I left, I went to the coffee shop next door and bought a coffee. When I walked back out on the street, I was trying to get situated with my coffee and straw and other things in my arms and ended up dropping my $25 mug that I just bought for my mom for Christmas. My dad was with me and he picked up the bag and walked us back to the store to buy another one. He knew I really wanted to get my mom that mug because she loved it so much but didn’t buy it for herself.
When we walked in, Dad set the bag on the counter and we went to find another mug( keep in mind these are beautiful, handmade mugs) that looked similar to the one I bought earlier. Everyone working there was concerned and immediately tried to help us find one that looked closest to the other one. Once we found one, we walked to the counter to pay. A man who was so kind and helpful wrapped our new mug and handed it to my dad and said, “Merry Christmas.”
He didn’t make us pay for that second mug. We were both shocked. We walked outside and I started to cry. I was so grateful for his kindness. It’s not very often that you come across people with such big hearts anymore. My Dad hugged me and and told me that they just earned themselves business for a long time. He couldn’t be more right. I will never forget their kindness.

text: Went to francescas 10 minutes before they closed and knew exactly what I wanted. I said by the time I walked over there they would be closed and she said “well we are closed too.” It was 8:50 and they close at 9. I bought my stuff and left and was out the door by 8:55. I’ve worked in restaurants that close at 10 and had people walk in at 9:55 and order food and keep us there until 11 or later and we only get paid 2 an hour. This “manager” should really work on her customer relations if she wants people to return.

name: Maxine Downing
text: My family has used Fergusons for decades and I know why. I ordered a blanket for my mother's funeral and it contained what I requested but I left the rest to them and it was stunning! I also received numerous arrangements for the occassion from Fergusons as well and they were absolutely beautiful. When I placed my order, I was assured they would take care of me (as I was nervous because I was ordering for my family) and they did not disappoint, nor have they ever. They are my go-to florist for anything local.

name: Stacey Garmon
text: Wes did a fabulous job on flowers for my daughter’s wedding.  Good price, EXCELLENT customer service.

name: Seneka Stokes
text: I order a floral arrangement for my Mother for Mother’s Day and it started dying after two days. Not only that, the floral arrangement I asked for was nowhere near as full as the one I saw on the website. When I went to pick the arrangement up and asked about its fullness, I was told that the flowers would bloom once they get warm. Some of the small roses that were in the arrangement were broken when I picked it up. There was green floral tape around the top rim of the vase which could have been easily concealed with a nice ribbon. It was so much green foam in the bottom of the small sized vase. That may be why the flowers aren’t lasting as they don’t have enough room and are poorly cut and crammed in. We put the few flowers that we could salvage in a larger vase. It’s unfortunate that I paid $66 dollars for an arrangement that my mother will only get to enjoy for a few days. I have Walmart flower bouquets that are outlasting these. I usually buy special occasion flowers from Publix at a cheaper price and better quality work, but I wanted to patronize Ferguson’s florist because they are a locally owned business. However I will not use their service again because it seems as though the work was rushed and thrown together and just not worth the money.

name: Tashara Janae
text:
I have been ordering flowers for my mother every two weeks since the unfortunate passing of her husband. The flowers have not been up to par. We went to the florist today to return the flowers. When they arrived they were cut too short, looked nothing like the picture and were drooping and dying after two days. We arrived with a photo of the online order and were told that there was a shortage of flowers and they “substituted.” However, the substitution was poor quality. The owner, Noah Ferguson, came
To speak with us. He was rude, condescending and spoke disrespectfully to me and my mother. I will NEVER order from Ferguson again. I will be reporting this business to the BBB.

name: Enga Sturns
text: They are very nice people but the wait time was a little frustrating

The flowers for the funeral in May were exceptional. Honestly the prettiest flower arrangements I had ever laid eyes on. This last weekend an artificial arrangement was picked up for her headstone. I have to boast of how real and professional they looked. If anyone is considering going anywhere else in Alabama don't do it! :)

Thank you very much for all you have done this year!

text: We had the most beautiful flowers from your shop. We had lost one of our granddaughters , I wanted them to be very beautiful for her and they were, again thank you very much.

The food was delicious and the arrangements and flowers were awesome. Thank you so much for a job well done and so stress free.

text: I needed a special bouquet for a very special lady in my life, and I had a list of very particular flowers that I wanted in the bouquet. A few of the flowers were hard to come by due to the time of year, and I needed the bouquet in three days and Ferguson pulled it off! All 23 flowers were there and beautifully arranged. I will definitely be using Ferguson for all of my flower needs.

name: FireBerlin
text: It's so hard choosing a florist from out-of-state. I went with Ferguson Florist for a flower arrangement for my aunt who has lived in Attalla all of her life. She LOVED the arrangement, said it was the prettiest she had ever received. Her sister later confirmed that Ferguson Florist does very nice work.

name: Shirley Briggs
text: I received an arrangement from Ferguson’s and it Wes absolutely beautiful and the real test is if the flowers last a week they sure have thank you

name: Tammy
text: I want to say Thank You for doing a wonderful job on a floral arrangement that was done for my Mom and Dad's anniversary to put on Mom's gravesite.I had went to several florists trying to find the perfect arrangement and was very disappointed and didn't think I would find what I was looking for until I walked into Ferguson's.Everyone at Ferguson's was very polite and so willing to do their best at helping me to make sure I got the perfect arrangement to please my Dad.When my Dad went to pick it up the next day he was extremely happy with the arrangement.Ferguson's Florist has gotten two customer's that will only use Ferguson's for any arrangements we need from now on.If anyone wants to be pleased with beautiful arrangements and very polite,caring people then Ferguson's is the place to go.

name: Sebrina Crosby
text: I have never left a review for anything, good or bad, but the treatment I received from Ferguson Florist was so abhorrent, I felt compelled to not only leave a review but file a formal complaint with the BBB. I placed an order via their website to be delivered to a location clearly listed as one of the areas they service. A few hours later, I receive a call that they cannot deliver to that area. After being handed off to the manager, before I could even speak, the manager was SCREAMING at me that I'd have to pay 2.5 times the delivery fee that the website listed (which was determined after putting in the exact location). She said she didn't care if I got the flowers or not because I wasn't the one making them, they were.  She continued to scream and berate me. I have never, ever been treated so poorly by anyone, let alone anyone in any sort of customer service sector. The thing is, I would've paid the increase in the delivery fee, but it was the screaming and berating me, without even letting me explain what their own website said, that was so awful and upsetting.

name: Doug
text: I ordered a peace lilly for a funeral service.  They did not deliver the plant to the funeral home.  They refuse to own up to their mistake like a reputable business would and insinuate that the funeral home, my family and I are not being truthful.
