My family ordered several arrangements from Furgeson’s and several other from other florists but only the Ferguson’s arrangements were wilted or mush within 24 hours at the funeral home. Furguson’s blames the funeral home heating however the other arranments were unaffected. I’ve never experienced this before but considering the amount of money involved I will take my business elsewhere in the future.

Trying very hard to buy local - and have made several purchases there - but today might wrap that up.

resp.text: Scarlotte,  we sincerely regret your experience.   The detached nature of COVID protocols have been a challenge  in maintaining the  Happy Olive standard of customer experience.  We still work to ensure every valued customer enjoys their time in the store - and apologize for your frustrations.

text: Great locally own store with a fun assortment of food, skin care and other items, great for gifting or for yourself. A mix of locally sourced and imported goods. Most items would be hard to find elsewhere and many are produced on the premises.

name: Carrie Rollwagen
text:
The Pantry is a really lovely place to spend a meal or pick up quick, fresh food. Each day, they make fantastic meals out of organic, really healthy local food. It's true that some of the entrees can be kind of small, but the staff is really familiar with their menu, and they're honest about which meals are filling and which are lighter. The best thing is to let the staff know what you're in the mood for and ask them about their favorites (it's how I was introduced to their tomato tart, which is really outstanding).

The Pantry also makes fresh juice, and it all tastes amazing. I haven't studied the long-term benefits of juicing, but I know the juices here are delicious and make me feel great, so that's good enough for me. You can buy juice made that day out of the cooler or order something specific made while you wait.

This place is all about special little touches. The restaurant itself is small and incredibly charming, and they'll do things like serve free goat cheese samplers sometimes or serve cucumber water to add something special to every visit.

The Pantry also has a big selection of jams, cheeses, wine, beer and specialty items that make great treats or gifts for foodies. I haven't tried The Pantry for their waffle bar yet, but it's on my list after reading the other reviews.

name: Lee Harrison
text: Great healthy food prepared on site

name: Connie Settles

name: Taylor King
text: I've lived in Birmingham for 3 years now and this is one of the best places to eat in the Ham. Hands down, must try this place. You can feel the organic-ness from the second you walk in. Go eat here.

name: Christine Cole
text:
An amazingly chic, unique, charming, one-of-a-kind gift shop located in the heart of Crestline! Every item in this shop is specially note-worthy; you'll want to see everything, touch everything, then take everything home! From gorgeous antiques to fun gifts, and everything in between- it's like a small excellently curated museum where all the items can be purchased!!!
And the owners are extremely friendly, have great taste and will assist you in finding the perfect gift for children, the person who's impossible to shop for, and even something extraordinary for yourself (like the beautiful jewelry, handbags, or humorous hand-towels, keychains...) Really there is something for EVERYONE here!
Add it to your 'Must-visit' list!

name: Tammy Willis
text: What an awesome company.  I received one of their bouquets as a gift from my son who lives in Huntsville.  When I visited him this past June, I wanted to go to their store and arrange another bouquet for my home and have it shipped.  They were so friendly, helpful and talented in helping me arrange the perfect bouquet and having it shipped to my home in California.  Upon my return home, I received my package and unfortunately, the Post Office was a little rough with my package and damaged some of the flowers.  Anthony at Paper Petals assured me they would take care of me and that they did!  They replaced the damaged flowers in a very timely manner with great communication throughout the process.  Awesome customer service and I will not hesitate to use them again.  Their flowers are incredible, life like and beautiful.  Best part, I don't have to water or worry about dying.  Thank you!

resp.text: Hi Tammy, we're so glad you had a good experience with us (and that your replacement bouquet arrived safely!) It was great having you visit our studio and we really enjoyed arranging your bouquet together for you!

name: G Dunn
text: Beautiful flowers in store. I took a class to make cherry blossoms. Thao was a great teacher and very patient with us all. Everyone made beautiful flowers! LOVE

resp.text: Thank you for attending the class! It was so fun working with everyone. And we agree, everyone's flowers turned out lovely!

name: Mary Hinson
text: I went to Paper Petals Co at Lowe Mill and picked up and Zinnia Kit along with a cute vase! The kit came with all the materials needed and a code to the video tutorial. All you need are a pair of scissors! My family had such a fun time making these flowers and we were so happy with how they all came out!

resp.text: The flower you created looks gorgeous, Mary! Thank you to you and your family for giving our Craft Box a try!

name: Anastacia LaRocco
text: I don't even know where to begin when it comes to singing their praise. They are amazing when it comes to communication and they go above and beyond for their customers. I left a resin flower in their care that my father had made before he passed and I have been so nervous but they treated it with great care. Because of them my dad still gets to walk me down the aisle and I couldn't ask for more. They more than delivered on my wedding flowers and I'm so grateful they will forever be a part of my special day. Thank you so SO much!

resp.text: Staci, we absolutely loved working with you and your family! And seeing everyone's reaction to all of our flowers, especially the incorporation of your father's resin flower, made the occasion even more special. Thank you for choosing us to create such a sentimental piece for your special day!

name: Ashleigh Streeter
text:
I have followed Paper Petals Co. on social media for a couple of years now and have always wanted to order because their work is just so beautiful. I finally ordered two different items for Mother’s Day and WOW they did not disappoint! Absolutely stunning and detailed work! I am so happy with both bouquets. 10/10 Recommend!!

Also, the packing for the shipping was perfect and so well done! No concern about damage at all!

Everything I expected and more!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers for Mother's Day, Ashleigh! We're happy that you're happy with our flowers! We hope you and your loved ones will enjoy those flowers for years to come.

name: Bridget Brooke
text: We are in love with Thao's amazing work! My husband surprised me for our anniversary with a paper version of my flower crown from our wedding, and with the most adorable cherry blossoms for my birthday. We also sent a Mother's day bouquet that was absolutely gorgeous. I cannot say enough good things, and now want to fill my entire house with these gorgeous creations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Bridget! We loved recreating your flower crown and the rest of your florals so we're so happy to hear they were well received!

text: They have the most wonderfully crafted paper flower bouquets 🤩🌺😍! I've received compliment after complement for the paper flowers I've sent friends and loved ones.  Even better is the story behind the business.  We're very fortunate to have them in Huntsville 😁

resp.text: Thank you for your appreciation for our flowers, Shalin!! It was really a pleasure to chat with you when you stopped by the studio!

Couldn’t be happier, highly recommend!!

name: Kathleen N
text: During this strange chaotic time, I was looking for something to spark a sense of joy. I started in my venture of wanting to grow flowers/plants, but knowing I have a black thumb. As a result, I started looking into paper flowers. Instagram recommended Paper Petals Co. after some search, and I began reading up on the company’s mission statement. I will be honest and say, I also have a very soft spot for Asian women entrepreneurs who are thriving in their businesses. I am so excited to eventually get many more flowers, but I did send a bouquet to a friend and can’t wait to see my friend’s reaction. With that said, I am incredibly impressed by Thao’s talent, her passion for her work, and her kindness as a human. It’s been such a pleasure conversing with her, and I plan to continue supporting this business that brings so much happiness.

resp.text: Reading your words of kindness and encouragement have truly made our days, Kathleen! Thank you so much for all of the support you've given us and we cannot wait for you to one day visit our studio!

I placed my order on Saturday and it was delivered Sunday. I cried, it’s honestly that exquisite, and such a welcome distraction from all that’s going on in our world today. I don’t have a creative bone in my body, but it’s been a lovely activity. Thank you so much, Thao!!

resp.text: Sunny, you are too sweet!! It really means a lot that my Craft Box could bring you such a good experience during this crazy time. Thank you so much!

name: April L. Butler
text: The team at the Kay Jewelers in Brookwood Mall were a wonderful help and so patient while designing an upgraded ring for me.  Excellent service and seemingly unlimited options for even the pickiest bride.  If we ever upgrade again, this is where I'll go, hands down!

name: Dawn Productions
text: I had a great experience there today 12/11/19 as usual. I don’t know why I even attempted to go to any other Kay’s because they don’t have anything and they will basically harass you to buy something. However, I’ve never had that experience at Brookwood. The ladies are always helpful, nice, and they don’t harass you (which is a plus, because If I feel like you’re pressuring me I will walk out and not purchase anything.) Brookwood always have a great selection of jewelry and great customer service. And I am one of those people who “wants to buy something but don’t know what” aka “the complicated, undecided shopper”. Today a young girl name Chariot helped me trade my old ring and pick a new one I wanted to give my mom for Christmas.  She was guided by the of the mangers, I didn’t get her name. But she was a cute middle age black woman. They suggested things to help me make a decision and I purchased my moms gift and actually felt good about it. (Unlike when I purchase something at other Kay’s and end up returning it LOL). Thanks for helping me today and keep up the good work. Soon you guys soon !!!

name: Jackie Carter
text: My fiancé and I loved our experience here! Great staff who were knowledgeable and helped us find the perfect ring! We will be going back!

text: i alway buy from Alexis at Kay Brookwood mall! She is the best and takes the time to meet my needs or let me know what I need. She is like my personal agent, Thats how she makes everyone feel and its rare and special. If you have a need. Go there, every time.

name: Matthew Leonardi
text: By far the best customer service I have ever received, my fiance and I went to pick out our wedding bands and was warmly greater by Ms. Blevins. She was extremely nice, extremely patient, and made sure we got exactly what we wanted at a great deal. She was extremely kind so much that we offered to take her to dinner for her amazing help. Such an incredible professional atmosphere. The rest of the staff was friendly to. I highly suggest going there and asking to speak to Ms.Blevins for she will make you feel right home. They were so friendly that we stay after our purchase for about a half hour just to have conversation. IF YOU WANT PROFESSIONAL AND KIND HELP LOOK NO MORE, MS.BLEVINS IS WHO YOUR LOOKING FOR.

text: Manager was rude and pushy. She even took a personal phone call while consulting with me...

name: Shelby Sam
text: This store has really turned around the past few months! Ask for Chris

name: Lyndsey Batista
text: I was very disappointed in the service I received from the Kay’s associates. I was there a little while ago to pick out a promise ring my boyfriend was going to purchase for me. When I entered the store I was not greeted what so ever. I stood in that store for over 15 minutes and no one had said a word to me. I can understand being busy with other customers or not realizing someone had walked in but 2 separate employees had walked past me and didn’t even acknowledge my presence. By the time an associate did assist me I was very bothered but they didn’t seem to want to assist someone that was “just looking”. The person seemed highly irritated once I told him I was just looking for a promise ring my boyfriend is buying for me. 10/10 do not recommend this store and will only be shopping at Zales or Jared’s form now on.

name: Marchello Perkins
text: Was in Kay's for 30 minutes and the lady refused to acknowledge my presence, over there playing on phone and running customers off....smh...good help hard to find. Wish I would've gotten her name, she's white and wears glasses in the Hoover's location. Just no assistance

text: Amazing! The man that attended us today was very nice with us and payed full attention to what we wanted and helped us a lot. He was also very kind. Thank you again sir.

name: Doressa Glover
text: Great customer service the beautiful African American female was awesome. Sorry I forgot her name but she ROCKS.

name: Brigit Thomas
text: Love this store and the service is exceptional. Also, I love my ring!

name: Jonathan Saliba
text: The manager, Christie, is one of the most nicest and most professional people that you will ever meet. My wife lost and earning and I was trying to replace it. Christie went above and beyond!!! She called I am not sure where to see if they still had this type of earring and of course after 10 years from the original purchase they did not. She then called the people that make the jewelry to see if they could make the pair for me again. They could but it was at a much higher price than the original purchase. I didn’t go that route. I came back today months after talking with her about some other pieces and she helped me again. I am not sure about the other comments about the manager are all about but Christie is the reason I will continue to shop at this store. She deserves a raise and some kind of recognition for what she does everyday. I literally could have walked out and gone to one of the many other jewelers stores in the mall and probably gotten something very similar but because of her I did not. Thank you for the great customer experience.

name: amy mims
text: Christy the store manager was wonderful! Polite, professional and just precious! The bears that help St. Jude's just made me love this Kay's location that much more!!!!!

name: BOBBY EDWARDS
text:
wife purchased a band for our anniversary and 1 year later a diamond fell out took it back to store had it repaired. Three years later another diamond has fallen out this time they wouldn't repair it so I will take it to another jeweler that is not kay and have it repaired .
DO NOT BUY ANY JEWELRY FROM THEM THEY'RE PRICES ARE TO HIGH FOR A CHEAP  PRODUCT .

name: jaime hudson
text: My husband and I had Christie helping us and she honestly made our whole wedding experience 10x better helping us with our rings. She truly cared and was interested in our big day and wanted us to have the best experience possible. She was wonderful & so helpful, loved her very much!

name: Christie Thomas
text: I just love the location and Ms. Christie and I bonded as if we were best friends. ( Same name and spelling.) The service was great from her and Krissa. I will be going back sooner than later.  😍😍😍 Thanks ladies for great customer service.

name: Jeanetta Conner
text: I have been a Kays customer for at least 15 years. The service is normally good but that has changed with the store manager now. She is very condescending and not sympathetic to customer issues. When you have defective jewelry that you're selling as high quality, that's a problem. If I bring something back to you once because of a defect, you would think you would make sure that never happens again. So if I have to bring it back a 2nd then 3rd time, now you're wasting not only my money but my time. For the first time in over 15 years I did not feel like a valued customer at all. I will never spend another penny in this Kay's again.

text: We bought my finance's engagement ring and wedding band, also my wedding band. Love the people that work there. They're very helpful and nice. Always friendly when we take our rings to get cleaned.

text: Again, Christine and Andrea did an exceptional job helping me order the perfect diamond earrings for my daughter's 18th birthday.

name: Krysta Pearson
text: I have a Kay's near me but because of the great experiences I've had and continue to have at this location I drive an hour to this location even if it is just for my free inspections. Perfect experience every time.

text: The ladies here are always so nice.

name: Kawanna Bryant
text: The sales associate, April, was very respectful and helpful. She was attentive from the time I walked in to the time I walked out. I will definitely come here for all my jewelry needs from now on.

name: Colter C
text: I purchased a  Mother's Day present today at Kay Jewelers, and I had a pleasant and productive shopping experience.  Peggy was friendly and helpful.  Thank you!

name: Hannah Tell
text:
Go anywhere but here. Kays in general has some unethical sales practices. They WILL lie to you.

Returning the engagement ring we bought today because they told my anxiously excited BF the ring he picked was in my size (5) only to tell him after paying it was a 6 (another associate told me no ring in the store has EVER been in a 5) She just lied because she knew how badly he wanted to give me a ring now.

I plan to bring it back and tell her another kay store has it in my size just so I can hear her tell me "we never carry 5's" after that bold face lie she told my BF.

F*** Kays....they also told me id get an additional 10% off for getting a credit card, so I did even though we wanted to pay cash, only to be told right after getting approved the discount couldn't be applied. Now I'm stuck with their credit card. Seriously, just go ANYWHERE but kays. I have friends who have worked there and this is STANDARD.

name: Ashely Harrell
text: I truly want to give the ladies at the Kay Jewelers in the Riverchase Galleria Mall the biggest compliment I can. April and Christie went above and beyond with their customer service to help me with my issue and ensure all my needs were met. I had to get my wedding ring cleaned and repaired as a diamond had fell out. I sent the pieces of jewelry off mid-March and was expecting them back around early-April. My jewelry ticket consisted of one diamond in my band to be replaced, the three separate pieces sautered together, and the final ring cleaned. Upon mid-April, I did not hear from the store on the status of my ring so my husband and I went to the store in person to get an update. Ms. April informed me that the ring was being held because they wanted to make sure that I was okay with how the ring would potentially come out and discuss any pitfalls. I was informed there would be a potential gap in the ring once the pieces were sautered together. Upon me giving the okay, the ring was supposedly sent to be fixed and I continued to wait patiently. During that time, Ms. April helped me find two other LeVian rings that were on sale and that were absolutely gorgeous and suitable to wear at my job. I decided that once my other rings came back, I would get the two new rings resized for my finger. Coming into the first week of May, I discovered my ring was still not back and at this point I was getting very flustered. Ms. Christie spoke with me and ensured that she would get my ring repaired and back to me quickly and had apologized for the long wait. She personally made sure to let the jeweler know to expedite the process. When my ring finally did arrive back, the middle stone of the main ring was still cloudy, there was black residue on the ring bands, the ring was resized even smaller than my finger, and the same diamond was missing when it was presented to me. At this point I was livid, upset, and refused to do any more business with Kay Jewelers. Despite my ordeal, Ms. April and Ms. Christie showed me the greatest empathy for my situation. I was given a comforting and sorrowful hug from Ms. April. Ms. Christie personally took my ring to the jeweler and stayed with it until it was complete so that I would have the ring that same day and not have to wait any longer then I already had. In addition, she ensured that the other two rings that I recently purchased was resized that say day and back on my hand. These ladies truly exemplify the highest standard for customer service. My frustration and anger was not toward these two ladies but toward the poor service I received from the people repairing my ring. Now I do not take my ring off. Each ring or necklace I get from Kay’s is not just a piece of jewelry, but it is a story of my life. With these ladies understanding that, they will continue to earn my business from here on out.

text: My fiancé proposed to me with a beautiful ring from this location Kay's. When we returned to look at bands, the sales associate proceeded to tell us that it isn't a $1300 worth of rewards, it's 1300 rewards points. She also told us you have to spend an outrageous amount to even redeem any of your "$1300" reward points. That same day I had my ring and band sent off to be resized. The sales lady told me that they would be ready on the twentieth, which was nearly two weeks. I showed up today to pick up my rings, and a very rude pretentious older sales man informed me that neither of my rings were ready to pick up and that I would have to come back another time. I was pretty pissed to say the least. And I am still waiting for a call about picking up my rings. I would not recommend this store at all.

name: Jason
text: The Zales in Foley Alabama has employees that will mislead you. The told my wife a size 7 ring with wrap around stones could be sized to a 5. Then stated it would be a 3 to 4 week wait to get it sized, then recommended another jeweler to size it in 24 hours. We bought the ring ( over $1000) and went to the other jeweler who said there was no way he could sized it and they knew. When we took it back ( 1 hour later) they started acting like they could only refund $200, they did end up refunding the whole amount. This sale was a blatant lie from the beginning.  An attempt to make a sale at all costs and not refund your money. Full of lies.

name: Kathrine Steinbach
text:
I’ve always heard bad things about signet owned jewelry stores and big brand jewelry stores but I never experienced it first hand until I visited this store.

I received a lovely white sapphire ring as a gift which was purchased online. About a month after receiving the ring, it became apparent to me that the main stone was loose (it was not only wiggly and I could feel it, but it was actually rattling audibly). From being loose there was dust/dirt trapped between the stone and the basket of the stone. Keep in mind I had not been wearing it daily so it was surprising it came loose after such a short period of time.

I brought the ring to the foley Zales to have the sterling silver prongs tightened and the basket cleaned. The rep there said since it wasn’t purchased with warranty I had to pay out of pocket for both the cleaning and repair. It would cost $90.00. (Almost as much as the gift itself, but I couldn’t do anything about the fact it hadnt been purchased without a warranty and I wasn’t going to call up the person who gave it to because that would be rude).

When I picked up the ring I was ready to pay for services done, except the moment my hands touched it I knew it was still loose. I showed the representatives behind the counter and they swore up and down to me that it wasn’t loose and it was my imagination. They wiggled it and one even got her pen ink on it trying to “disprove” me.

They said they could send it back free of charge so I said ok. But I got a bad feeling and since it had become a sentimental gift I felt like I no longer trusted that store to handle it since I felt like they were lying to me about it not being loose. I asked them for it back and they said yes but they would have to charge me the $90.00. I didn’t want to have a confrontation with them so I paid and figured maybe I should just get a second opinion because it very well could be my imagination.

She swipes my card and is packing it up and I said “I hear it rattling, tell me you can’t hear that! Call me crazy, It can’t be my imagination!”

She held it up to her ear and to my surprise said “yes! I do hear it rattling. You’re not crazy”.

Im dumbfounded!! Before I paid, she said it wasn’t loose, lied to my face, then the moment I swiped my card, she acknowledged it was loose!!! I am appalled. I’m just going to dispute the transaction with my bank now because there is no way I trust the people working there. And I’m going to advise the person who purchased it for me to do the same. I won’t be making any purchases from jewelry stores like this again. I learned the hard way, at least this time it was only $90 instead of $900

text: "First things first we have to wear a mask"  i was in about a week ago. The lady tried multiple times to make me wear a muzzle so I went to zales at the mall in mobile. I gave them 8 grand, They have a awesome staff and a better selection. Highly recommend zales.

name: Joshua Morrison
text: Katie is the awesome my wife’s necklace would have never been fixed if she hadn’t taken the time to help me. Thank you!

name: MBG GLOBAL
text: Tator she's awesome

name: Brie Cook Sanders
text: Katrina (Store Manager) The Worst Customer service ever! She's very argumentative, very unprofessional, She hung up in our face twice, said her manager would stand behind her 100 percent. We asked to speak with her district manager she told us she could not do that and continue to argue with us! This entire experience from the store and corporate has been the worst ever! This Kays has not been the same since they moved from Spanish Fort and Renee' was moved to the Pace Store! Sadly our jewelry was already paid for and shipped to that store for my mother in law! Now were having a hard time getting it order. BAD MANAGEMENT!!!! We will be contacting Mr.Brown

name: Shelley Moore
text: We love the ladies at the Daphne location. They are always so helpful and take great care of our family.

name: Mandey Shiver
text: The engagement ring that I had now had for five years kept loosing diamonds every couple of months.  I was so frustrated with this happening. Luckily, every time I went into Kay’s to get it sent off I dealt with the same sweet girl, Elizabeth.  Elizabeth was always very understanding and apologetic.  After about the fourth time of loosing a diamond Elizabeth told me she would talk to her manager to see if they could get me a new ring or just pick out a completely different one.  I sent it off that time and believe it or not, four months later a diamond was missing again. I went back up to Kay’s and luckily Elizabeth was there and I didn’t even have to explain to her what happened, she remembered every detail we had talked about.  I ended up picking out a simple solitaire ring. I hated having to change the ring design but luckily because of Elizabeth’s AMAZING customer service and patience the process was a breeze! Every Kay store needs an Elizabeth in their store!

name: James Jones
text: Overall experience @kay jewelry jubilee square Daphane,Al. Wonderful the ladies are amazing great personalities, she insisted to wrap my purchase as if it was Christmas all over. My visit was tremendous I will most definitely be doing more business. Thanks ladies Catrina and stuff...!

name: Jessica Ascott
text: Joann and Katrina were such a great help with getting my engagement ring cleaned and answering any questions we had about other wedding ring purchases! My fiance and I always have great service when coming here and the staff is always ready to help out!

name: John Tesch
text: Very helpful

name: James Hay
text: Are always energetic and positive when I walk in.  They remember each of my family member’s names and ask how they are doing.  Very friendly and personable.

name: Edward McCall
text: Love how friendly the sales associate are made me feel like I could get anything in the store....

name: David Gatlin
text: Great experience! The staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Stacey Lavender
text: I called today to order 2 links for a watch that was not purchased from them but a brand they carry. I was told that yes they CAN order links had I purchased the watch from them, but since I did not purchase the watch from them, I had to order them directly from the manufacturer. To be told they would not help me because the watch was not bought from them(which I did not purchase the watch, it was a gift for my dad) put a nail in the coffin. I have spent a lot of money in there over the years but they will never receive another penny of my money. SUPER POOR BUSINESS PRACTICES!!!!!!!

name: Amanda Carrier
text: The ladies that work are super sweet and incredibly helpful ❤

name: Cara Rigby
text:
HORRIBLE MANAGER NAMED MICHELLE!!!

Worst Customer service ive ever experienced anywhere! Went to Kays about a week & a half ago to look and purchase an engagement ring with my fiance. Starting looking at rings in our budget and was only shown 1 ring which I loved (& the girl who showed us the ring got kinda in trouble for showing it to us) until they said they were having a diamond show & started showing me rings from those cases, apparently they only have a diamond show every so often and I was shown about 3 rings or so from those cases & ended up picking one of the 3 after being felt like those were the only ones in our budget and  I was pressured into it. We were able to get the ring sized that day & take it home.

Skip to week or so later, I decided to just browse online at rings that were in our budget & that said available in store at my local store. Came across several beautiful rings that I was NEVER shown to begin with so I decided to call and speak with the manager who helped us & told her about how I had seen a few online that said they were available in store & in our budget, so I go to the store to see them in person to make sure I didn't pick the wrong ring.
Got there & the manager who from the first visit was super helpful and nice, didn't speak to me once when I entered the store. I showed the girl who was helping me a few rings I seen online that said they were in store & the first ring she said " oh we just sold that ring" the 2nd and 3rd ring I showed her she Said " I don't think we have it" & I was like "why would it say it was in store if It wasnt?" She couldn't give me an answer. She did everything in her power to convince me to keep the ring I had but that pissed me off even more so I still ended up returning the ring which I know they aren't happy about, but I wasn't happy with being pretty much only shown options that benefited them. They didn't treat me the same as the first experience & u just don't do your customers that way. Regardless. I will do everything to make sure everyone is aware of how crooked this place is.

Also, after returning the ring (which was leased throigh progressive) we made an account online to see how the process of the refund was going, come to find out our total was double the price we were told it would be in store from the kay employees. The deposit we put down was suppose to be 79 dollars and would also be the amount of our monthy payment & after looking online we discovered they charged us 86 dollars for the deposit & that our payments would be 91.60 WEEKLY! We were told 79 dollars and some change monthly and then it shot up to 91.60 weekly! They never went over the contract or interest rate with us.

After the return I asked the employee if everything on their end was done and all we were waiting on was the leasing company to do their part. Called the leasing company to find out that they were waiting on KAYS to send the invoice over to get the refund process done & taken care of.

Called Kays once again to speak with the unprofessional, rude heifer off a "Manager" to make sure they sent the invoice in and to try to get some answers as to why she never vocally disclosed with us while signing the lease that our total was actually double the price she told us, & she would not answer the question. All she would say was "you made the return, what else do you need, blah blah.." How they can get away with is beyond me, after asking her multiple times times she actually HUNG UP on us. I called bk & another girl asnwer the phone, I continued to try to get answers we as customers deserved & as I was speaking the girl started pressing buttons on the phone & then hung up on me, incredibly immature & unprofessional. I am mind blown at my experience. I made a complaint with corporate, with the better business Bureau and got intouch with the district manager with the help of another kays manager of a different location!
KAYS IS A FREAKING JOKE, THEY LIE & NEVER FULLY DISCLOSE THE FULL TRUTH & PRICE TO THEIR CUSTOMERS IN ORDER TO MAKE THEIR SALES & COMMISSION!

name: Kim Tracey ella
text: Nice stuff good personnel willing to help you

name: Colton Pennington
text: The worst place ever! They do not know how to answer the phone. And when they do answer the phone their rude! I refuse to buy anything else from Kay's!

name: Darius McCall
text: One of the best group of jewelers I have ever dealt with!!!!!!!!!!!! Katrina was great

name: Alex Nguyen
text: Didn't like the shipping service that they provide with the  customization

name: Charley Farmer
text: Stopped for Sunday lunch. Great food and staff. Got a couple cinnamon rolls for the road. They were excellent. Will stop again!

name: Earlene V. Arnold
text: Always pleasant when we go there. Food is very delicious and delectable!

name: Doris Hall
text: I stop by this morning to try the cinnamon rolls and they were delicious. Will definitely stop by again. I highly  recommend the caramel pecan cinnamon rolls ❤.

name: Laura Brantley
text:
Everyone was very friendly.The cinnamon rolls are delicious.
We will be going back!

name: Glenda Flowers

name: Sherry Barnhart
text: Love it

text: Has a variety of everything

name: Boni Carter
text: Great clothes at a great price. Friendly and helpful staff. Love this store!

name: Madi Martinez
text: Favorite boutique in Town!! Great prices and the cutest clothes! The inside of the store is too cute and the website is so cute and easy to use!❤️

name: Sarah Armstrong
text: This place has adorable clothes and super friendly and helpful staff!

text:
Best  !!!!!  ... Truly Great Collection...

Hope to hear from You Soon

Great store!!!!!

name: Lacy Smith
text: Love this adorable shop! Karen is super sweet and helpful. This is one of my favorite locally owned shops downtown. She offers great choices of sustainable home items, stationery, art, and plants. She’s always so friendly and makes you feel welcome and appreciated. I’ve even stayed to talk almost every time I’ve stopped by. Order online for delivery or pick up or stop by! You won’t be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you, Lacy!! I appreciate you!

name: Beth Taylor
text: What a fun little burst of creativity here in Woodlawn! Stop in for a gift for someone else, or just a little something for you! They even have workshops!!!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping by and writing a kind review, Beth!

name: Rae Noling
text: One of my favorite small businesses! Great selection and customer service. I just can't get enough of the vibe this place has, it's lovely!

name: Kelsey Sizemore
text: I have loved every experience I've had at Trove so far! The shop is super cute but shopping online has also been very easy. I've bought several gifts for friends- Karen will even include a handwritten note with any shipments. I highly suggest supporting this small business!

resp.text: Thank you, Kelsey! I couldn't ask for a better customer.

name: Kaitlin Slattery
text: What a beautiful little treasure TROVE. Karen is a wonderful designer and you can see the influence reflected in her young business! Our family of three wandered in the other night during special hours and I immediately connected with this perfect little book. It housed sketches from a year in France and has been such a fun read and visual inspiration. Makes me definitely want to pick up a sketchbook again and attend one of her 'Drawing Night' workshops hosted at her space!

name: Jaymi Furniss-Jones
text: Karen was so helpful, accommodating and responsive! The vase I purchased was beautiful and delivered promptly! Highly recommend.

name: Matthew Smith
text: Chill vibes and cool space.

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Matthew Conde
text: TOP NOTCH FLORIST! Bella Blooms is always on the spot with providing excellent, quick service with a reasonable price! They are very creative when it comes to their floral designs (not just flowers in a vase). Highly recommend!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: I just got married on Halloween and I was shocked by the magic Jason & Michelle worked for me!! Honestly the most beautiful floral arrangements I'd ever seen. I received so many compliments. Jason is SO easy to talk to and listened to all of my requests. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: rick merriam
text: This is the real deal florist. They have the best service and the best flower arrangement my wife has ever seen. I used to go to Homewood to get her flowers but not any more. This place is worth the drive

name: Amy B
text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels

text: thay Have been good to the family for many years.when my brother passed thay were there and done a good job.thank you....

text: I live in Texas, my son is buried in Alex City. On special occasions I have Grace’s Flower shop to lay a bundle of sunflowers on his bench. They take a picture of the flowers & text it to me when they deliver them. They are always over the top beautiful! I work at a florist so I know they have given extra care in their arrangements. I can’t thank them enough for their thoughtfulness! They go beyond my expectations! Thank you to all of them! I highly recommend them to anyone who wants beautiful flowers prepared with love & care!!!

name: Rob Smith
text: I moved away from Alex City in 1990 when I graduated from high school. Ever since then, I've called Grace's Flowers twice a year for them to make a special arrangement for my mom for her birthday and for Mother's Day. For 28 years, they've helped me from afar make my mom's special days even brighter with beautiful arrangements and live plant baskets when I can't be there myself. Thank you ladies for all you do, and I look forward to calling you for many more years to come.

name: Cat Tubulov
text: Ordered white roses with blue hydrangea & clear square vase..... sent to Russell Medical Center.  Within two hours my order was delivered!!!  Fast & Efficient service even during one of the busiest times of the year....Valentines!!  Thank you Grace's Flowers!!  Highly recommend this florist!

OUTSTANDING!!!!!

name: rebecca smith
text: Such a great family friendly environment. The management staff is top notch. Run here. My babies have grown up here getting their hair done. My 9 year old loves getting her nails painted as well. Ask for Olivia when you go. Best hair place in Mobile.

name: Yuliya Ugay Brown
text: Stuff is very nice and  friendly. But I asked not to cut hair from the ears and see what happened... He had ears covered with hair.

text: Absolutely loved them!! Went for the first time today & i felt so welcomed & was treated GREAT!! Highly recommend them!!

name: Tamara Perry
text: Wonderful salon for my 7 year old. It's fun and they have fun products. She loves it every time we go!

name: Katie A Barnett
text:
I just stumbled upon Knots Salon simply because I needed my haircut ASAP. I called on a Saturday and was able to get an appointment that same day!
The salon's setup is so chic! I immediately fell in love with the ambience. I have thick natural curly hair so I am always nervous having my haircut by someone new. When I scheduled my appointment I requested someone who has experience with cutting curly hair...and of course that's exact stylist I got! I was just a walk-in expecting to get my hair cut and go back to my original stylist after her leave, but instead Knots Salon just got another regular client!!!
I also tell everyone about this place because I was shocked that I didn't know about it!
I love Knots Salon for life
...Katie Barnett

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great compliment.  We certainly appreciate your business and will always strive to give you a 5 star experience.

name: Ashley Davis
text: We absolutely love Knots Salon! It's so inviting for kids, which is hard to find. We took our 2 year old, who is a very busy body, to Knots Salon for his first haircut. Angela is who we chose and she did absolutely AMAZING! She listened and did exactly what we asked. She was great and oh so patient with him! There's no where else our kiddos will go for any hair needs.

name: Amanda Negri
text: Amazing! Ms. Olivia was so great with our son and he loved it! Easy experience!

name: Raven Hamil
text: I love taking my child to get his hair cut at Knots! The staff are so sweet and very good at what they do. Leighana is so patient and takes the time to make sure she makes my son's hair look great! Would recommend Knots Salon to everyone I know. Especially for kids haircuts.

name: Amber A
text: Absolutely wonderful customer service! They pierced my daughter's ears, both at the same time and she got her first haircut and her very first Manicure💅

name: Mary Boice
text: Angela is always out to give me the exact hair style I want!  She didn't cut too much hair off the way other hair dresser do.  She is very sweet!  She has lots of experience!  You definitely want to ask for Angela!  She's the best!!

name: asten hamil
text: Knots is a really good salon especially for kids. Leighana does a really good job cutting my nephew's hair.

name: James Hudson
text: Inexperienced people run this place . Don’t set a appointment if your hair is “to thick “ because they will turn you down after waiting a week for your appointment.. horrible service . Anyone getting hair colored would definitely not recommend this place they clearly are inexperienced

resp.text: We are so sorry you did not have a good experience at our salon! It is our goal to provide excellent service for all of our customers. Unfortunately, the appointment scheduled online did not allow enough time for us to give you the color you were looking for. We hate that we disappointed you and hope that we can make it up to you. Please call us at 251-635-1313.

name: Reyna Coleman
text: We absolutely adore Ms. Olivia. She’s patient, kind, & caring.

name: Kristy Dyess
text: We love Olivia and everyone there. Michael has been going there since he was 1 and he is now 12!

name: Brittany Kimbrough
text: This morning, I made the mistake of taking my children to another salon. My daughter’s hair was long, halfway down her back, and I wanted 3 inches trimmed off. The girl butchered it and before I knew it, my daughter had an uneven bob above her shoulders and the girl just kept cutting and cutting on top of repeatedly blaming my daughter for not sitting still and blaming another customer for talking to my daughter and making her talk while she was cutting her hair. I refused to let her touch my son’s hair, we hopped in the car, and drove to Knots Salon. By the time I got there, I was in tears. ANGELA SAVED THE DAY. She fixed my daughter’s hair and gave my son a great cut, too. I will never take my kids anywhere else! Take your kids to Knots and ask for Angela. She works miracles and is so great with the kids.

name: Jennifer Hall
text: Great with first hair cuts and kids love to come!  They can’t wait to come back and sit in the cars. As a parent, it’s so convenient to be able to schedule appointments online.

name: Katie Ladnier
text: Very pleased. She only cut what I asked and was very understanding and easy to talk to. Enjoyed the shop itself aswell.

name: Megan Rushing
text: Best haircut and color I've had it years. Latisha Speese did amazing work with my long thick hair. Will return and can't wait to bring my daughter.

name: Ethan Bryant
text: Love getting my haircut at Knots. I've gotten my haircut by several stylist and all are pretty great at men's hair. The always use a warm towel when shampooing my hair, and give a great neck shave. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We love that you enjoy our services.  Thank you so very much for the great review.

name: Jessica Tillman
text: Marley did a great job on my 2 year old boy. First time haircut, and she was patient and kind, and most of all fast!! I got to keep his curls! We will be back for all his cuts. Love this place

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us this fabulous review. We really appreciate it!! We work really  hard to serve our guests and love to hear that we did a fantastic job.

text:
Amazing! Love it! Smells great!
Has only a small selection of lube but very resourceful for witchcraft related items.
Most of their clothing a jewelry are clearly drop-shipped and can be found for wayyyyyy cheaper on aliexspress. I guess you pay for the immediate satisfaction. The inside of the store is otherworldly and something rarely seen in Birmingham. A great store to just look around in!

text: Incredible work! My daughter is sick and flowers are her favorite. I believe these brightened her day. Thank you Joy's Flowers!

name: Jamie Moon
text: I ordered a premium floral arrangement for a funeral.  The basket was delivered on time to the viewing, which is more than I can say for some companies. However, it was not as pictured and it was the most pitiful, smallest, arrangement received that day. An $80 basket should not be an embarrassment.

name: Corey McIntyre
text: Flowers I ordered and had sent turned out beautiful..I did the custom pick and let the specialist work there magic ..excellent job and service ..highly recommend

text: I ordered and paid for the premium 68 dollar basket..to say when I saw this arrangement that I was sorely disappointed and felt taken advantage of for the amount I paid is an understatement! I live out of state, so I guess the florist thought that I wouldn't see the end product.... I will never recommend or use this florist again! I could have purchased a basket in my home town and delivered it myself for less than I paid for this arrangement.

name: Emily Crumpler
text: I order a few baskets at once for different people.  One basket got put at the house behind theirs (there are two houses on their lot). This business offered and took another one out right away, they fix the situation and did not act like it was a problem at all. I would order from them in a heartbeat.  I personally also thought the prices were reasonable.

You could barely see the roses. I was very disappointed as well after learning what he spent for it. He is still apologizing for it.

You will not be disappointed. Five stars

text: Joy's did my wedding and they did an AMAZING job!! They are my go-to florist for everything! They do such wonderful work and are always so kind! I give them all the stars and will continue to use them and refer them to friends!!

name: Casey Riddlesperger
text: Wonderful people. Great customer service. GORGEOUS flowers. Called with a last minute order needed for the next morning. Beyond impressed with the results. The arrangement was perfect!  Will definitely order from Joy’s again.

text: My experience with Joy's Flowers was outstanding! The ordering process was simple. They arrived very quickly. And the flowers were amazing! My mother loved them. I highly recommend ordering from them!

text: Grateful that Birmingham has a men’s store that has been recognized in the top ten in the nation. I bought a blazer there and the experience was top notch. Excellent service!

name: isaac Hughes
text: Amazing place. Not only is the staff friendly and courteous, but they also are very knowledgeable and helped me get the clothing that best suited me. Would absolutely recommend. A+ merchandise

name: Doug Zeiger
text: Our wedding was planned for May 2nd. Covid-19 became the reality and there was disaster after disaster. We cancelled, replanned, downsized, and resized to accommodate the changing world around us. At the start, I had expert advice and help from Ben who fashioned two outfits for the preceding parties. The styling, the fit, and the attention to detail was superb. If you like things done right, go to Shaia's. But the story continues, for the actual wedding day we had a tuxedo picked out that was being made in Italy. The factory had to shut down due to the virus and in the few weeks leading up to the wedding, I was facing quite the dilemma. Ben called me for a special appointment to come in and see what could be done from what was on hand at the store. Ben and Ken went far beyond the extra mile to make sure I was not only clothed for my wedding, but the tuxedo was classy, comfortable, and contained the right amount of original. I cannot recommend Shaia's any higher. There were even a few other minor disasters with needing a haircut and my brides' dress needing last minute alterations that we took to Ken because he just got things done. This is where you can truly see Ken's kindness. He helped us in a huge way during our time of need. Shaia's is a five star store from every angle thanks to a helpful, accommodating, and knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thanks Doug for your sincere review. Congratulations to you and your wife, we can't wait to see the photos.

text: Shaia's is a family owned men's clothing store that is unparalleled as far as service and selection. The store itself makes finding clothes/shoes fun and interactive, while the exceptional staff go out of their way to help you and ultimately build relationships which will last forever. My father first went to Shaia's in the early 1970's where he bought his first nice sports coat and has been a return customer since. The family atmosphere is one of a kind, and makes this store truly special.

name: Shawn David
text: My husband has only recently been interested in "nice clothes." He's known Ken Shaia for years but we've not shopped there regularly. I decided to take him there for his 50th birthday a couple of years ago. Not only did we have a great time, we got so many timeless pieces that my husband loves. I continue to shop there and build his wardrobe which is the beauty of shopping at Shaia's: nothing trendy; all classic, tailored pieces that make him feel like a million bucks. We can call Shaia's, describe an upcoming event, and they'll have the perfect ensemble put together when we get there or, better yet, something that will go perfectly with the pieces we've already bought. A great place!

name: George
text:
WOW! Absolutely positively the best shopping experience I have ever had. I have an athletic build and finding clothes that fit my physique is impossible. Well, until I met Greg Flowers. He was my consultant, and he gave me the most knowledgable, helpful & educational journey about properly fitting clothes, what a tailor can and cannot do, and how to layer elements together into a cohesive personal style that is all your own. Greg has in-depth knowledge of all the products in the store, how they fit, which brands flatter certain body types, how to build a cohesive wardrobe and what will look good on you in a way that fits your personal style. The atmosphere at the store is relaxing and makes shopping feel like you are strolling around at home chatting with very knowledge and suave friends.

After one visit I am a full convert. If you have trouble finding clothes that not only fit but also complement your very hard-earned physique, then do yourself a favor and go see Greg.

name: Steve H.
text:
Everyone has an idea of what "mall" means.  The Lake Martin Mini Mall doesn't really fit any definition that you're thinking of, though.  Although there's a lot of neat stuff inside, there aren't several separate, discrete stores or booths...it's all one business.

Drive by and you'll just see the concrete figurals outside.  We did that probably a dozen times, spread across our stays around Lake Martin.  As we were departing the area this week, my lady wanted to get her sister a garden ornament, so we popped in.  The management/owner(s) need to find a way to alert passersby that there is a plethora of neat stuff inside.  Crafty stuff, touristy stuff, paddleboards, Big Green Eggs, and who knows what else.  We were pinched for time, so I didn't have the opportunity to wander hither and yon, but if you're in the area, you could while away some time here.

Nice folks and a very clean bathroom.  Pick up a Lake Martin shirt or three, wander around and ogle the concrete statuary and wonder who would install that much gaudy in their yard.  Although the life-sized Great Dane figures were cool.  If I had a suitably-sized abode, I'd drop one of those things in the foyer or on the porch.
