text: Terrible customer service. There was a delivery that should have been made on February 14, 2021. The delivery was never made. No one has called about the delay. I have tried to call multiple times and no one answers. When I check online for the status of the order it says that they are "preparing it". I am really baffled by the lack of communication and professionalism from this store.

name: Henry McElreath
text: I use the website to order.  It is easy and quick. There is a huge selection of fruits and candies.  They deliver when they say they will and my friends are always happy with their baskets.

name: Andrew Phelps
text: Do not rely on their delivery. I ordered for my wife's birthday to be delivered to her workplace. It finally just made it... as they've packed up for the day. Silly me, i thought ordering a week in advance would be enough time for them to figure out how to deliver to a business

resp.text: Andrew, we apologize. Our mission is to always deliver the best possible customer service experience and we’re so sorry we fell short. We want to make this right. Please send us your order information at orderteam@edible.com.

name: Ruth Dailey
text: Placed an order to be delivered on Thursday and 3 days later had not arrived. Nobody answer the phone!

name: Allison
text: They were not even PLANNING to deliver my "SAME DAY DELIVERY" order until TWO DAYS LATER and did not even reach out to let me know. No phone call, no email, nothing. I even paid extra to have same day delivery. What the heck?? I had to call them to find out what was going on. Worst. Customer. Service. EVER. Will never order from here again. WOW.

name: S D
text: Horrible customer service, specifically on 23 Feb 21.  I’m on military orders in DC.  Ordered VDay gifts for my mom and daughter.  They failed to deliver my order for VDay, understandably due to weather.  Spoke to them twice patiently thru the week.  Was told they could deliver it on 21 Feb.  never happened.  Called today and was told “we’re working on orders and calls from yesterday, we can work yours tomorrow.”  I ordered before yesterday...I called before yesterday.  Finally just requested a refund and the girl said done and hung up on me.  She failed to refund both my orders so I had to call back.  Outstanding customer service.

name: Chelsea E
text: Horrible customer service at the huntsville area!! My parents never received their arrangement after i placed the order well over two weeks ago! I was told by a staff member that it was on the way at 3pm and now (7pm) I've been on hold for the last twenty minutes trying to figure out where it is! after reading all of these reviews, im convinced there's a truck driver somewhere eating lots of delicious fruit and chocolate... Can I please just have a refund?

name: Ann West
text: Half of my daughters Birthday delivery (from her Military Sister )came apparently the chocolate dipped bananas weren’t ready and were supposed to be delivered before 4pm. They never delivered them and will not answer the phone ! I DO NOT APPRECIATE MY ARMY DAUGHTER THAT IS DEPLOYED AT THE MOMENT AND SENT HER SISTER A GIFT BEING CHARGED FOR ITEMS THAT WERE NOT DELIVERED! That’s theft !

name: David Carr
text: Ordered on 2 occasions, both orders incorrect. The cookies they sent this time looked like they had already been picked over by rats, and their phone is ALWAYS BUSY. same as last year. Never again.

name: M. Alexa
text:
My order was not delivered after the staff told me it would be. They ruined a surprise I planned for my son and his family. I called the store for a second time and they had closed. I am beyond disappointed and have left multiple messages asking for a refund.
Update: Eventually delivered the following day.

name: Jet Jones
text: The owner of this location is magnificent! He made sure my  Mother's Day order was correct, even with the high volume of orders,  wonderful customer service. Very polite, store very clean. 100% satisfied. Would definitely recommend this location.

name: Haley
text: I just ordered an early Mother’s Day edible arrangement two days ago. They called me when it was ready in case I wanted to pick it up early. When I got there, it looked great! They were extremely nice and gave me some ideas to keep the chocolate covered strawberries in good shape for my 15 min drive home in a hot car. I hadn’t even thought about that, so it was very nice for them to mention. I will be ordering from them again in the future.

name: Linda Bellamy
text: I usually call for special occasions for my husband. The arrangements are nicely done and it’s eaten within 3 days. Delivery is not always dependable, but the workers are courteous.

name: Collin Walker
text: Terrible customer service and my order was never delivered, they barely answer the phone and never reached out to me about my undelivered order.

name: B. Christine
text:
Update:  Feb 2, 2018

So after a year of not ordering an Edible Arrangement I decided to give them another try! This time I was blown away by the EXCELLENT service I received!!! The manager MARK is the epitome of a great manager with EXCELLENT customer service.  I had an arrangement scheduled to be delivered this morning 2/2/2018 to a business for an individual, but the individual decided not to go to work that day to my dismay. However, Mark said "No worries, we will send it out on Monday, don't let that upset you!"  He is such a great example of what managers should be!! I will support his store from here forward!

August 2016
I placed an order online fairly early in the day and the delivery was not made until very close to the time the recipient was getting off for the day. I was told it would be delivered between 1-3pm and I get a call a 330p stating it was just out for delivery! I don't understand why there is only 1 driver. The next time I'll just go pick it up myself to avoid such a terribly long delay in delivery!

text: My daughter place an order for me of cover chocolate strawberries for Valentine’s Day pick up was 12:00 on the 14 got there at 12:30 the place was crazy and the people working didn’t know what was going on the order was not ready and said to come back because they were still working on orders for pick up at 9:30 really is 12:30 anyways came back at 4:00 pm waited another 30 minutes while there there was people in the back at least 10 doing nothing but talking one rude person in the front who had no customer service at all finally got my strawberries they were saggy and tasted old will not order go there or have anyone order there again

text: Mark, you are AWESOME! Thank you for your wonderful Customer Service! God bless you! :)

name: John Gray
text:
First, hand salute!!! The service was amazing, ordered same day delivery, took a look at fine print, and it clearly stated "delivery date and time not guaranteed, call store," so i called the store and was very impressed with service.

Second, the test...i ordered one from the university and whitesburg (neither knew), both same day, both same order, going to same address. Well, i am proud to say, make sure you order from whitesburg store. University did not have the same quality in fruit, even my 4 year old could tell, and some strawberries they shouldnt have used at all.

Thanks again Whitesburg store really enjoyed the arrangement and service.

name: Waldemar Ramirez
text: Bad experience. Made an order online to have it delivered on ST. Valentines day, did not happened. I called the store to ask about what happened, since I asked my wife about it and my wife said she did not received anything. So of course I am disappointed, I made the order , and hoping that while I was out of town, this would be delivered to her. No other details were offered to me, other than just " delivery was unsuccessful "... I know it was unsuccessful, duuhh!  So I asked for a complimentary delivery , the lady completely ignored my request and processed a refund. Which is ok, but you lost a client and possibly more than just me... I would not do no more business with edible arrangements , or at least with this store. Would not recommend you do any business with them.

name: Jessica White
text:
After ordering an arrangement for my mother and learning that she never received it on the intended date of delivery (Friday, Feb. 12), I called the store multiple times and was unable to reach them. After finally calling corporate I was told that the order would absolutely be ordered, likely by 9 PM (unacceptable in itself).
After it still went unreceived and I filed a formal complaint on Saturday, I was informed that they would likely be open that day due to the holiday weekend and my order would *probably* be delivered that day. Again, my delivery went unreceived.
Sunday, I called the store all day, always reaching a busy tone, but felt confident that the company would at the very LEAST deliver my order first thing that morning, despite it already being two days late. No such luck.
FINALLY today, three days after my intended delivery date, I was able to get ahold at someone at the store and let them know that I was displeased to say the least, and would like my order to still be delivered but would like the delivery fee refunded, as it did not arrive the day it should have. The person on the phone then said he cancelled my order completely (although I have yet to receive a refund), rang up another order, and charged my card AGAIN for the amount of the basket. By now, there has been $200+ worth of charges put on my card. But hey, they offered to give my mom a free box with 6 chocolate strawberries to make up for it.
After speaking with my mother, we decided to cancel the entire order and, YET AGAIN after not being able to get ahold of anyone at the store for several hours, I called corporate and asked to cancel my order and was informed not only did they have absolutely no record whatsoever of my 2nd purchase (even thought they were more than happy to charge my card earlier today), MY ORIGINAL ORDER HAD BEEN CANCELLED BY SOMEONE ON THE DAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE DELIVERED. I was informed that I should try to get in contact with someone at the store (as if it's so easy) and my complaints would be passed on to the manager. This experience was absolutely DEPLORABLE as far as customer service goes and I am extremely disappointed with the lack of effort to correct the situation.

name: becky Hall
text: Buyers beware!!! My fiancé bought my engagement ring from here. I came to get it sized and it came back with a diamond missing and the size was wrong. The salesperson, Sam told me everything goes to corporate so I thought it was in good hands. They sent it off again and went it returned it was a whole other ring. My beautiful ring was completely scratched up and 4 of my once flawless colorless diamonds were now visibly yellow! Turned out that Sam lied to me because it had went to a local jeweler. The managers excuse were the diamonds must of gotten burnt. There were many other excuses but this one was most shocking. Diamonds don’t burn!! We told them we wanted the original diamonds put back in and have it appraised to see if it matched our original cert card and they refused. All trust was out the window and we had no choice but to return it. They have made the whole experience a complete nightmare and have now ruined my engagement. I’ve heard horror stories of this place swapping diamonds before and clearly they’re still doing it! Do not buy from these people they commit fraud with no conscience.

text: Sam was awesome and very professional and made me feel comfortable and didn't make me feel pressurized to buy. She took her time and helped me find the perfect ring!

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Shazi is wonderful!!!! She has made me want to continue to be a Zales customer. After dealing with the Trussville store 3 separate times and having no success in getting answers in getting a wedding band and a certification cardfor my engagement ring, she took 30 minutes out of her time to take care of us. She got with her manger about getting our cert card and then explained in detail why my engagement ring that was purchased in May was no longer being made as well as the band to accompany it. She then worked diligently to find a band that complimented my ring. If not for her we would’ve taken our bus was to Kay’s or Jared’s and been done but she took time out of her day to handle a simple customer service issue and made us her personal customers for life.

name: Bethany
text: Very poor experience. Clearly commission based, where no one wants to be inconvenienced to clean/inspect your ring to keep up the warranty as instructed; only to wait on those to make a sale. Waited a very long time for my turn and was treated incredibly rudely. Do not plan to ever purchase anything from them again.

They treat customers different depending on if they are coming in to buy something new vs. getting something cleaned or replaced. I don’t know if it’s a commission thing or it’s just who they are. ( where they realize they won’t be getting any commission off of you, therefore service is bad). I honestly don’t know.

name: Jordyn Gilley
text: Do not waste your hard earned money here. My ring has broken twice in 2 months, not to mention the first time it took them 3 weeks to return it. The second time 4 weeks. And even then they won't call you to tell you it's ready. You literally have to call every day and pester them to see if it's back from repair.

name: Judy Pruett
text: If you are wanting the best Jewelry Consultant, ask for Shazi! She is extremely knowledgeable and personable  She takes her time to find out what you are looking for.

name: Brittany Lamb
text: Buyer beware!! I searched for months to find a ring that I wanted for Christmas. My husband I went to the Galleria location to get my size and we wanted to look at the one I had found. Unfortunately it was an “online only” item. The woman who got my size acted as if she was not only inconvenienced by us but as if she was better than us. So my husband ended up ordering the ring and gave it to me on Christmas Eve. When I took it out of the box and put it on I noticed one of the diamonds were missing. My husband immediately called their 1-800 customer service number and they directed us to take the ring to the nearest Zales and they would decide wether to have the ring repaired or replaced. Being Christmas Eve night the location was closed and closed the next day for Christmas. We went to the Galleria location on December 26th and when we explained the situation to an employee they went and got the manager. The manager then asked what we wanted done. I told them I wanted it fixed. Then they asked if I had the paper work for the diamond bond that came with it. I told them no that it should be fixed period considering it was a brand new ring. After about 30 minutes of talking to the manager she said she would take care of it and we wouldn’t have to use the diamond bond and we wouldn’t have to pay for anything. I even went ahead and bought the extended warranty on the metal and the sapphire. The manager said it should be ready by January 7th. When that day got here my husband called and it was not ready yet. Well my husband got a call yesterday, January 10th, that the ring was ready and that it was going to cost $110. When we got there to pick up the ring the woman that was working was the rude woman that waited on us before and the one that rang up my extended warranty. She told us it was going to be the $110. I told her we weren’t paying a dime that the manager was supposed to be taking care of it. Apparently the manager was not there and had made no notes of anything!! I got extremely frustrated and upset. Eventually, after getting verbal and irrate, another employee came over and tried to calm me down. The woman ended up giving us the ring and not charging us. None of this should have ever happened. I will never buy another thing from Zales again!!

name: Stephen Glass
text: Terrible staff they are rude. Be careful they will charge you more and not tell you that they added stuff to your receipt.

You can just give me your credit card you don't have to give me any money today." Then she says to my boyfriend, "Is it because she's here with you?" And then she proceeds to look at me and say, "Can I speak with him alone please?" Needless to say I said NO and we left. Crazy!!! Don't go to this jewelry store. My boyfriend and I both left angry.

text:
I would like to give a shout out to The Hub Florest in Robertsdale, AL.
Over the years I have used them to send flowers and have always received glowing compliments from the recipients. However, I personally have never received an arrangement from them until this past weekend. The cut flower arrangement I received was the most beautiful I have ever seen. name: Mike Welsh
text: I recently ordered an arrangement for a close friend/Co-worker that lives in Robertsdale. I am not from this area and not familiar with it at all. I started looking for a florist to use and I am glad I chose Hub City. Even though the arrangement I chose required a substitution it was perfect. Arguably even better looking. They called me to let me know about the change and made sure I was fine with it, and she was very nice. I have to say they did an excellent job and I really appreciate that. This put a smile on my co-workers face during her time of grief. Thank you very much. I would definitely encourage anyone that may be looking for a florist, and like me, not from the area, Hub City is who I would highly recommend. Beautiful arrangement, great service, on-time delivery, great prices. Thank you again.

text: Orders my wife an arrangement with lillies. It was delivered on time and absolutely beautiful! Thank you so much!

text:
4 times my orders have been wrong.  Delivered on the wrong day, forgotten to be delivered, and twice flower arrangements looked nothing like the pictures.  The flowers were "arranged" They just put into a vase, not made to look round and full like the pictures.   I am hugely disappointed, not at all worth the money I spent on them.    I have pictures comparing the flowers that were delivered to what I ordered, but I don't see an option on how to post it.
I DO NOT Recommend Hub City Florist.

name: Sam Keske
text: Got my wife's engagement ring here while we were both in grad school at Auburn, and still enjoy visiting with everybody when we visit. The signature jeweler in Auburn, and family owned for many years - you may even catch Ronnie Ware on a good day. Great for Tacori, Rolex, John Hardy, etc., down to Christmas ornaments and glassware.

name: Cindy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Anwar LNU
text:
Met Lisa on my most recent visit to Auburn.  I am in the market for a Rolex and she was the consumate professional, extremely knowledgeable, charming and polite.  She educated me regarding the demand for these timepieces and wished me well even though she didn't have what I wanted at the time.
Would definitely suggest a visit to Ware Jewelers if you are in the market for a Rolex and definitely ask for Lisa!

name: Scott Holley
text: I have been doing business with Ronnie and Tina for 20 years. They have great merchandise and service. They are always so helpful. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Tammy Benda
text: I love working with family businesses that treat you right and value your business.  Ware is one of the best!  The jewelry is what brought me in.  The people make it the only place I will shop for jewelry again.

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather and given to my grandmother. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force in a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring, and shortly after, the diamond fell out... the list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! We are totally heartbroken over the pearls and wouldn’t want anyone else to ever experience that!

name: Austin Till
text: McKee is absolutely wonderful and the biggest help I could have ever asked for. I go to her for all my gift needs. You won't be disappointed with her friendly, Grade A service.  If you're looking for someone helpful, look no further. I will continue to be a Ware customer as long as McKee is employed there.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I live in Montgomery but while I was in Auburn I went by Ware's to see if they could adjust the band on a Cartier watch I was wearing. Ware's doesn't sell Cartier, but I know they sell and repair Rolexes so I felt confident in their ability to work on my Cartier. They did a quick and excellent job, of course. One of these days I'm going to get one of their Auburn watches!

resp.text: Thank you, Carol!  It's always a pleasure to be of service.

name: Parker Johnston
text: I had a very good experience at Ware today.  Worth the trip over from Columbus.  Justin fixed my watch while I waited and it looks great.  Thanks and great job!

resp.text: Thank you, Parker!  We're glad to know it was worth the trip.  We appreciate you going out of your way to entrust your watch to us!

name: Ben McCoy
text: I have bought all my wife's jewlery here even living in another state I always come back!  Jo is the best at keeping me out of the dog house!  They have the best prices and make sure everything is perfect!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben!  Jo does have a talent for helping pick out just the right gift to help soothe the raging seas.

name: Michele Kostelecky
text: We loved our experience at Ware Jewelers!  Thank you so much for being so kind and helpful to us.  Lisa Stevens was great and making us feel at ease and comfortable in our purchases and decisions.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Michelle!  Lisa's a real gem, and we're glad you had such a wonderful experience working with her.

name: Lexie McCormick (Lexie)
text: Ware Jewelers is the only jewelry store I will shop at. Everyone is so nice and you get help as soon as you walk in the doors! They have the prettiest jewelry I have ever seen.

resp.text: Thank you, Alexis!  We always want to make everyone feel right at home when they come through our doors!

name: Paul Berngard
text: Amazing experience.  Lisa is excellent and gives the best customer service.   Have purchased numerous timepieces from her and will only go through her for future buys.   If you are looking to get a Rolex or any other piece of fine jewelery do not hesitate to go see Lisa.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Paul!  We agree completely that Lisa's service and knowledge are top-of-the-line, and we count ourselves lucky to have her.

name: J Sims
text: Went in with my Girlfriend this evening looking for engagement rings for her. Was served by Jennifer, her service was superb. And the selection was just as fantastic. Will definitely be purchasing my rings from Wares.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  I know Jennifer will be thrilled to help you find the perfect ring when the time comes!

name: Kimberly Burns
text: Friendly & helpful customer service. Beautiful jewelry. I've been a loyal customer for over 30 years!! Love Ware Jewelers!!  😀

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kimberly!  It means the world to us that you've trusted us for so long!

name: Ann Canon
text: Wares has been, in my opinion, the top jewelry store in the southeast. When I need to shop for jewelry or for gifts I always shop there first. My mother never shopped anywhere else for wedding gifts.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ann!  It really means the world to us to hear from our long-standing clients.  You and your mother really exemplify the kind of local connections that have kept us in business for 70 years now.

name: Luis Dopico
text: Ware Jewelers is absolutely the best jewelers. I have tried several other jewelers since moving away from Auburn and I have never had the same level of service and quality. Now, I will only go to Wares for new items or repair or redesign of older items. I have learned my lesson. It doesn't pay to go anywhere else. Also, I wanted a custom piece made and the jewelers at Ware's exceeded anything I could have ever imagined. They don't just create jewelry, they create memories. Thanks to Lisa Stevens who is absolutely amazing to work with and will do whatever it takes to make sure you find exactly the special piece you are looking for!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Luis!  It means the world to us that you've been so satisfied with our services for so long.  We'll do our best to keep exceeding expectations and hope to keep you happy for many years to come!  And lest I forget, yes, Lisa really does go above and beyond to make sure her clients get taken care of.  We're glad you've gotten to experience that first hand!

name: Chennan Xue
text: Very helpful and friendly staffs. Helped me adjust my watch strap (actually twice) and didn't charge me. Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated! We are always just a phone call or email away ! Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

name: Melissa Warnke
text: Tina and Ronnie helped us find exactly what we wanted, and their customer service is unmatched! Thank you for making our experience so great!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Melissa!  It was a pleasure having you in, and we loved helping you!

name: Judith Jones
text: Always helpful. Always kind!  Great inventory!!!  I use their lawaway service every year and start my Christmas shopping early!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Judith!  The layaway plan really is a great option for keeping on top of your gift-giving plans!

name: Kayla Sprayberry
text: I dropped my engagement ring off on Saturday to get resized and got it back Monday evening it looks amazing. Great price would definitely recommend ware jewelers to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kayla!  We're always happy to help.

name: Darlene Smith
text: I love shopping at Ware's! The customer service is excellent and I can trust their expertise to help me pick the perfect gift for those special occasions!

resp.text: Thank you, Darlene!  We're always happy to help.

name: T. P.
text: Ben was so very helpful, I never felt rushed and he was extremely knowledgeable and professional. I would highly recommend Ware Jewelers for your next purchase.

resp.text: Thank you, Tonja!  We've counted ourselves very lucky to have Ben as part of the Ware family, his concern for his clients really is second to none.

name: Angie Kelsoe
text: Beautiful downtown Auburn Store, knowledgeable and friendly staff. Jennifer Chastain was such a tremendous help with our experience at Ware!

name: Philipe Aldahir
text: While i was shopping for an engagement ring, not only they didn't think my business was not important enough, but they didnt get back to me on the matter. I was promised they'd bring in more stones for me to look at, and even after i emailed the person who "helped" me, i go no answer. Not a very smart way to do things. I'll never be buying anything from them for the rest of my life. And will strongly advice against it.

name: Anna Hovey
text: Betsi is a true gem to work with!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Anna!  I like that; a gem in a jewelry store!

name: Jamie Ware
text: Great service!

resp.text: Thank you, Jamie!

name: Arnold Linda Pattillo
text: Love Wares

resp.text: Thank you, Arnold!

name: Amy Landers
text: Y’all need more photos! Such a nice place. We love the furniture we have a few pieces. Love real wood!

resp.text: We are currently in the process of adding more photos! We are happy to hear you are enjoying your furniture, and thank you for supporting our small business.

name: Paul Godsey
text: Go see Amanda, walk around see what you like

resp.text: Thank you Paul. We appreciate your business.

name: Jordan Gill
text: Great place and great people.

resp.text: Thank you Jordan, we appreciate your support!

name: William McMullan
text: Great prices on 100% solid wood furniture. Local built so you can special order and even modify pieces to you specs. Great selection too.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.

name: Paulette Humphres
text: Everyone was so knowledgeable and helpful. They let us look all we wanted to with no pressure. I got a beautiful bathroom cabinet and ordered a custom farmhouse table. Can hardly wait to see it. If you want quality wood furniture this is the place to go!!

resp.text: Thank you for your business.

name: Teina Heatherly
text: I just love my dining room table. Not only is it made well but it is so beautiful, and everyone is so helpful and friendly. I will definitely be going back soon.

resp.text: Thank you for your business. We love repeat customers.

name: Sandra Peppers
text: My husband and I were in the Haleyville area camping when we just happened upon this awesome store. We had just been casually looking for a new living room suit but had not found anything that appealed to us in our price range. We stopped in because we love rustic homemade furniture never dreaming we would find the furniture we were wanting for our home. The salesperson was extremely friendly and helpful and showed us to the area where the furniture was and pieces that we might be interested in. We were totally surprised to find exactly what we were wanting and for a price that no one else could possibly beat. Within an hour we had purchased our new furniture and was on our way back to the campground! In fact when we went back 2 weeks later to pick up our furniture, we took my mother in law with us and she bought a living room suit too! Their handcrafted furniture is beautiful and very reasonably priced and everyone there is very helpful. I would recommend this store to anyone!!

resp.text: Thank you for your business. We certainly appreciate you allowing us to help you and your family members find the furniture you were looking for. Thank you for the kind remarks and we love repeat customers. Hope to see you back soon.

name: Shelia Williams
text: Fine fine folks. I really do appreciate  them.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.

name: David Henderson
text: I love that place

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business.

name: Tim Cross
text: I have had so many Alabama sports memorabilia photos and jerseys framed. This is the best place in town when it comes to quality of work, integrity, as well as customer service.

name: Maxwell Barnhart
text: Great service! My mom needed a mat cut for a picture frame, and due to the mat being too thin, the machine cut it wrong. So he replaced it with one of his own for free. The whole thing only took a few minutes too. Definitely go here if you live in the hoover area.

name: Brian Poythress
text:
Michael is an absolute joy to work with, knows his craft in and out, and goes out of his way to educate his customers and meet their needs.
I took a very important document in for framing. He examined and discussed options with me for at least twenty minutes, and asked several questions about what I planned to hang it with, what styles I preferred, and questions I did not think to ask such as how much daily sun exposure to expect, what kind of lighting I would place it in, etc. As a first-timer in a framing shop, I expected to be overwhelmed, but he made the process painless as he outlined his recommendations and, very importantly to me, did not pressure and shove his more expensive options at me. The decision was about the right fit for my document and me, not his bottom line. He completed my framing job in two weeks, and the quality is top-notch. Michael can count on my business, as he should yours.

name: agnita mboya
text: Michael is an awesome guy and do amazing work! Will definitely use him again in the future!

name: Dylan Saulsbury
text: This store is excellent. Michael is extremely helpful and his work is of the the best quality. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for top notch craftsmanship

name: Rhiannon Holt
text:
Great place to get something special framed. He helped us pick out an awesome frame to match our huge canvas painting and we were amazed at how affordable it was. Cheaper than what Michaels quoted us for just a canvas stretcher without a frame... Definitely taking everything I need framed to him.

Update: we have now gotten a total of 6 things framed here and they have all been amazing! Michael is very creative and always helps us pick a great frame. Love this place!

name: Renee Marlow
text: Great Place. I was shown a lot of patience and friendliness as I hemmed and hawed forever trying to find a frame, and was met with friendly conversation the first visit, and the pick up visit. My painting looks wonderful and I am so thrilled with it, and all the helpful advice. I would not go anywhere else.

name: Scott Albano
text: I can't say enough about the quality of the work Michael Mixon does!

name: Cristi Smith
text: I know that their prices can be a little on the up side so I usually don't stop to buy I just browse. I had been looking for a place to get my 4 month olds ears pierced, and they do it! It has been extremely hard to find anyone because of "COVID". They were very professional, and the lady took great care of us! I have already recommended them!

name: Dan Quixote
text: Went to get my daughters ears pierced the Friday before last. The woman who claimed to be the manager was rude and acted like she had something better to do than to talk to my wife and I, and what ultimately deterred me from the transaction was the fact she was wearing a tank top. I wouldn’t want her arm pits in my face, so I spared my child that experience. We went to Claire’s and had a great experience with a well dress, kind mannered woman who made my child feel at ease.

name: janell johnson
text: Do not go to this place if you are piercing your yound child's ears. I just left from trying to get my 3 year old daughters ears pierced. She was excited and we let her pick her own earrings out. A nice lady helped us but you could tell she was new and learning. She kept having to ask questions to her supervisors who acted like they were too busy to help her, which ultimately took way longer than what it should have taken to complete the transaction, about 45 mins before we were finally asked to come sit in the chair. By that time my daughter was becoming impatient  and started to get nervous. We went to sit in the chair and she started to freak out. The employees just starred at her. They werent nicely trying to tell her that it would be quick or that it would be okay. They just starred. Previously my husband asked if we could pay after the piercing had been done because we werent sure if our daughter would go through with it. We were told no we had to pay immediately. After a minute of trying to get my daughter to cooperate I asked if we could get a refund. We were told no, they do not do refunds. I asked if we could come back another day after she had time to calm down, again we were told no. HORRIBLE, INCONSIDERATE CUSTOMER SERVICE. We took the earrings we paid for and left.

resp.text: Janell, we are so sorry to hear about this experience and will follow up with our team to address what you've stated here. Thank you for being so open about your visit.

name: Kijuana Smith
text: Love this place..customer service is kind of low depending on who's working

resp.text: Thank you, Kijuana! We are always striving for excellence so your feedback is appreciated!

name: Jennifer Farris
text: The manger at store 1205 is rude, doesn’t follow company rules about always making the costumer happy... said she knew about me and she knows nothing.. she does not even know how to run the store... this use to be my favorite store to go to but, I will never use this store again.. I will tell everyone about her and the incompetent of this store ppl sleeping on the floor when they are supposed to be working. No management

name: Annie Mcghee
text: They automatically add a protection  plan with jewelry purchase without asking if you want it and that upset me very much

name: Donna Reid
text: Did a great job piercing my 13 month old granddaughter's ears. Thank you

name: Abigail Davenport
text: Use to be a great place. Truly has gone downhill.

name: Jennifer DeRousse
text: Great service Samantha is wonderful

name: Dacia Jones
text: They put the wrong sized earrings in my ears tht caused swelling to both of my ears and the customer service wasn't so great

name: Debra Whitehead
text: Horrible store. Horrible staff. Go to Claire’s.

name: Michelle Foster
text: I looked up this shop online to order flowers for my daughter. I live 2 hours from Birmingham so the reviews and the location near where my daughter lives spoke volumes to me. The flowers were delivered to her within 2 hours after ordering them. The flowers were beautiful!! I just told the lady on the phone a fresh cut and when my daughter sent me a picture, they were gorgeous! I highly recommend this shop!

resp.text: Thank you Michelle!

name: Jamilli Todd
text: Ada is an angel on Earth. Goes above and beyond. This is a calling for her. She is too good❤️

name: V T (YogiBearMom)
text: I finally found my dream SUPREME SWEET PICKLE with or without heat from Bloom and Petal. It is crisp, thick cut and takes 14 days to prepare to perfection. You will NOT be sorry you chose this delicacy from the pickle world! I was a bit concerned to order that many glass jars from another state, however Vince and Aimee did an amazing job of packaging and delivery was swift and flawless! They are an absolute joy to work with and even helped me with ordering more to stock up with in the future. If only more business were so helpful and eager to assist their customers in their guilty pleasures of such a delicious pickle! Thank you so much you two for laughing with me instead of at me! ❤  More business definitely to come with this phenomenal place in good ole' Alabama...GIVE these phenomenal PERFECT PICKLES from Bloom and Petal A TRY!!!👍👍

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Gari Robin Deason
text: My orders were above and beyond my expectations. The two orders were absolutely wonderful. My two friends that received their bouquets couldn’t stop saying they were beyond beautiful and they had never seen flowers so beautiful. I will definitely be using them again. I recommend them to anyone wanting to send something beautiful to someone special.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Crista Roemen
text: Absolutely beautiful! Ordered these for a coworker's birthday. Ordered them through the online process and it was efficient and easy. They had pictures of each bouquet with pricing and the checkout process was smooth. I forgot to leave something on the delivery instructions, so I called them. The person that answered was super helpful and nice. She told the the delivery driver was out with our delivery, but she would make sure she got in touch with him to give our instructions. The delivery was made in the right amount of time and our coworker was so excited. The bouquet is gorgeous, the flowers look vibrant and fresh! Absolutely recommend Bloom & Petal and will definitely use them in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating!

name: Chuck D
text: When a place deserves a five star it should be shared! I placed an order at 9:30 and it arrived to my loved one by 11:00. Incredibly beautiful and to detail from their store photos. Thank you guys!

resp.text: Thank you Chuck. We hope she enjoys them.

name: Kathleen Ruggiero
text: I live out of state but found this gorgeous shop to send  flowers and gifts to my Aunt. Even from hundreds of miles away I can be sure they will deliver a beautiful arrangement and decadent small gifts that she will love. 100% recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: bryan gonzalez
text: I live in California and I bought some flowers for my older sister in Birmingham AL, as a birthday present. Whole order process was smooth and easy. Will order from here again.

resp.text: Thank you Bryan!

name: Madeline (Maddy) Ricketts
text: Bloom and Petal is my absolute favorite florist! They are so prompt with delivery and the arrangements are always beautiful and unique. I love how classy the colors and different flowers always look. Thank you guys so much!

name: Taylor Fitzgerald
text: Thank you Vince, Aimee and your staff for making the process of ordering online, from out of state a simple process. My fiancées Mother, my soon to be mother-in- law, Judi, loved the arrangement! Thank you again!

resp.text: Thank you Taylor!

name: Ann Henry
text: Beautiful arrangements that exceeded expectations. Vince knew the event space well and made event planning from out of town super simple. Thank you!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Anne, we enjoyed working with you. Having great customers make our jobs a lot easier.

name: Paige Lankford
text: Ordered at 10:00 am was delivered by 11:30 in Pelham. Beautiful and made our friends day. Thank you for your prompt customer service.

resp.text: Thank you Paige!

name: Kim Burdette
text: They delivered flowers promptly on the same day I ordered. My daughter sent a picture and they were beautiful. Highly recommend Bloom and Petal!

resp.text: Thank you Kim! We hope she enjoys them.

name: Will Steadman
text: First class company right here! I ordered a customized box and it was delivered in less than 4 hrs from the time of order. Then after the order was delivered the owners sent me a personal Thank you email for my business. The box turned out great and their customer service is top notch! Support these guys if you are in search of flowers/gifts. A+

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Thad Miller
text:
Excellent website! Friendly personnel.
Fresh flowers! They do what they say they will do. Highly recommend this business.

resp.text:
Thank you sir and thank you for
Your business.

name: S. Davis
text: This was hands down the best florist I’ve worked with in the Birmingham area. I spoke with the friendly, helpful owner and ordered flowers/goodies to be sent to a friend. He did a fantastic job of working with my description of my friend to create something special for her. The arrangement was stunning and to top it off, it was delivered about an hour after I ordered it! My friend was thrilled, and I am grateful for B&P’s work. Bloom and Petal creates beautiful, unique arrangements for a reasonable price (unlike some of their competitors). I understand why the ratings are so high. This is now my go-to florist!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Andy Jones
text: Absolutely beautiful. Even better than the picture online. My wife loved them! Thank y’all so much.

resp.text: Thank you! We hope she enjoys them!

name: Janet Riggs
text: My mother was so very happy with her roses.  Thank you for helping to make her Mother's day special!!

resp.text: Thank you! Happy Mother’s Day!

name: Luke Hand
text: Awesome job they really know how to put flowers together

resp.text: Thank you Luke!

name: Laura Luker Doe

resp.text: Thank you Luker Doe!

name: Grateful America
text: What a beautiful arrangement. The recipient just loves the flowers.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We hope she enjoys the flowers.

name: Jake Talley
text: Great Service….. Flowers was delivered in a couple of hours from the time I ordered them.

resp.text: Thank you Jake!

name: Anne-Marie Brown
text: They went above and beyond to make my experience wonderful and the recipient so happy!

resp.text: So glad your experience was wonderful. Thank you for your business.

name: Heather Lavender
text: Absolutely AMAZING service and the flowers are gorgeous!!! Thank you so much for working us in today.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Gina Cox
text: Always beautiful arrangements. Fast delivery. Great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you Gina! We appreciate your business and kind words.

name: Cheryle Eiland
text: Absolutely beautiful arrangements every single time. The gift snacks are always a hit with the recipients as well.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Geoffrey Gartman
text: My wife received the correct order by my desited delivery time. She is very pleased with arrangement and its quality.

name: Janna Gobeo
text: Everything was perfect! The Box of Joy was "a nice surprise on this gloomy day...this was such a nice bit of sunshine," according to the recipient.  This is at least the third time I've ordered from Bloom and Petal for my daughter in law's important occasions  "and they are always so beautiful and smell so good." This gift box included very thoughtful comfort items - flowers, chocolate, bath things.  I sent it in memory of a year's anniversary of a sweet canine companion's passing. Everything from Bloom and Petal is extraordinary quality - the bright bouquets, the prompt delivery, and the customer service. Outstanding!  Thank you for providing love to our loved ones when we are so far away from them.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We hoped she enjoys them!

name: Kristin Fulda
text: Lovely bouquet, timely delivery.  Very pleased & would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Bridget W
text: Excellent service and an absolutely beautiful flower arrangement was sent to my friend!! I live out of town but they took great care of me!! Will definitely use again!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Marc Tomlinson
text: Had a special request for post funeral arrangements to be delivered to my sister's home and my brother's home in appreciation for their years of caring for our parents. Bloom and Petal listened and heard what I was trying to express. The flower arrangements they delivered brought over 92 years of my parent's lives to a beautiful ending. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you and so glad we could be a part of something so special.

name: Tuesdai Bradberry
text: I'm not able to see my mom for mother's day. We live outside of Birmingham now and I was looking for something special I could send her. I made a customized basket on Blood and Petal's website. Great selection of items. I also wanted a smaller arrangement to go in the basket as well and they added that too. The flowers and basket were beautiful. (she cried) :) Customer service was excellent!! They were so detailed and so sweet. Thanks Bloom and Petal for helping us make Mother's Day personal for our mom!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: John Bowles
text: Very Helpful. Always Beautiful Arrangements.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Cynthia Parris
text: As always, Vince was so accommodating for our needs. He helped with flower choices to stay within a budget as we worked through all the details of our father’s funeral.

name: Jan Barnes
text: Bloom and Petal was recommended by my daughter who lives in Alabama.  Great customer service and the flowers were beautiful.   Delivered to my friend the same day I called from Georgia.  Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kristi Tolbert
text: Very happy with my delivery order!

name: Jim Franz
text: Excellent florist. Ordered the Great Pumpkin for my sister and it was a huge hit. Thank you, Bloom and Petal.

resp.text: Thank you Jim! We appreciate the kind words and great review!

name: Denise Wall
text: I have ordered from Bloom & Petal many times. Their flowers are always beautiful! i placed an order today and it as delivered within 2 hours. WOW, that was fast!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We look forward to serving you again.

name: Kelli Walker
text: Thank you Bloom and Petal. I'm all the way In Houston,Texas my Aunt loves them.

name: Aleia Crim
text: Bloom and Petal were so easy to work with over the phone with great customer service. My order was somewhat complicated and they simplified things perfectly. They delivered wonderful custom gift baskets and absolutely beautiful flowers. Highly recommend them for you gifting needs!

resp.text: Thank you so much Aleia!

name: Dan Jasnowski
text:
This is the place I buy all my flowers not only because they are sublime, dazzling and top notch but because they go above and beyond the call of duty to ensure you have a superb experience every single time.

This is the place to get special flowers, folks.

resp.text: Thank you Dan!

name: Wendy Garner
text: I can always count on Bloom and Petal to provide the most beautiful arrangements! I have used them personally as well as for large events. Vince and his staff are incredibly talented floral designers and care about providing the best experience for their customers.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Tammy Henderson
text: I have always had excellent service and products from Bloom and Petal! I highly recommend them for any floral need.

name: Heather Averwater
text: Bloom & Petal were extremely friendly and helped fulfill a unique gift basket order with fast local delivery. So impressed with the excellent service! My best friend loved the treats they customized for her gift basket.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Anne Weil
text: The delivery was even faster than I expected, and my friend loved the bouquet.  Great work, as always.

resp.text: Thank you Anne! We appreciate you!

name: Katherine Amerson
text: I live abroad and wanted a gift delivered to someone back home. Ordering online was was super easy and I loved being able to make my own gift box. It was delivered on time and was beautifully packed. My sister was very happy and I am very happy with the service. Would order again!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Patti Johnson
text: I had a concern and the owners were very open to listening to me.  They went above and beyond to ensure satisfaction of their product.  I will certainly use them again in the future.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Lisa Amann
text: My daughter lives in Birmingham and I wanted to send her something unique for her birthday. Bloom and Petal’s website was easy to navigate, offered great photos and options, and delivered on time! She sent a photo and said it’s beautiful. Thanks to the delivery guy who made the surprise perfect and to Bloom and Petal for the beautiful living arrangement. Can’t wait for the next occasion!

name: Stephanie Grissom
text: I am a regular customer...they never disappoint!

name: Amanda Heimerl
text: Fast delivery, beautiful arrangement! Thank you for brightening our friend’s day💐

I had the same experience as “Blossom Baby”, my masseur stayed on her phone the whole time and I received a one handed massage...I don’t recommend it, so please make sure Marcy/Marcie is not providing your service before you go.
However, my sister received her facial from Jonathan and he was fantastic! I just cannot rate them higher than one star as long as I know there are unsuspecting clients who may be receiving one handed massages from Marcy. I have received 3 other massages from other masseurs there over the years and they were great, but Marcy was enough to make me not want to try again.

I should have reported them when I had the chance, but I hope they are gone. I had facial for the first time and it was awesome.

name: Eric Hendrix
text:
$25 for a day pass.  The guy who checked me in was useless.  Collected my money and said ok, you can go back.  No tour, no explaining where everything was...nothing.  It’s rather small so I was able to figure out the lockers and get into my robe rather quickly and head straight for the steam room.

Surprise, the steam room is broken down.  That sucks, but I could still do the sauna and whirlpool.  Wrong, sauna is broken too.  So all you get for your $25 is a whirlpool, and a lounge that has cartoons blasting loudly on the TV for some reason.

I am usually one to just write off a bad experience and say lesson learned but I did go back out front and talk to the girl at the desk.  She was very apologetic and said they should have told me about the steam room, and she had no idea that the sauna was broken.  She refunded my money and I left.

It has potential but this place is terrible right now.

name: Jim Hawkins
text: I probably spend 1000.00 a year in this store but I have spent my last dime.  I purchased 4 sweatshirts for my wife at Christmas.  We were out of town at Christmas and of the 4 there was 1 that she did not want.  Because of Covid concerns and some personal issues I was not able to bring the item back for a refund untill today.  While the young man was very nice, he stated that I had waited too long to return this item and that "they" would not allow him to scan the barcode for the refund.  Now I understand this to a point but I am sure that this could have been handled and that I could have recieved my refund.  I would expect a little understanding after the last year we have all had.  This is only a $60.00 item and I can assure you that I will be taking the other $940.00 that I would have spent at Alumni Hall this year to another local store.  I assure you that J&M would have honored my request.  I hope the owner is ok with this loss in potential income for a $60.00 refund.

resp.text:
Hi Jim, we are sorry to hear about your experience at our store in Auburn. We did speak with our staff about this situation. We appreciate you being a loyal customer with us, but we do however have a return policy that our store must abide by. We did extend our return policy to January 1, 2021 due to the pandemic, but it has since returned to the 30 day standard. Normally our return policy is only 30 days after purchase. The return also must be put back on the original form of payment which our staff said you no longer had. We would be happy to offer you a gift card or have your next online order shipping on us. We do value your business. If you wish to receive a gift card or free shipping, email marketing@alumnihallstores.com.

https://www.alumnihall.com/info/returns

text: Ordered on a Tuesday for a Friday delivery for an occasion taking place on a Saturday.  Called at 4 on Friday because they still weren't delivered.  Instead of refunding my money they lied and said the delivery would be there early enough on Saturday for my moms special occasion.  Delivered Saturday afternoon when the flowers are useless and still did not refund me my money. Won't be using them again.

text: I have had countless arrangements made at this shop and have loved every one of them!  They are thoughtful and considerate to your wants and your budget!

text: The best scones I’ve ever had!

name: Erik Hartwig
text: Don't let the size of the scones deceive you.  They are filling and delicious.  We tried the Lemon Blueberry, Orange Cranberry and Amaretto Cherry.  The amaretto cherry was my favorite, and the orange cranberry was a very close second.  The lemon blueberry was good, but the lemon flavor was not as pronounced in the scone as the orange and amaretto was in the others.

name: Mayo Woodward
text: Every time I have one of these scones, it reminds me of mornings with my mother. She loved them. They are great scones, and a greet family owned business.

resp.text: Thank you, Mayo. That's a special memory. Honored to be a part of it.

name: Rona Scott

name: Abby Michl

resp.text: You are too kind, Abby! Thank you for letting us serve you!

name: Bruce A Prentice
text: Amazing place for scones.  I walked over from nearby hotel, and was not disappointed.  The scones are amazing.  I had toasted coconut and orange cranberry.  both were excellent.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us serve you. We are so glad you enjoyed your visit!

name: Chris Beattie
text: Best breakfast in town.  We buy for friends every time we travel.

resp.text: Thank you Chris!

name: Rebah Kitty
text: My husband and I were passing through from out of town and as an avid scone lover I simply had to stop and try these. The owner was the one who served us and he raved about his wife's baking ability, and he was in the right to do so. I make a habit of sampling any scones I can get my hands on and I'll gladly tell you these were some of the best I havr ever had. We ended up wanting to try one of every flavor because the first one was so good; and when the owner found out we were from out of town he sweetly made two of them on the house! Everything was scrumptious but my favorite flavor was the hazelnut cream. Simply Delightful! If I could go back I would, daily!

name: Heather Gustafson
text: Just dropped by one Saturday morning, and fell in love! Cute shop, with tasty scones and coffee- and the BEST service. The owner helped me and talked about the different flavors (even told me how to best save them for later!) If you are a scone lover, or wanting a new anytime treat or small meal- stop by and TREAT YO'SELF to this tasty goodness!

name: marty m
text: Great taste and texture. I had to talk myself out of going back to get more!

resp.text: Thank you for visiting! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Lisa Boswell
text: OH MY GOSH!!!!!!!!! Someone delivered these to our office yesterday and I just cannot tell  you how good they are!!!!  The Orange Cranberry is my favorite but the Golden Raisin comes in a very close 2nd!  Amazing!  Just simply amazing!

resp.text: Hi Lisa! Thank you for your kind words. We are so happy you enjoyed our scones!

name: Lara Seamon
text:
Very pleased with every visit to Highland Gourmet Scones. I live out of the state and any time that I am in town I swing by for a scone pick up. I at first tried the mini's to distinguish which ones would be our favorite, but I have to be honest we like them all.

So we have upgraded to purchasing the large scones in a variety of flavors. A few have made it to being a fan favorite - Cherry Amaretto, Pumpkin Spice, Toasted Coconut, and Orange Cranberry. The regular size scones are a bit more moist, and have a stronger flavor.

We highly recommend them, and have not been disappointed with any of our orders!! The one time I returned home without scones..........we had a few sad faces. It is now what we look forward to when I am in town.

Plus they are a great spot for coffee!!

name: Cindi Tramell
text: yummy! love their stuff, my grand daughter has brought them home on multiple occasions and Its always been quiet the surprise lol

resp.text: Thank you, Cindi! It’s a pleasure to serve both you and your daughter. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Sheri M

text: I had my husbands company name printed on a sweatshirt and it turned out PERFECT!!! This was a last minute Christmas gift and I placed my order on Dec 17th. I will forever use Trifecta for all my printing needs from now on!

Winsome is Bomb.com. If you are looking for a mask that you can breath out of and comfortable contact her she has superior products.

I had Winsome Paperie make my invitation suite. I loved how they came out and the special touch with the coral paper was perfect.

She also made the menus for the reception.

There were minor hiccups do to unforeseen circumstances which caused the loss of a star but overall the quality of work is great.

name: mark drost
text: works wonders with my project ideas--

name: judy cutrer
text: Called from out of town needing to send a plant . Wes  went above and beyond to assist me. You couldn’t ask for better customer service. Even sent me pictures so I could see what I was sending. Same day delivery. So happy with my decision in choosing Flower Cart.

name: Miranda Holcombe
text: I have used several flower shops in Phenix City but none compare to the Flower Cart.  Their flowers were so, so beautiful!!!  I will only use them  forever

name: Jeremy
text: Totally over priced and they put some ugly add on leaves in my 2 dozen  Rose's  that dont even belong with Rose's because they think it looks good and to top it off  they touched every rose they put in the vase and they were  wilting and turning black 5 and a half hrs later shop somewhere else. On top of everything else they gave me diseased,black spots, eaten leavrs, moldy, bug eaten Rose's, babys breath, and eucalyptus tree leaves for $110.00.  I only asked for Rose's and babys breath. Didn't know they used trees. They was not even cut right

resp.text: So sorry to hear you were unhappy ,can you call and give us some info about your order we would love to make it right --these are all pics of the rose foliage and we do use eucalyptus in our rose arrangements as it goes nice with roses -- perhaps we can use something different in your if you prefer, we stand behind our work and if you contact us so we can locate your order we will be happy to correct it !!  We have been in business since 1985 and offer quality guarantees on all our orders if notified . Look forward to speaking with you.

name: Sean Rya
text: Absolutely love the flowers they did for my wife! Will definitely use again! So pretty!

name: joe rogan
text: Delivery was late. I ordered flowers for an anniversary. I called the shop to ask if my order could be the first to be delivered and was told it wouldn’t be a problem and the order would be the first to go out. By the time the flowers were delivered my girlfriend had already left for the day. Thanks for the awesome flower on our anniversary. Just use a different shop with better more reliable customer service and save yourself from ending up like I did.

resp.text:
Joe, we’re sorry that you feel the way you do, but we always strive to provide a positive experience for our customers.
We delivered the order two hours after ordered without being given a deadline at time of order.
We understand that mistakes happen, but we take pride in our customer service.
That being said, please feel free to reach out to us directly, flowercart@bellsouth.net, so that we may address your concerns directly and resolve the situation in a productive manner.
Thank you for your time and we look forward to hearing from you!

name: Lee Lee fka JustMe
text: Recently moved back to the area and remembered how much I love this florist. A friend of mine from Florida ordered me this divine Christmas arrangement, that included a cute gingerbread coffee cup. The arrangement last  over 2 weeks and I've enjoyed several cups of coffee in my adorable gingerbread mug. I highly recommend the Flower Cart for all of your floral needs!

resp.text: THANKS FOR CHOOSING US FOR YOUR FLORIST

Wendy Hyde

name: Ben Wheeler
text: Called in to order Valentine's Day lillies for my girlfriend and daughter, was quoted $115 for a dozen flowers delivered. It was short notice (2 days) and a holiday so I figured it was the price I would have to pay. Waited all day for delivery and nothing showed. Contacted the store the next business day, spoke to the owner who said they had no record of my purchase. She also said that the price I was quoted was not right and that there was no way I called her store, even though I verified the phone number and knew that the lady that took my order had a distinct accent. In fairness, she did offer to send something at a discount, but day late flowers don't really cut it. If I had read the reviews before calling, I would have seen this coming. Never again.

name: mallory deardeuff
text: I have ordered from the Flower Cart for years and they have always exceeded my expectations! They go above and beyond to ensure you are happy and all needs are met! I def recommend the Flower Cart to everyone!

text: Not very happy with this business I looked on their website at an arrangement of flowers and it advertise them at $39 I had called to place the order and she said that she couldn't do it for $39 it would be $68! She said that price was from different vendors even though it was on their website!  That really aggravated me she asked me when I wanted them delivered I said that afternoon or first thing the next morning she told me they wouldn't be able to do it that afternoon because they close at 12 I said OK I would like them to be delivered first thing the next morning!  I called the next morning to see when they would be delivered at 9 o'clock when they opened up they haven't even started on the arrangement and told me it would be around 12 o'clock when it was delivered even though they said it would be delivered first thing that morning! I will not be doing business with this place ever again!!!!  And I will make sure if anyone asks not to use them they do not honor their prices on their website and they do not honor what they say!!!

name: Kent Whitaker
text:
THANK YOU MELISSA AND VIRGINIA's FLOWERS! After a horrible time last year ordering with the Auburn/Opelika Edible Arrangements my wife Ally and I decided to go with Virginia's flowers this year. We are in Chattanooga and my mother in-law is in Opelika.

I called while viewing the website and the nice lady walked me through a few ideas for Valentines Day arrangements. I ordered an arrangement and fruit basket instead of roses because both my wife and her mom have told me that they love fresh cut spring flowers.

After lasts years disaster with Edible I was a bit worried when I came home from work and my wife said she had talked to her mom and that she had not mentioned anything special. We were instantly concerned that the bad experience with "edible" was being repeated.

I called and Melissa said she was sure that mom's order was on the truck as she "remembered the name." As I was hanging up my wife's phone rang and it was my mother-in-law calling to say that she had just been delivered the... - actual quotes - "most beautiful flower arrangement ever" and "the biggest - and fresh fruit basket she had ever seen!". Those are actual quotes!

I called Melissa back to thank her and she could hear my wife and mother-in-law talking on the phone in the background. Thank you Melissa, and your crew, for erasing a horrible memory from last year and making a brand new one filled with love!

Melissa and Virginia's Flowers is now our official Opelika and Auburn florist for the Whitaker Family!

resp.text: You are so welcome. I'm so happy she loves them!!!

name: Stacey Wood
text: My BFF was in the hospital in opelika (I live out of town) found virginia's on Google and so glad I did!  Can't tell you anything about the shop because I ordered online but the flowers were reasonably priced,  delivery charge was good and the arrangement was beautiful! She sent me a pic when she received them and they were exactly like pictured. ... would definately order from virginia's again!

name: Lyndall H.
text: Baker's on Main is located in the Cafe 336 building downtown. There are cute shops behind the restaurant and a huge event space. The shops vary, but home decor is featured in most of them. Many of the items are unique and focus on Lake living. There are beautiful hand made items. Check out the enormous event space. Make sure that the roll up door is not opened during your event. I took a class in there during the winter. The garage type door was rolled up and many of my classmates complained of being cold.

name: Curt Cearley
text: Stopped in for a bite to eat. Good atmosphere, excellent bistro food, right on main Street, so perfect for people watching, and some very friendly staff. Try the Scoop and Soup!

text: Wasn’t very impressed with the food

text: I like to walk downtown sometimes and I always visit Bakers on Main!  But honestly it’s a tad overpriced and that’s not the greatest, but it’s super cool shop and it’s interesting to go there even if you’re just looking around!

name: Dana Staples
text: Trinity's is a great place to shop for your friends, family, and yourself. The new owner (since August 2013) has added a variety of wonderful gifts and new clothing and jewelry lines. I love finding great seasonal décor and candles plus unique well priced treasures all year long! Their Pink Pewter headbands, Rebecca Michael pants, Waxing Poetic jewelry, and Mighty Purses are so trendy. And it is great to find such an interesting collection of beautifully patterned scarves in one spot. The store is well stocked but very intimate letting you find what you need without sensory overload. It is  a real treat to go to Trinity's and shop!

text: First, this place is so cute AND clean! So neatly decorated and upon entering the staff was friendly & helpful! Stopped in for a quick gift and found myself some chocolates! The quality of the taste is far better than anything you can buy on the shelf! I will be back!! 5 stars!!!

If you are looking for a Christmas gift or any occasion gift you cannot go wrong with these candies.  'Thank you for providing a perfect  basket of mouth watering delights..  And a big Thank you to my gifter!!!!!

text: We saw this candy store on Facebook and decided to stop in during a trip to the area. The ladies working are all super nice and very helpful. The candy is so good! Lots of gift ideas and my wife loved all the different things they stock besides candy.  Very much worth a visit!

resp.text: Thank you for stopping in!  We hope to see you again soon!

text: Best toffee I've ever had! Stopped by to get some for my mom, who loves the toffee too, for mothers day. Got a sample of pineapple gelato. So good!

text: Such a cool store! You can watch the ladies make the candy, you walk in and it smells like heaven! Tons of candy and gifts to choose from. I purchased gummies, fudge, and caramels and all were delicious!

name: Adrienne Ballard
text: Very disappointed in the staff. Not once could I get help from the 4 employees inside. My husbands birthday is tomorrow and I really wanted to make him a nice basket of treats. But when you walk in, don’t get greeted, don’t get asked if you need help (even after spending 10 minutes inside wondering around). But the two women who walked in before me got asked if they needed help by 3 different women and then the woman after me got asked. After spending $23 on a few pieces of chocolate sure do hope they taste good. Now I know not to waste my lunch break here.

resp.text:
Hi Adrienne,

I am so sorry that this was your experience! Thank you for your feedback. We will work to ensure that all feel welcome in the candy store. I hope your husband enjoyed the chocolate!

Morgan Price Candy Company

Really exceptional store - loved the gift ideas and Andrea was super helpful in putting together the engraved retirement piece for our friend. I found something for me around every corner and came out with a few gifts for me and a new raincoat.

Will definitely return with friends for another fun visit to check out more gift ideas! Great for the holidays or football fan fun too .

text: SUPER RUDE.  Would not recommend. Had been wanting to stop by for sometime because it looked like a cute store to shop in. Stopped for some Marco's Pizza ( which is btw DEELISH! HIGHLY RECOMMEND-AND FRIENDLY!) and decided to take stroll over while we wait for my pizza. Walked in- no hello, no welcome, no nothing. A few associates were around us as we were looking around and no help about anything. I walked around long enough to wait for someone to ask if we were looking for a specific something or needed help and nothing. I gave them the benefit of the doubt and told my daughter and dad let's get out of here, I can take my business and money elsewhere. I did let a FEW friends of mine not to shop there and take their business elsewhere. I was disgusted with the manorism that was displayed there. Funny thing is they were all of aged personnal there. 🤷🏻‍♀️👎🏼👎🏻👎🏻

text: I ordered my mother in law a dozen of doughnut rings ( green apple) with a bouquet of balloons ( mothers day)... well she received the rings which were left on the porch but no balloons.  When I called the manager she informed me they couldn't get any balloons out for 3 days or refund my money 😒.  I wanted my mother in law to have the balloons so she got them 3 days later. They were accompanied by a half dozen chocolate covered strawberries 🍓hence the 2 stars given. Customer service is EVERYTHING especially in these days.  I would do edible arrangements again but definitely at another location.

resp.text: Adrian, we apologize. Our mission is to always deliver the best possible customer service experience and we’re so sorry we fell short. We want to make this right. Please send us your order information at orderteam@edible.com.

They lie. They told me they weren't taking order anymore at 2pm. That i could schedule an order for the next day.  The person I was getting them for went online and placed the order.  So now she thinks I lied to avoid getting it.
So if you call and they lie just place your order online. Customer service is garbage.

They are too high to be sending out old fruit and bad customer service

text: Placed an order for my wife that was delivered quickly, the presentation was awesome and the fruit was fresh and delicious. I have never had a bad experience with this company and will continue to support them.

text: I ordered online Monday Feb 9th to have delivered to my husband's wk. Extremely easy online order & Exceptional delivery!! Fruit was fresh, ripe, & tasty. We're still enjoying the fruit 3 days later! A bit pricey with double delivery charge, but it was Valentine's. Busiest day of yr probably. I would recommend this to anyone.

text: I live in GA and I wanted to do something special for my Aunt's birthday in Bessemer. I placed my order online at 1:14pm swear to God I got a confirmation at 2:56 pm saying it had been delivered! I was in shock. I thought " oh maybe they did a crappy job" or " maybe the left out my additional items" NOPE! She loved it and the personal note. Thank Thank You!

name: Kyle Partridge
text: Set up a pick up for 10:30 and used my 30 minute break to go get it and bring it to my girlfriend for her birthday. Got here at 10:30 only to be told it wouldn't be ready for another 10 minutes and I wasn't the happiest but I understood and went to wait in my car. Sat in my car for another 20 minutes before I had to go back inside to check and see how much longer it was going to be. So not only was it not on time I am now late for work and I won't even get to bring it to her for her birthday while she is at work. Terrible customer service. If you schedule a time it should be done at the time not whenever it suits the workers.

name: King Williams
text: They don’t feel like doing it today but done it last time if people money not good can u just close are let s business that want to make money do it please ughhh y’all really suck the lady sound rude why say u Delivered if you don’t want to deliver.

name: jarvis Wright
text: Amazing service & food!

name: Chelsee Farwell
text: Worst customer service ever. I live out of state and for my sisters 16th birthday we wanted to do something special for her so we decided to have an edible arrangement with balloons delivered to her high school. 72$ later they didn't deliver the balloons and when I called to get a refund for the balloons a man named Bryant answered the phone. I really just would have been fine if they were apologetic towards the situation and cared but instead in a monotone voice the response I was given was "well sometimes we miss things, do you have the card so I can refund the money". Outstanding response sir. Needless to say I told them my fiancé would call them with the card information. When he called the owner answered and again was not very sympathetic to the situation. He decided a refund wouldn't matter since the surprise for her birthday was ruined anyways. She had the balloons delivered the next day that we paid for already and a box of 6 complementary strawberries sent with it. At the end of the day if someone in this business would have ACTED like they cared that their business took away from what should have been a special sweet 16th birthday delivery I wouldn't have such a bad taste in my mouth for this company.

name: Michele Coco
text: The customer service at this franchise is HORRIBLE. the manager, Rebecca, had a horrible attitude, as did the delivery driver,  and made what was supposed to be an awesome gift a pain to receive.  I almost called back to tell them to cancel the delivery entirely and to credit the person who sent me the gift.  I was not home for the initial delivery at noon on Wednesday. I was left a message on my cell phone by the delivery man to call the store to reschedule. I called, was placed on hold and then REbecca picked up giving me some stupid line of, "They are a very busy company and cannot schedule a delivery in  set period of time." I then proceeded to ask her if I was supposed to wait here all day to receive my bouquet. She said no, I could come pick it up. They would try to make sure the bouquet was at the store when I arrived. So, wait?  You can't get it to me in a 2 ot 4 hour time period and then you will try to have it there, all the way across town, should I happen to show up?  WHAT?  How is it that FedEx, UPS and even the USPS can deliver things nationwide but this little mom/pop business that serves the Birmingham metro (population 1.5million) cannot get it together to deliver a bouquet in a 2 to 4 hour time slot?  PATHETIC.

name: Lala M
text: Placed an online order. They called and stated they couldn't deliver until tomorrow. They have 5 hours before they close so why not? I originally tried to place an order earlier this morning and they couldn't deliver to the address I requested bc it was 2 miles outside of their delivery area. Ridiculous!!!

text: I would rate this florist and these ladies with more than 5 stars if I could!  I called this morning to see if I could get an arrangement of flowers out to a funeral early this afternoon and the lady I spoke with was so sweet and kind.  I told her what I would like and she said she would get it to the funeral home.  In the meantime I found out the service was instead at a church quite a bit further away.  The funeral home would not deliver the flowers but the florist not only made sure they were delivered on time and on short notice but the arrangement was beyond Beautiful!  Thank you all so much for your kindness and for delivering a beautiful arrangement on such short notice!  I highly recommend this florist!

name: Ashia O'Neil
text:
I called the day before I needed an arrangement for a funeral, let me just say they went above and beyond and blew my mind.
We had kind of an odd request for an arrangement. We asked for a Truck, Cathy asked if we wanted the shape of a truck or a toy one. (Specific truck and color) I said well I would love the shape but I understand if you can’t. She didn’t hesitate. They made the shape of it, perfect color, perfect details, everything! And it was HUGE.
It literally made my heart melt. I can’t even explain how perfect it was and how detailed she made it. Corn cob lights, trim, rims, mirrors. Everyone loved it and said how beautiful and special it was. I will literally use them every. single. time!!!!! Plus, the price, you just can’t beat it. A million star review!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much!!!
