text: Used them for years. Best florist in Birmingham. I will use them again...

name: Grace Church
text: I order a flower basket and it was way below my expectations. I was not happy with my purchase! I will not be ordering from A Touch of Class in the future!

name: David Meeks
text: Greg is a great florist.

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Sweet lady

name: Sherrell Breashears
text: I love the store on Montclair Road. It is a very clean, neat store with an excellent customer service staff ready to assist you with whatever you need. The products are great for people living on a budget.  I cannot say enough about how pleased my experience has been there.

name: Kenneth Rich
text: A very creative store.the merchandise is far better than the dollar tree. Always great customer service.

name: Nee nee
text: Will not be back at this one . I already called  cooperate. Nasty attitudes and not customer service trained.

name: Bridgett Fortenberry
text: Nice , clean

name: Bernadette Howell
text: I almost never review, but I was so moved by the ladies at Cullman Florist that it seemed wrong not to! I called to see if they had peonies for my parents anniversary, knowing that it was unlikely there would be any available without preordering. These ladies went the extra mile in not only finding some for me, but creating a lovely arrangement that my parents are still enjoying almost a week later. Thank you so much to everyone involved in creating a special moment for my parents and myself. You are awesome.

name: Sara P
text:
Cullman Florist is simply amazing. I ordered a funeral spray by phone as I was on the way to catch a flight to my mother's funeral. It was last minute and rushed. I frantically emailed the funeral details to Cullman Florist. I hoped nd prayed they could turn it around quickly, but I knew it was a difficult order to fill.

Not only did Cullman Florist deliver on time. The flowers took our breath away. They even surprised us with a special request that they made happen. Just amazing and it warmed our hearts.

Thank you, thank you! I would definitely recommend them to anyone!!

name: Sharron Allen
text: Cullman Florist is the best.  They never fail to create the best arrangements.  Thanks yall

name: Henry Sellman
text: I love getting my flowers for my fiance and she always loves the ones I get here they do an awesome job and always deliver on time.they even delivered during the storm that had Cullman flooded the other day ....men you should buy your flowers here your women will love it

name: brittany moore
text: Cullman Florist makes the most beautiful and unique flower arrangements! They are helpful and professional. The shop is gorgeous! If you need flowers use them!

name: Michelle Warden
text: wonderful people to work with. beauitful flowers

name: Stephen Waters
text: Amy was very helpful and patient in getting together exactly what I wanted. The flowers were perfect, they were delivered exactly when I was told they would be, and my girlfriend loved them.

name: Geralyn Boone
text:
I ordered for flowers to be delivered on Mother's Day last year But the flowers arrived after Mother's Day!

They were not delivered on the 10th, we spoke to her. They were delivered on the 11th, Monday afternoon. I did write my complaint to where I ordered online soon after the delivery. Noone contacted me!

resp.text: I honestly wish I would have known of the issue closer to then but a year later I can only see what I have on record. I never saw any other correspondence about this or I assure you I would have reached out to you. I have actually tried to call you twice sense you posted this to personally apologize and although it is a year later I would have gladly done something extra special for your Mom.  Have a Blessed Day

name: Ron Waybright
text: First off I want to thank you publicly for your kind act of selflessness. You had gone the extra mile on New Years Day to deliver a beautiful arrangement of Flowers. My wife had just lost her Dad and me being miles away felt helpless. But from the second you answered the phone gave me the confidence that you were going to put together a really nice arrangement. The family was all gathered in Hanceville when the Flowers were presented. The entire family was just simply amazed. The Silver Cross Vase was spectacular,the flowers were professionally arranged and bold. I was told the Flowers could be smelled in the next room. To all that's reading this post, if you want something special done look no further, Cullman Florist will make it rememberable. Again Thank you so much for putting a smile on so many broken hearts.

name: LaDonna Vance
text: Such a beautiful arrangement on short notice. The family was so happy to receive a sentiment of love during their loss. Susie was Amazing and I appreciate her patience during my delivery. Thanks again and keep making Awesome arrangements to those who receive these creations of true beauty.

name: Tonia Camina
text: I couldn’t be more pleased. Needed last minute flowers on a  Saturday afternoon & Alan really came through for me. The autumn floral arrangement is truly exceptional. And they were delivered that day. Can’t say enough about the friendliness and the service. 😊

name: Jesse Ramirez
text: Respectfully, I write back to your response in a different review because I was unable to respond back in the old one. yes you are absolutely right it was two different pictures that I wanted combined but you only did one picture decoration and it did not come out the same. The reason it took 5 months to respond is because I was deployed serving my country. I don't have all the time to think about this type of stuff this is simply me telling my personal experience. Communication goes both ways especially in retail considering I came about a week early for it to be ready. On busy days like valentines day people have places to be. If you would like please post the pictures go ahead I have pictures of the final product as well. People who wish to express their opinion will be met with this answer bellow. Thank you for your time but I will not be coming back.

name: David Woodard
text: First I would like to say that the customer service at this florist is excellent. My first arrangement here was great, however the second arrangement did not meet expectations of a premium order. To the florists defense I did not give them a chance to fix the order as it was time sensitive for me. Overall, very friendly staff and one of the better florist in town.

name: Shiloh McDaniel
text: Arrived damaged, but was messaged by Cullman Florist for a replacement!! Great customer service!

name: Scott Neal
text: Fantastic arrangement made by Steph for my wife on our anniversary!  She made it easy and very special!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We appreciate you calling us !!

name: Andy Walls
text: Don't think that a delivery will be on time, you get it whenever they decide to deliver, no matter what they tell you.

name: Dawn Michelle Widner
text: Excellent service,  and they have beautiful arrangements.

name: Laura Griffin
text: My Mom recently ordered an arrangement to be delivered to my Aunt in a nursing home in Cullman. She chose the designers choice and the arrangement was gorgeous! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Laura. We always enjoy brightening someone's day with flowers.

name: Nan Clayton
text: Amy was spectacular! She made a dog shaped arrangement for my best friends birthday which was beautiful. They even went and picked up strawberries at Publix to take with the arrangement.  Best customer service ever!!!

resp.text: Personalized arrangements are the most fun and meaningful.

name: Jack cook-widener
text: Super nice people who can help you find the perfect arrangements.

name: Amy Doss
text: I have been a long time client.   I have loved everything they have ever made for me.  Every arrangement is always beautiful and made unique in its own way.  They truly care about their customers and the products they send out.   I love that it’s a home town shop and does so much for the community.  They are my forever florist.  ♥️

resp.text: Thanks

name: Cecelia Sleevar
text: Always a great place to get flowers!

name: Alan J
text: Full disclosure I work here but, Cullman Florist is the place where everyone should look to fill their flower needs.

name: jesse ramirez
text: Very friendly people but the flowers did not meet my expectations at all. showed preview pictures but what I received looked nothing like it and had to fix it myself in valentines day.

resp.text: I pulled your order first thing this morning. This was 5 months ago. You picked your order up from our store. If it was not what you wanted or expected we would have gladly fixed it had we known then that you were not happy. Your order was for 6 red Rose's wrapped in paper with writing on it. Your order was not exactly like either picture you sent us because you wanted two seperate pictures combined. I still have the text messages on my cell phone where we texted back and forth several times. In the future where ever you order flowers from I would suggest communicating with them if you are not pleased closer to when the order is placed instead of waiting 5 months. We will always correct anything if we are given the chance. Even on our busiest day of the year each order is important to us. Thank you Steph Cook Cullman Florist Co-manager

name: DJ Campbell
text: Great customer service and good prices. Willing to do what it takes to get what you want.

name: Karla Barnes
text: Always very helpful.  Always professional.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Amy Hancock
text: Staff is always friendly! The arrangements they do are always gorgeous! Will not be disappointed in sending flowers through them.

resp.text: Thank you Amy.

name: Zachary Ergle
text: I've ordered flowers here several times. The people I've talked to on the phone were extremely courteous and it's always a pleasure  dealing with them. As for the flowers my wife thought they were gorgeous and that's good enough for me. Would recommend them to anyone

resp.text: Thank you Zachary

name: Stephanie Cook
text: As one of the managers at Cullman Florist I feel that I need to address the recent review by Wayne Phillips.  He is a solicitor that called our business repeatedly within a 15 minute time frame.  We did not have the time to speak with him and when we repeatedly told him that he became irate with us.  He directs his complaint at Susie.  She is an exceptional employee that goes above and beyond with our customers. We stand behind her 100%.

name: mark bell
text: Absolutely amazing staff and flowers! I can't say enough about the quality and attention you'll receive at Cullman Florist. Ask for Steph or Carla!

resp.text: Thanks for your review Mark. We look forward to serving you again.

name: Dixie Roberts
text:
Charged my son $50 for cheap trashy prom flowers. No roses, no lilies, just a single filler flower that fell apart before the actual prom. He was embarrassed.  Had I known how they do" business" I would have gone with him, but I assumed they were reputable.
Never again.

name: Jeremy Bandre
text: Great customer service, wonderful experience!

resp.text: Thanks

name: Mary Braswell
text: The sales people were so  nice and helpful , to the point of getting a ladder to reach the item i was looking at !

resp.text: Thanks Mary, we look forward to helping you again in the future.

name: Stacie Gilham
text: I showed up at the florist at 5 minutes until they closed with an order that was for a funeral and four different items needed by the next day.  Not only were they very professional but also took the extra time even after they were closed to understand what my needs were.  Not only did they deliver to another county for me but they also went way above and beyond my expectations for the arrangements they made.  Everyone commented on the sprays and how unbelievably gorgeous they were.  My only regret is that we had not been using them all along.  Believe me, if you are wanting spectacular flowers and none of the hassle of worrying if it will be what was expected then Cullman Florist is the only place to go. THANK YOU FOR THE WONDERFUL JOB!!

resp.text: So happy we could help.

name: connie farr
text: Yeah a place where your married boyfriend can buy you flowers yeah your married boyfriend. My husband needs to stop buying you flowers cause I don't see you washing an cooking for him you do the dirt you get the dirt get it!!!

name: Melissa Weaver
text: I ordered plants for my mother in law... She loved them and received them very quickly!!! Thank you soooo much!!!

resp.text: Thanks Melissa

name: Zeta Smiles
text: Nice people but I did not receive what I ordered.  Very disappointed with their quality.

resp.text: Ms. Smiles, I am sorry that you didn't receive you what you ordered. We would be happy to fix this issue. Please call us directly.

name: Jose Martinez
text: Good services

name: Lidia Martinez
text:
(Translated by Google) I love it, they serve very well and give you options of everything.

(Original)
Me encanta,atienden muy bien y te dan opciones de todo.

resp.text: Thanks so much

name: Aaron Oseas
text: Melissa is one of the nicest people I have met. The store always has really beautiful and amazing products. It supports good causes around the world and makes me feel good about my purchases. I'm always happy after a visit to sojourns.

name: Marcus Kirby
text: They have some really beautiful things to check out from all over the world!

name: K Stephens
text: Love this store - great gifts, huge variety of fair trade objects, and a fantastic owner. So glad they moved to Crestwood!

name: Browneyed Otter
text: Love this store's ideals and their ties to the fair trade community. This store always sells amazing stuff, like good tea and cool things from all over the world. I've added them to my "cool stores to show people" list

name: Lynn Gardner
text: Please be sure to go here!! Her fair trade merchandise is astonishing and varied. She has poured expertise and passion into the place, full of fun gifts for all ages and interests.

name: Lanae Reynolds
text: It was a nice store. Melissa was very attentive and helpful even though I was just browsing. I love all things fair trade, even though it's a little pricey I will be back. It had a great clean atmosphere. Definitely give this store two thumbs up!

name: Mel Pedersen
text: SUCH a cool place! Super nice owner... Fair-Trade handmade treasures at REALLY REASONABLE prices! Can't wait to go here again

name: Toni Koon Harper
text: A wonderful place to shop! I do most of my shopping there for all the gifts I give. So happy to know that I'm not only supporting a small business, but I buying products made by the craftspeople who have the opportunity to make a fair living wage and give back to their community.

name: Nicholas Blackstock
text:
Very unique and cool store... bottom line!

This trade shop is comprised of art, handcrafted pottery, toys, clothes, jewelry etc from all around the world. All prices are fair considering each item was handmade.  You will also find a lot of notes about the items posted throughout the store. This will include info about the region of the world the item is from and even insight into the lives of the individual people who have crafted some things. The store is packed with goodies but doesn't feel cramped or hard to navigate. Includes restroom/dressing room(s) if you needed to try on any clothing. The staff is sooooo super friendly it's ridiculous!

Something that also helped solidify my first experience here is that it was Bham Art Crawl time and we were served delish jalapeno margaritas and there was even a Henna Artist in-house displaying her talents.

All in all, very awesome place that you should check out if you're wanting to explore something a tad different in the city. Right next door to Reed Books if you're familiar!

name: Courtney Read
text: Such a cute shop! They have so many unique gift ideas and they are all fair trade. Great prices and very helpful staff!

name: J Martin
text: I love this place! This is where I buy all of my gifts I've only had kind interactions with all people here I wish I could buy everything in the store

name: Sandy Swindall
text: A lovely store with an amazing assortment of beautiful crafts from around the world.  Love the concept of fair trade and grateful for the good work this business is doing.

name: Jessica Graves
text: Sojourns has a great selection of cashmere, alpaca, linen, cotton and so much more of shirts, pants, wraps, purses, shoes and ponchos. Melissa (the owner) also carries earrings, bracelets, necklaces in different metals and fibers. She also has candles, dishes, blankets, ornaments, gift cards, chocolate, metal animals, nativity scenes, soaps, lotions and so much more.

name: Jenny S
text: We were finally able to stop by today. We took home an amazing bag that I at first thought was for myself but my husband is quite impressed with it (it may end up being his). We will be back. I  look forward to doing a lot of Christmas shopping at Sojourns!

name: Jessica Mayberry
text: Beautiful items. Good prices.

name: brittany ortiz
text: Fair Trade does not equal expensive nor poor quality. I have gotten some of the very best items for my home from Sojourns. We have items in our living room, kitchen,and our daughter's room. It is a must stop for a unique gift. From ornaments, to handmade paper, jewelry, puzzles, food, kitchenware, you name it, Melissa has it! The best part is I know the people who made it are paid a fair wage and I am supporting a local, small business. I'm no hippie - I want quality and a good price! This place has got it :-)

name: Nichole
text: Most awesome gift shop, with unique items for all.  Owner is extremely knowledgeable;. A great, fun place to support fair trade!!!

name: Gottfried Kibelka
text: Fun and fair. We always find something hand crafted, fair traded, nicely didplayed, and often indirectly advertised by an insightful or fun story presented by the world traveling proprietor.

name: J Little
text: Was very impressed by the interesting collection of unique items, was not impressed however by the salesperson who "kept an eye" on me while I was in the store, also asked her for gift ideas and she didn't offer much help with that, so just a little annoying, but I did pick up some cute trinkets.

name: Jessica York
text: Huge inventory of lovely, Fair Trade items. Great for gifts!

name: Holly Lucas
text: Handmade items from around the world--- so in love with this place {and mission 😍}

name: Rose Brown
text: Can't say enough great things about Sojourns! It's a great place to find unique items from around the world, and one of my favorite places to shop for gifts.

name: Helen Rivas
text: Always welcoming and always well-stocked with potential gifts.

name: Catsie Shelf
text: Fair trade is the way to go. Large selection.

name: Brian W. Kittrell
text: Great place with lots of wonderful gift ideas.

name: Alexandra Smith
text: A great shop- perfect for gifts!

name: clarence muhammad
text: Items from around the world with great prices.

name: Shelly Edge McDonald
text: One of my favorite places to shop!

name: Andrea
text: Affordable great gift ideas galore!

name: andreafaris blackert
text: Best little shop in the Ham

name: Beth Ann Higgs
text: Great place!

name: Yesy Mi
text: Nice place with great people and beautiful gifts

name: Fishyninjabreadman
text: A really twee little store in Mentone Alabama, had a lovely conversation with the owner who likes to collect currency from foreign travelers. I donated a £5 note.

name: Lila Wild
text: I always give their flower arrangements an A+++. They are amazing! Beautiful and always smell lovely. Honestly they always look better in person than on the website. The timing that they delivery the arrangements are VERY quick (super impressive). Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Lila, for your kind words! It is truly our pleasure! We appreciate your support!

name: Peggy Ogle
text: I am so pleased with Auburn Florist.  I called this morning to order flowers for. My daughters birthday.  I live out of town. The lady I talked to was so nice and a true pleasure to work with.  I ordered flowers. She texted a picture of the arrangement. I was so pleased.  My daughter sent me a picture and a big thank you.   I will definitely use this florist again.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind sentiment. It is our pleasure to help you.

name: Wishing Well Flower
text: I would like to just stop in to say THANK You to you and your amazing staff!! I have ordered twice now from this amazing shop and we florist are the worst customers for florist however this shop has not just amazed me but my beloved customer as well. We posted a photo to the google photos area of the beautiful stunning poinsettia that our customer received back in December. Along with the one request more than anything in the world a balloon! Yes a balloon! You seriously made his year twice! Many thanks to your staff for paying attention to details as well as help connect a family together who is extremely torn from being so far apart. Give yourselves a pat on the back you all deserve it! -Cheers, -Wishing Well Flowers

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. Adding that personal touch and paying close attention to detail are important to our success. We are happy to help you anytime you need us.

name: Kathy L
text: We have ordered several bouquets from here and we are so impressed with the color, shape and creativity of the arrangements! The attention to detail is incredible. The team is customer service oriented and each delivery has been delivered as promised with excellent care.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your continued support.

name: Kimberly Bass
text: Best arrangements in town by far! My husband bought me some of the most beautiful flowers from here recently. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words. We appreciate your support.

name: Eric Harris
text: These folks are great. They helped me out over the phone and delivered everything right on time. The arrangement was gorgeous and the email updates were really nice. Thanks!

name: A Brandon
text:
Great customer service and fast service. Since I was out of town I was unsure of which arrangement to get delivered to an Auburn local address. The rep explained the services available and helped me throughout the process. I asked if I could get a photo of the arrangement and the rep was able to send me a photo to my phone.

I’ll definitely suggest the flower shop for anyone in the Auburn area or anyone out of town looking for a place in Auburn. Thanks for all the help.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback!  We appreciate it.  :-)

name: John B
text:
I ordered this beautiful arrangement from these wonderful people.  I originally wanted painted roses, but they said they couldn't do it. They even offered some of their competition to help.  Well no one paints them around here.  Most were not very friendly want it either.  So I decided to give auburn flowers my business after all.  They were extremely polite even though they didn't offer the service i wanted.
Fast forward to the day of pick up. I had pre paid for my arrangement as a GameDay surprise for a special lady.  Well the night before she decided she didn't want to be so special lol.  I know it's what I get, for being a bama fan behind enemy lines lol.  So, I told them to just donate to the hospital.  I'm sure it would have made someone's day.
After I week or so goes by and I'd completely forgot about the flowers and was forgetting about the special lady lol.  I noticed when I checked my bank that day.  They had sent me a refund for my order.  I can't stress this enough,  I DIDN'T ASK FOR ANY MONEY BACK.  So, long story short.  These guys do great arrangements and even better customer service.  They'll always have my business, even with auburn in the name!

resp.text: Thank you so much, John. Please let us know if we can help you again. It is our pleasure.

name: Mike Blanchard
text: They were great. I ordered a bouquet of carrots for my friend’s horse who was having surgery. I knew it was a weird request but they were very accommodating and created a beautiful carrot arrangement. I wish I knew more people in Auburn so I could use them more often!

name: Morgan Rehm
text: I used Auburn Flowers and Gifts as my wedding florist and had the BEST experience! Leah is amazing! I went in with an idea of what I wanted, and she brought it to life. I was floored by how gorgeous my flowers were. Leah was such a pleasure to work with. She kept me updated constantly, from dealing with my many questions (I live in another state!) to always being available to talk. Her prices are fantastic and her personality makes her extremely easy to work with. She took care of everything regarding the flowers on my wedding day (she set them up and moved them around for me!) I would HIGHLY recommend her! Thank you so much, Leah!

resp.text:
It was a complete pleasure working with you!!  Thank you for trusting us and for the kind words.  Honored to be a part of such a great day.
~ Leah

name: Alpha Chi Omega
text: Highly recommend!! Auburn Flowers & Gifts provided our sorority's chapter with floral services during the entire week of sorority recruitment and everyone in the store was incredibly easy to work with! Our arrangements were always delivered on time and communication was simple and easy. The arrangements were BEAUTIFUL and aligned perfectly with the vision that we had when we ordered them.  Family owned and operated with reliable, family service- there couldn't be more to love!!

name: Angie Medlock
text: I tried all day to get same day flowers delivered to friends going through some really hard times.  I online ordered through Auburn Flowers and Gifts, knowing that they closed in three hours and my delivery likely wouldn’t make it until the next day.  They assembled a gorgeous vase of flowers and had them delivered in less than two hours!!!  I was so amazed and the friends that received them were so happy.  Thank you for a job well done, better than anoyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much! I'm glad we could help.  We try to make it really easy and pleasant to shop local here in the Auburn/Opelika area.  Thanks for ordering from us!

name: Melissa Davis
text: Not only did they deliver the flowers EXTREMELY fast, but they were nice enough to send a text message to the recipient so that she knew they had been delivered. And the flowers were beautiful!! I would highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thank you Melissa!  So glad you and your friend loved the flowers.  Thank you for the kind words and review.

name: Amanda Nelson
text: Friendly staff and homegrown business. These are good people! Highly recommend this flower shop to anyone in the area.

name: Peyton Hansen
text: Excellent service, communication, price and product. All you can ask for.

name: venus9 Cotton
text: Good customer service

resp.text: Thank you so much for your support!

name: David Moore
text: Have used Auburn Flowers a few time. Been very happy with the service, friendliness and always arrived when promised!

name: Nicholas Blair
text: I own this place so I'm biased, but oh well.

name: Rusty Herring
text: Very helpful and quick delivery!

name: April
text: Poor customer service

name: Wilfredo Kuan
text:
(Translated by Google) This is the worst business I have ever spoken to to make a purchase.

(Original)
Este es el peor negocio al que he hablado para hacer una compra.

resp.text: We are so sorry that you fell this way. It is unclear why you had a bad experience, but we always try to make things right when there is a miscommunication.

name: Amy Maddox Smith
text: All the latest styles of clothes for teens to moms! Dressy clothes, casual clothes, accessories to the max, and even some makeup! You’ll be treated like family with a warm smile and help finding your size & style!

name: Gayla Earnest
text: I was trying to ask a question on their website.  Which to my dismay i goofed up and answered a wrong answer.  But trying to ask my questions after that I was meet with rudeness.  Like you are only allowed "1" question.  To me this is unbusinesses like. Unappreciated, and down right freaking rude!!!

name: Linda Lively
text: This is "My Go To Place" for everything. A great selection of clothes, shoes and accessories. And the SWEETEST, most helpful staff anywhere around ❤❤❤

name: Angela Trucks
text: A beautiful store filled with beautiful pricey clothing. ❤️

name: Danny Butler
text: High quality clothing/ great pricing

name: LeAnna Bivin
text: The staff was very friendly and helpful!

name: Sammy Kornegay
text: Love this place!

resp.text: Thank you Sammy for Shopping with us at That's Hot . We love to hear are customers are happy! Thank you for your kind words

name: Alexia Rose Niles
text:
The first woman that spoke to me was extremely rude. First asking me, “Did he say you could come look at rings?” What?! I told her I wanted to look myself and figure out what style I liked in person... She then proceeds to walk away and I received no assistance. A second lady comes by and was shocked I wasn’t getting assistance. The first woman piping in with, “Oh she’s just looking. She doesn’t need in anything.” Didn’t know I wasn’t allowed to look at the rings just like any other customer? I look very young, but I should not be treated like I am less than any other person coming in.

The second woman assisting me actually set up an account and allowed me to try on and see the rings. Though I found a pretty, dainty ring I liked and she says, “You don’t want that! Those are technically promise rings.” Which I responded that I liked how dainty it was and that’s more of the style I liked. I was not a fan of being told what I should and should not like. I will be finding another jeweler that has my best interest and desires in mind.

Overall not a good experience. There are many other friendly, reputable, and professional jewelers in Huntsville that I would recommend over Jared’s at Bridge Street ANY DAY. Please take your business elsewhere this holiday season and after.

name: Christy Vaughn
text:
Tasha is AMAZING!!! She is our go to girl at Jared's EVERY TIME since our first purchase in may of 2018!
Update*** picked up my custom design ring today with my rare black pearl I got in Hawaii... Absolutely amazing job

Next visit, since I can't do another review Tasha again helped me purchase MANY items, unfortunately I picked the same watch out for my husband he bought a couple years ago so the next day I went to return it, bought thru progressive leasing, and geta different one same price, Rachel the GM is also AMAZING! She spent 3 hours dealing with Progressive Leasing to get this all handled! Thank you all who work there, you all have the best Customer service I have ever seen and delt with!

Repairs and custom designs here are ABSOLUTELY beautiful and ALWAYS on time!!!!

name: Trenton McCall
text: So I knew exactly what I was looking for as I walked in and was kindly greeted by Rachel. She told me she would be with me in a moment and in a moments time she was there to assist me. I showed her the pictures of the two bracelets I was needing to purchase for Valentine’s Day. She disappointedly told me they do not have those in store I would have to order them on-line. I told her I’ve NEVER ordered anything on-line before. Rachel told me to come have a seat she would order them with me and I could just come back and pick them up when they arrive. She was kind and helpful. Doesn’t sound like much maybe to some, but I think she went out of her way to make sure I was happy. I’ll definitely be back

name: Addy Schmuck
text: Great customer service. Vickie was very helpful with us. Would highly recommend!

name: Treasure Williams
text: Excellent products, awesome staff. You can also sell them your (real) jewerly. Look online from pre-owned watches-great for if you are looking for a nice pre-owned watch

name: Bridget Williams
text: Best Jared's that I have visited.  They went above and beyond to fix my ring. Plus the employees are very nice.

name: Heather Welch
text: The Huntsville store was an amazing experience! We used Tasha and she was so knowledgeable and professional. She got us exactly what we wanted.

name: Angela King
text: Tasha helped us upgrade my engagement ring. She is very knowledgeable and fun to work with! Highly recommend!

name: Katreena Mullican
text: Had a great experience at Jared's of Bridge Street, Huntsville.  Mechelle was wonderful!  She helped us pick out a beautiful setting and stone from their impressive collection for our anniversary.  She took time to explain and present various options.  My ring was assembled, sized, and ready for pickup same-day.  Highly recommend stopping by!

name: Tina Wells
text: I was extremely disappointed and appalled at the treatment I received at this location. The lady met us at the door which was locked due to Covid, which is fine, I understand but when she opened the door, she basically asked what we wanted like we couldn’t enter the store without some kind of pass. That already made me uncomfortable. After telling her we were shopping for an engagement ring she led us to the counter to have a look. She then proceeded to ask us how long we have been together as if we needed to meet her approval. Next she asked where we met. I did not appreciate her being so nosey. After looking a a few rings, I didn’t see anything that had a large enough diamond for me. She sighed at me when I told her the one she showed me was not large enough. Overall made my experience not fun at all. I would not recommend shopping this location!!

name: Gary Watkins
text: Really nice jewelry at great prices

name: Royce Estes
text: Friendly people and beautiful merchandise!

name: Tonya Staggs
text: They dont sale pandora  any more😪. Very nice place.

name: Larry Burger
text: Great inventory and the best sales staff. They even cleaned each piece of jewelry before packaging it for me.

name: David Hambey
text: Extremely rude employees, they treated us like we were not welcome from the moment we walked into the store.

name: Sheryl Payne
text: So glad I stopped in on the day that i did.  I got to work with Ms. Tasha and she made my first whole (by myself) jewelry buying experience a success.  Will definitely be stopping through again!

name: Christina Mascarinas
text: Each employee I encountered was incredibly snooty and rude to the point it was almost comical because they have nothing to be snooty about. The jewelry was nothing to write home about, even if I would have found something I don’t want a piece from a store with such bad energy.

name: Joseph Cuzzort
text:
Typically, great customer service. Not today, no one said hello as I entered and I walked around the showcases multiple times and not one employee asked if they could assist me or say though would be with me in a moment.

Not a good experience today.

Joseph

name: Robin Warren
text: I was greeted as soon as I stepped in the door.  I  was treated  very professionally. My  rings were checked and cleaned.  Thank goodness I asked her to clean my other rings.  She saw some diamonds missing.   It is being fixed now.

name: J HONEZ
text: Terrible place to buy from.  Constant lies.  They never have your information in the system even though you spent thousands of dollars with them and show up for warranty work to maintain it.  They never seem to have you in the system so keep your paperwork.  They also like to chip your diamonds on purpose it seems so that they can force you into getting lesser diamonds or non certified diamonds to maintain your warranty.  Will not issue a refund for the lesser value diamonds they put into your rings either.  Maybe other Jared's are different but don't buy from this location.  Great scam they have going on

name: Charlotte Smartt
text: Everyone at the store was such a pleasure to work with. They take the time to explain everything you try out many options and they make you feel very comfortable shopping there. I highly recommend this store. They are  absolutely the best people to work with .

name: Jason Watson
text:
Very courteous, professional and prompt. Have been to this store twice,  and couldn't have asked for a better experience.  Lexi and Riley are awesome, and I can't thank them enough.  Knowledgeable,  friendly, and patient with my many questions.
Highly recommend Jared and this location! Will be back again and again.

name: Cherish Charles
text: The staff at this location are simply unparalleled in their friendliness, product knowledge and willingness to assist me every time I come in. I truly feel appreciated as a customer and would recommend without hesitation. Shout out to Brian, in particular for going above and beyond with my late night repair. I truly appreciate your help. Thank you!

name: Branden Schlesinger
text: Really amazing customer service!  They really went above and beyond to make everything perfect!

name: Marty Howard
text:
Great experience throughout engagement shopping experience. Went to several different Jewelry store and was treated like family at Jared's. Cameron was our salesperson and did a terrific job of listening and guiding us thru the process to find the perfect engagement ring as well as wedding rings. BTW She said YES and we were married yesterday. Thank you Cameron and support staff at Jared's.
Highly recommend!!!!

name: Kenneth Hughes
text: Awesome staff, service, and customer service! Patricia was an amazing sales associate!

name: Robert Makowski
text: They have a great store, and wonderful, knowledgeable people! They will make you feel comfortable, and treat you fairly. Me and my family loved the items we purchased. Thanks y'all I'll be back soon!

name: Jack Brown
text: This was my first purchase from Jared's. The entire transaction was very pleasant. They have a customer for life.

name: Dale Barksdale
text:
My husband and I wanted to buy new wedding bands for our 10th anniversary.  Cameron, our salesman, could not have made our experience any better. He was very knowledgeable and easy to work with. We could not be happier with our jewelry or the customer service.
We were so pleased with our experience we also bought a Citizen watch for my husbands birthday (his birthday is just a few days after our anniversary). We had to take the watch back the day after we purchased it because it did not work :(. Cameron also helped us with that. He swapped it out and was very  apologetic. We understand things happen (even with expensive pieces of jewelry), but the excellent customer service will keep us coming back.

name: Emily Gangl
text: The sales associates were extremely helpful and patient with me as I looked through many options for my wedding ring!

name: Don Ebert
text: Long story short without the details, Charles Brown AKA "Charlie Brown" as general manager at the Huntsville location went above and beyond to satisfy a customer...me.  Over what I believe to be a legitimate issue, I had begun to put Jared -Galleria behind me, both figuratively and literally!  Fortunately, Mr Brown caught me in the parking lot and asked to be given a chance to fix the issue.  I did.  He did and I suggest you try Jared's for your jewelry needs.

name: Aisha Buycks Realtor (Huntsville Madison AL)
text: I love Jared at Bridgestreet they take great care of your pieces. I have taken them my wedding set to tighten and clean. I always get them back perfect and blinging. Patricia Mitchell is awesome and gives great customer service. She listens and gets you exactly what you are looking. Their repair service are responsible and give a very reasonable turn around. They will also clean and redip your rings to bring them back up. They will continue to be my go to jeweler. They are friendly and very informative about their pieces.

name: Rae M
text: I have talked to them 3 times in store about getting a quote for a ring to be made. It was a wedding band we got from them 6 years ago. They don’t make it anymore so we have asked them 3 different times leading up to our 5th wedding anniversary how much it would cost to have a duplicate made. The second and third time they apologized that they hadn’t followed through. This last time 2 girls wrote down information and promised to get in contact with us soon after our last visit. Well our 5th anniversary has come and gone and we still don’t have a quote. Guess that’s not happening. Really frustrated.

name: Chelsea Marbut
text:
Insufferable customer service.
The gentleman I spoke with told me that although he could pull up my information and see my extended care plan, the previous store did not correctly handle my paper work so there was nothing he could do for me, as far as repairing my ring... remember he's telling me this as he's viewing my extended care plan.

His parting words for me were, "I'm sorry, I'm trying to teach people how to correctly use our system, and the other store didn't do it correctly."

Since this is the 4th time in two years that my ring has needed repairing, this was a terrible experience to accompany that.

Update:
The GM of the Hoover Location has helped resolve this problem via a phone call... through difficulty from the Huntsville Location.
We do not plan to use the Huntsville Store going forward.

name: T Mac
text: A very good place to shop

name: Kyle Jett
text: Excellent customer service. Staff was very helpful and informative.

name: Angie Clemore
text: This place is extremely discriminatory. My friends and I are all black youths with very well paying jobs and were intrested in their rings. When we got there we were instantly stared at and treated like we didn't belong. There was a tall white man who seemed very rude eyeing us the whole time and even made a sure to mention the quality of the security cameras without our asking anything. Half of us left to sit in the car (because of the cold treatment) and HE FOLLOWED US OUTSIDE!! Soon after security was called and we decided to spend our money somewhere less racist. My family, friends and I are never shopping here again. It's just disgusting.

name: Vinie Carter
text: Very good customer service

name: bobbie Miller
text: Visited today with my son, daughter in law and grandson, my son got me the beautiful wooden churches for Mother’s Day ..love the store and a everything they sell. I will definitely stop by again on my visits to Dothan 💕💕

name: Mollie Byrd
text: I can safely say there isn't a gift store quite like it in Dothan. I want absolutely everything they sell. It's hard for me to "just look" without buying anything. They have a lot of amazing items! I browsed today and left with the cutest weekly meal planner. They have candles, skincare products, bath bombs, kitchen towels, decor, and so much more! It is so precious. The owners are great folks, as well. All employees of both Naomi & Olive as well as their coffee shop, Bird & Bean, are so hospitable and kind. Another great addition to downtown Dothan!

name: Estefania Oriol
text: Hope there was more stores like this in Dothan! Beautiful merchandise for home decor and gifts. I bought some bar soaps, and they smell wonderful.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Estefania, for this nice review.  We are glad you enjoyed both shops!  Please come again soon!

name: Cathy Solis
text:
This is my favorite Downtown Dothan Gift Shop. Artwork from some famous & not so famous, VERY TALENTED artists are featured here. Specialty items that one may desire can be ordered. It's a good idea to check out their website!

An adjoining coffee shop called Bird & Bean has recently been added. Their coffee is 1000 times better than that of Starbucks!!!
Their VERY delicious baked goods are made on site.

I am in love with this friendly, unique, eclectic treasure trove and the great individuals who maintain the happy atmosphere that make Naomi & Olive so special. ❤️

name: Christopher Calvin Reid
text: Neat collection of things in this store. Friendly service and perfect place to buy a gift for a loved one.

name: Diane E
text: This is such a great store!  Owner, Christy Keyton, is awesome!

name: Chelle Ham
text: Lovely little gift shop. I love that the shop is downtown. I will be back. Especially looking forward to their selection during the holidays.

name: Bronze the Sling
text: Not exaggerating: my favorite store in Dothan. Atmosphere nostalgic, cozy. Decor like everyone's dream home. Staff the kindest, most helpful and welcoming you'll find anywhere. Every gift imaginable; everything adorable. Creative, unique, unexpected finds. Huge variety. Lots of bargains. New items regularly.

name: Mary Mullins
text: Absolutely LOVE this place.  Do all my gift shopping there since I know I can go in at a moment's notice without a clue and find something special and perfect.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mary! It was great seeing you today and we appreciate your business!!

name: Ronette Morrison
text:
Helpful,friendly sales woman.
They had alot of great gift ideas too.
I will be back.

name: Glenn Gaines
text: Very nice,  sweet people and will go back again.

name: Eric Butler
text: My little boy needed to use the restroom while we were in Objects. I took him to the back of the store to what looked like a bathroom area. The store employee working the back last Saturday was extremely rude in asking what I was doing and huffing that they do not have a public restroom. I wasn't upset that they didn't have a restroom but I was extremely upset with the rude manner in which the situation was handled. There was no need to be rude...I wasn't try to go somewhere "off limits", I was simply trying to help my little boy find a restroom.

name: Mad4Charms
text: Everyone is very nice here. Love the things they sell, Pandora, Vera Bradley, coastal decor and more!

name: Nikolai Vladimir Kirilenko
text: This place used to be pretty good...Sucks terribly recently. I dealt with the high prices because of the convenient location, but then I heard management berating some poor girl while I was on the sales floor. Now I understand why this place sucks...Who wants to work for terrible and disrespectful management? There are plenty of other options...I'd rather take my business elsewhere.

name: Dwanda Schwarz
text: Love the feel of the shop!

name: Annie
text: I highly recommend this store for any souvenir needs while traveling to the Huntsville area! I had been searching high and low for a gift to bring back to NY after my stay here. I was hoping to find a shirt that said Huntsville Alabama on it but only had seen the sports memorabilia (Rolltide). This store met all my needs and the more mature lady working was just so sweet and hospitable, as was her younger counterpart. So many unique finds in a wide variety of price ranges. Definitely the most hospitality I’ve received since being in the South.

resp.text: Thanks so much for coming! We are so glad you found something special.  We appreciate you for taking time to spread the word.

name: Hayden Freese
text: My company tasked myself and my colleagues with pulling together a large holiday gift for our 275 employees. Alabama Goods worked with us to accommodate the bulk order despite our condensed timeline and were incredibly easy to work with. Once we had all the product, we ran into a slight issue that the team at Alabama Goods worked to resolve in a timely manner to ensure we had everything we needed. And - the products we received were delicious! Will be recommending them the next time we require something similar.

resp.text: Thank you so much Hayden. It was great working with you!

name: Anna Nappier
text: Cool little store, with all things made in Alabama.  I could spend a ton in there.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind comments.

name: Eric Jackson
text: Lovely gifts. Great variety. Will shop here for gifts for out of town guests for sure.

name: Shannon Winton
text: Sooo Excited to see "So Many Products" for  sale here.....& ALL... are made in Alabama❤ 👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏

resp.text: We are happy to be in Huntsville! Check back  - we are always getting new products.

name: Karen
text:
Cannot believe the lack of consideration displayed at this store on Sunday November 29th 2020.  Visited the store about 2:00 to 3:00 p.m. and the cashier ignored me  while I was waiting in line patiently.  She literally took two other guests who acknowledged that I had been waiting in line before them. I said,  "Wait, I was here first" and the cashier moved them around me and took them first. I left my items on the counter and left with my money.

I willl never patronize this place and I'm so disappointed that I cannot give a small business during covid my hard-earned money. No Southern Hospitality here.

resp.text:
Karen - We apologize that this happened to you!  I know that experience must have been upsetting.  Alabama Goods typically receives glowing comments about how we interact with our customers.  In fact, when we hire and train, we focus on providing exceptional service, so we all regret that this happened.

Karen, we appreciate your comment about supporting small businesses. We applaud that you are doing so during these trying times for retail.  So that we can avoid future low Google ratings, which can have a negative impact on small businesses, know that we have taken your feedback to heart.  Karen, thank you for keeping us on our toes!

name: Melanie Mitchell
text: I got the cheeseburger an it was literally the best! It was crunchy, warm, delicious! My friend got the macaroni and cheese and she said that it was super warm and super fresh and we would love to come back and try something different!

name: Mickel Rogers
text: Great place to eat and shop service was excellent and great food also very enjoyable experience with my grandson

name: Debra Thorstenson
text: Service was good, food was delicious today.  I had home style chicken which was 2 pieces of batter fried chicken breast, mashed potatoes and baby carrots. My sis had chicken fried chicken with mashed potatoes and pinto beans. We had biscuits with our meal and they were good.

name: Linda Ledlow
text: Our family's favorite place to meet and share a meal. Recent visit was the first time we'd been out in more than a year, thanks to the coronavirus. The service at Cracker Barrel was great, food was excellent, no waiting, we sure love our Cracker Barrel! ❤️

name: Karen Griffin
text: The food was awesome and the Service was equally good. Blessings continually on this business 💙💛

name: Christmas Clark
text: I got the Cracker Barrel Country Boy's breakfast I think that's what they call it. Everything was good except for the grits and that was runny. It was priced reasonably too.

name: Chelsea “ChelseaMae” Sutton
text: Customer service was excellent! Country boys platter was amazing and the soft fresh biscuits and delicious gravy was so good. So good!! Coffee was also yummy! Mallow cup chocolates were in the gift shop which in Missouri are almost impossible to find other than a 5 below. Thanks guys!!! So goood!!

name: Tim Smith
text: I love this place but the prices are steadily increasing. They do their best to keep social distancing. These are front-line workers and we appreciate them to the highest degree. Everything is clean and there was a nice fire going on a cold snowy day. They've changed the chicken fried chicken and you now get two fillets that are small and they taste a bit different and we were not informed about that before we ordered them. Overall our experience with swell and I give this place pop stars. Forgive the typos I'm using speech to text

name: Wade Hendrix
text: I love Cracker Barrel but the one in Florence, Alabama is not very good. The baked potatoes are very bad. They're not prepared properly. The food in general is just not up to the level it should be and not like it is at any other location I've been to.Like many other reviews I've read, the food is delivered cold. I urge them to try harder because we'd love to come often.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Wade. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Holly Smith
text: Short wait for lunch.  Good service and the food was hot and well cooked. Abe was our server.

name: Nancy Butler
text: Charles was our server this evening. He did an excellent job! The food was wonderful ! I have the chicken pot pie And I would highly recommend! It was a little bit cold in the corner of the restaurant where we sat. That is the only complaint that I could say. Everything else was wonderful!

name: Helen Jeffreys
text: I went to Cracker Barrel with 2 friends our food was cold I sent mine back got same thing it was chicken fingers I was afraid to eat. One friend ordered  A steak rare it was about burned she left it on table I ate baked potato and water the waiter was great we took good care of him  and paid for food we could not eat so dissipointed  we are all on fixed income and was enjoying out day out after being quarantined so long.  So sad

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Helen. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Rubye Fisher
text: Need faster help. Never liked the chairs, need some booths. Great breakfest.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Corliss Fletcher
text: My daughter in law says Cracker Barrel is like kryptonite for me. It really is, and I love to wade through all they have to sell  food is always good too. My son tried the country fried turkey and really liked it. His wife got chicken and dumplings. I ordered meatloaf and got this huge piece that was enough for the cats to have some. Cracker Barrel was extremely popular with the cats. People who work there are always nice and it was a very pleasant dinner.

name: TC Gurus
text: It's a Cracker Barrel. Our server AJ was excellent. He is the reason that I'm leaving this review and he adds two stars to this overall rating. The food was hot and quickly brought out on a busy Sunday. The hot coffees were  much sweeter than we had anticipated but had a strong coffee flavor to them. They got better as we added more hot coffee to our cups. 🙂 We love visiting Florence and would recommend this location to anyone in this area. Especially if you are lucky enough to get AJ.

name: Wade Harrison
text: They were short handed on waitresses ours was stressed out. Waited eight minutes on drink refills. Asked for napkins three times before they were brought.  Asked for tarter sauce twice. Drinks finally came tea was wrong(sweet). Food was cold before we could finish meal. We were in a good mood. I told waitress to relax and have a Merry Christmas. You do the same.

resp.text: We're truly sorry to hear about the poor experience, Wade. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better. Thank you.

name: rebecca delorme
text: Waited 25 min for called in order. Got it finally, this was the chef salad. No ham, croutons. Salad dressing or fork.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Rebecca. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Brian Meadows
text: I dropped my wallet in restroom and didn't realize it.. a cpl minutes later an employee handed it to me....very cool

name: Jim Turner
text: Great country foods and great service!! Love the Ole time Cracker Barrel Restraunt!! Need another Cracker Barrel in Petersville, Al.

name: Stuart Roper
text: Foods fine unfortunately the lady doing the carryout and curbside does not answer the phone. I called four times and eventually gave up. Went inside only to be treated rude by the person who don't answer the phone. Unprofessional representation of an otherwise good restuarant.  The order is easily looked up. Its under my name.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Stuart. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Carol Simmons
text: Absolutely a magnificent place to eat! The food is delicious & the staff is awesome.  My favorite place.  Has been for years.

name: Sara Phillips
text: As always a great place to eat and a fun little gift shop to browse.

name: Stuart Roper
text: Follow up on my last review. First of all it was about service not food quality. And Cracker Barrel responds sounding concerned. But even though I left a phone number and all info required and waited a week. Guess what? They only do that to appear like the problem is resolved. Rather than having their employees answer the phone for curb side service. Forcing us to come inside anyway. Well your food is average at best and no longer required at my household.

name: Joni Nobles
text:
Cracker Barrel in Conyers was busy but all stations were open. Food was excellent
Very clean.

name: Garret Cox
text: Went in just for the new butter crunch latte. Service was fast and the drink was delicious

name: Allison montgomery
text:
This was the worst experience I've ever had at a cracker barrel. What's worse than bad service is no service!!
Another waitress took our drink and food order not to mention her section was clear across the restaurant. The busser was bussing a table with guests still sitting at it. My husbands food wasn't cook thoroughly and our waitress never introduced herself to let us know she was our server until after our food came out in which she didn't even bring! I'm a server myself. I know how it is to be in the weeds. She however wasn't considering she was bussing other tables.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Allison. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: noah doerflinger
text: Always enjoy this store/location. Always receive fast, friendly, and quality service.

name: Shane Rencarge
text: This was a to go order but they were still excellent.

name: Peggy Morris
text: We had a great experience there and had good servers

name: Amanda Craft
text: Love coming here to eat breakfast at any time.

name: Randall Sutton
text: Biscuits & Gravy are so good! Service was excellent too! May go back for some dumplins today! Thanks!

name: debbie wilschke
text: Used to be a good place to eat...but we called in our order for pickup and I ordered deep fried shrimp w fries and it made me so sick bc the shrimp tasted like it was old the steak fries definitely came out of a bag from the freezer ( the kind you get from the grocery store) ...my husband said never again!!!

resp.text: Hi Debbie. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us. Thank you.

name: Curtis Cox
text: When I first got my food the beans looked old. Waitress said my cornbread would be about 5 minutes. I said ok. Twenty minutes later, I'm done with my meal, still no cornbread. Manager maid no effort to compensate for their poor service. Would give no stars if it would let me.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Curtis. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Beverely Nichols
text: Ordered the open face roast beef with creamed potatoes, coleslaw.  When it arrived at table it was cold and the side order of coleslaw was in a small round plastic to go cup like the one they use to bring you extra salad dressing in.  I don't seem to have any luck ordering this meal, it never even remotely looks like the photo they advertise.

resp.text: Hi Beverely - Sorry to disappoint. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us. Thank you.

name: Rick Hogue
text: Food was good and fairly quick from the kitchen.  Service was also pretty good.   Check out was IMPOSSIBLE. Don't know what Cracker Barrel can't figure out about taking money,  but this is a universal problem at every one of their stores I have been in for several years.

name: Henry Tidwell
text: We had a very good time . It was 7 of us and celebrated  4 siblings  birthdays  . Our waitress  was good to tolerate  our craziness.

name: Trevor Tumlin
text: Great food, good service and I was able to buy my daughters pageant dress here too!!

name: Kevin Emerson
text: Always great food here. Service is also good

name: Pat Parsons
text: Great selection in the store and really great sale on wood wick candles

name: Allen smith
text: The food was amazing and the service was good. I highly recommend for anyone who enjoy country style breakfast or lunch.

name: Renee Lisby
text: I like that it reminds me of home, it's home cooked food without all of the mess. The shop is great I like finding things that are a blast from the past.

name: Kennedy English
text: This establishment has the honor of being one of the top ten WORST experiences I've ever had in my life! Not only were the staff uninformed of dietary differentiations, but I was told but the server the cook said that "eggs werent vegetarian" after I ordered and asked if the buscuits contained lard or other animal fat. I'm already irritated at this point and then she informs me that the buscuits also are not vegetarian safe because they contain eggs! When I asked to speak to the manager (thinking surely she would be more informed on the subject) the server was sent back with a chart of common allergens! I had enough at that point and asked to speak with the store manager concerning my allergies and dietary needs. The manager never arrived. After several minutes we decided to just eat elsewhere. Cracker barrel you should be very ashamed of your employees lack of knowledge on such a common dietary need.

name: Richard Brewer
text: Cracker Barrel has the best breakfast! Especially this location in Florence,  AL! Most of the time it's very quick service. I normally get the Smokehouse breakfast that comes with eggs(the way you like- over medium for me or scrambled with colby cheese), choice of bacon or sausage(bacon for me), sawmill gravy and biscuits,  and grits(I put butter and sugar in mine) and I normally ask for apple butter and an extra biscuit(at no extra charge). Sometimes I get Mommas pancakes or French toast. Usually get a large chocolate milk(purity). It's all so good. I love the ample amount of antique decor all around to reminisce. The fireplace is neat in the winter.

name: PrettyPinkClouds311
text: Great food small high price.. And cheap items and cute seasonal things

name: Mickel Rogers
text: Excellent food and great service and also shopping services

name: B Tanner
text: First off, Abe was an amazing waiter! Today was actually my birthday and Kevin the manager tried to ruin it. We asked to be moved after being sat by the emergency exit that they were using to serve outdoor dining and the door was continually opened and so flies were all at our table. We asked Kevin for a different table and he said in an agitated tone, “it’ll be awhile.” He offered no other solution and a table across from us was just cleared and when we asked about it he said that he didn’t have a table for us! I was so disappointed as we had a $100 ticket easily but he didn’t care at all!

name: Chuck Bermele
text: Not happy with the meal.  I went there for a late lunch and my regular favorite, meat loaf. The mash potatoes looked and tasted like they were barely warmed over leftovers and were a solid chunk. The meat loaf was less than the size I'm usually served and looked a small hamburger patty mashed into the shape of a very thin cut of meat loaf with catsup poured over it. It was also barely warm. I won't be back...

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Chuck. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better.

name: Dennis Datin
text: What can you say, it is cracker barrel.   Always busy but worth the wait.   The only downside for me is that the hot chocolate isn't hot and isn't milk chocolate so slightly bitter. Will I go back?  Of course,  it is cracker barrel!

name: PrettyPinkClouds311
text: Great food small high price.. And cheap items and cute seasonal things

name: Richard Brewer
text: Cracker Barrel has the best breakfast! Especially this location in Florence,  AL! Most of the time it's very quick service. I normally get the Smokehouse breakfast that comes with eggs(the way you like- over medium for me or scrambled with colby cheese), choice of bacon or sausage(bacon for me), sawmill gravy and biscuits,  and grits(I put butter and sugar in mine) and I normally ask for apple butter and an extra biscuit(at no extra charge). Sometimes I get Mommas pancakes or French toast. Usually get a large chocolate milk(purity). It's all so good. I love the ample amount of antique decor all around to reminisce. The fireplace is neat in the winter.

name: Chuck Bermele
text: Not happy with the meal.  I went there for a late lunch and my regular favorite, meat loaf. The mash potatoes looked and tasted like they were barely warmed over leftovers and were a solid chunk. The meat loaf was less than the size I'm usually served and looked a small hamburger patty mashed into the shape of a very thin cut of meat loaf with catsup poured over it. It was also barely warm. I won't be back...

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Chuck. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better.

name: Dennis Datin
text: What can you say, it is cracker barrel.   Always busy but worth the wait.   The only downside for me is that the hot chocolate isn't hot and isn't milk chocolate so slightly bitter. Will I go back?  Of course,  it is cracker barrel!

name: Ashley Beavers
text: Waited 15 minutes after being seated, waved down the hostess to get a waitress. Put in our order. A table of 3 sits down before the waitress comes, they get a drink order. Another table of 6 sits down,they get their drink order. 20 minutes goes by and now the table of 3 and the table of 6 have their food and we have yet to see a waitress again. Will not be back. This is the second time in 3 weeks that the service has been HORRIBLE!!!! Corporate needs to come in to do an evaluation.

resp.text: We're truly sorry to hear about the poor service, Ashley. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please include your phone number and email address, the location you visited, and any other details that could help us understand the situation better. We'd love to make it right.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Donnie. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? text: Food was amazing but the service was out of this world! Staci was our waitress and I can say enough great things about her! Attentive, quick, great memory to make sure our meal was correct, got my lemon on the side for my water which is rarely remembered when I order it that way (I don't like lemon seeds in my water). Very impressed!

name: Nancy Davis
text: Waitress super. Found spinach in mashed potatoes. Brown gravey way to salty. Fried chicken breasts way way to much pepper that burned my mouth. You should leave the salt and pepper up to the customer because I do know someone who is allergic  to pepper. I had no choice but to take the breading off the chicken! I could not believe how much pepper was in the batter. The ice tea was good. I was not charged for the meal but it was very disappointing I could not enjoy my meal.

text:
Cracker Barrel is such a unique place to experience!
The food, the atmosphere & the great food all make a lasting memory.

name: Kelsey Brand
text: They treat Doordashers terribly here. The only thing they serve well is attitude. I’ve spoken with several Dashers about this and the consensus is that CB sucks, and it’s not worth picking up orders from here.

name: Meletha Payton
text: My husband and I east at Cracker Barrel once a month or more at the Florence, AL location. On Friday 8-7-20, we came in and was seated quickly, the waiter was nice and made sure we were checked on several times. The biggest complaint we have was our food. My chicken strip were still raw, (thank you for bringing back the steak fries) & they did not have my Honey French Dip anymore. My husband had chicken and dumplings and steak and gravy. My husband had 3 bowls of dumplings with no chicken, his steak was too tuff to eat. We brought our food home to give to our dogs. I tried to tell the guy at checkout that our meal was awful but I guess he didn't care.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Meletha. Can you please email us some additional information at SocialMediaAdmin@crackerbarrel.com? Staff seemed relieved that I didn’t elevate the issue and just wanted me out of their hair.

name: Adrienne Mitry
text: Very nice store. I enjoyed walking around and found a super cute hat.

name: Carey Wood
text:
We ordered. Waitess came back and said they were out of what our son had ordered. He ordered something else. 45 mins later still no food and empty glasses for the past 30 mins. Everyone in our section was getting uneasy and frustrated. It wasn't just taking us a long time to get out food. Everyone had problems. Only one table got food in the 50 minutes we were there. They were not that busy either.
Waitress finally came back to our table and started they were out of chicken pot pie and asked what else did our son's friend want. 45 minutes after we ordered she let us know they were out of something else! My husband asked to speak to a manager. He quickly blamed it on the waitess and said everyone was told what they were out of. He did not try to fix the problem just blamed the waitress. He never even apologized. We got up and left and went to Texas Roadhouse.
Management at the Cracker Barrel in Florence, AL stinks! Big guy, red hair and bushy beard does not need to be in management, if he can't even say he's sorry.

resp.text: We're truly sorry to hear about your visit, Carey. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please include your phone number and email address, location you visited, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better. Thank you.

name: William Gray
text: Went to this cracker Barrel cause was just passing by and after I ate there I really wish I had kept going.  Ordered House Salad and fish dinner . The very nice young lady brought salad out after me seeing there a long while and said they had just put it up for her.  She then turned a went and got food and brought out.  There was no time to eat salad or even get a good start at it.   Then my fish sat there and got cold and after adding tarter sauce it was really cold.  Of all the time I sat there waiting on the food I could have really enjoyed that salad.

name: Roberta Bryan
text: Myself and grandbaby went. Food was ok. I left gratuity, however I felt like we were being rushed. Hadn't even taken a bite of food and was given check. Not one of my best experiences at a Crackle Barrel. Been to many, but, This visit was not as pleasant!! Bought cups and got home only to find one of them chipped.  This particular visit... kinda made me want to, not go to Crackle Barrel again. But in my heart I know other locations that were more family like. More pleasant....

resp.text: We're truly sorry to hear about your visit, Roberta. Can you please email us some additional information at SocialMediaAdmin@crackerbarrel.com? text: The Best place too eat you can get breakfast all day the food is so so DELICIOUS AND THE STAFF IS WONDERFUL AND I REALLY ENJOY MINI SHOPPING MY FAVORITE IS THE JEWELRY THEY HAVE A WONDERFUL AND GREAT 😊😊😊 SECTION GO AND ENJOY YOURSELF GOD BLESS. Ms. S. Carroll

text: Extra seating outside to accommodate more guests.  Fast service and always yummy food!

name: Jason Danley
text: Reason for the 3 star and not a 2 star is only because of the service. Cracker Barrel used to be a great place with really good food. It's been the same place for as long as I can remember. No updates, and no food updates. I got shrimp, hashbrown casserole, turnips, and okra. The shrimp could have been thrown through a window (hard), the casserole had way too much onion in it, and the turnips tasted like old grease. The okra was good, and the tea was good. That's about it. Maybe I should have gotten breakfast..

name: Chloe Bergsing
text: It’s a great restaurant, and the all-day breakfast pancakes are the best!! 🍽🥞

name: Harley White
text: Been doordashing for months. I no how pick up works when you walk in. I had not just one cashier but two of them be rude. After the fact looking for something for my girlfriend and the second cashier yelled at me that i need to stay in the pick up line. I was looking to buy something as I was waiting on someone's pick up order they call the names as they come out so why can I not look for a gift. I know I want pick up no doordash orders from them again or personal.

Mask were provided at front door!! Management took no action!! I guess not required at the Florence location!! No respect for my health or others!!

I totally love their hashbrown casserole (just wish it was a bigger portion. ) my kid always orders the pork chop big country boy breakfast and I always get the pecan pancakes with my main meal.

text: They cook over-medium eggs perfectly. The restaurant is clean, the food is good and the store is fun to browse. It would be nice if the store was a little bigger, but what can you do. Service is ok.

name: Tyler Martin
text: They have outside seating now because of COVID-19. It's wonderful!!

name: Drew Mauck
text: Another Cracker Barrel in a Lowe’s parking lot. Not very cozy or country. I get it that Cracker Barrel likes its restaurants to be in a busy area but this has no rv park, no grassy area and no charm at all. It’s just a big parking lot with a restaurant in the middle. It’s not inviting in any way to me. I’ll give this location a miss and hit the next one down the road

name: Daniel Godwin
text: I am a life long fan. I am hoping the full menu will be back.

name: David Willis
text: The food that we recieved was good. But my problem is with the food we didn't get. We ordered breakfast. It wasn't even that late, maybe 8oclock by the time we were fully finished and leaving. They never brought the biscuits, which we paid for because they were part of the breakfast meals we bought. We kept asking the waitress for them. And she kept saying they are still making them. So we finished our entire meal, when I went to pay to said something and they said we are so sorry. Would you like to take the biscuits with you. Well no I wouldn't, 1st of all were done eating. And 2nd if they are ready for me to take with me why weren't they ready to eat with my meal. They didn't offer to take any off the check bc I paid for something I didn't get. Nothing. Just offered the biscuits I'd been asking for my whole stay but couldn't get. Really disappointing considering i went there especially for breakfast food. We were there for about an hour in total. You can make biscuits from scratch in that long.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, David. Can you please email us some additional information at SocialMediaAdmin@crackerbarrel.com?
